fields.plot: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.
fields.title: Don Jon

fields.plot: A re-creation of the merciless 1970s rivalry between Formula One rivals James Hunt and Niki Lauda.
fields.title: Rush

fields.plot: When Keller Dover's daughter and her friend go missing, he takes matters into his own hands as the police pursue multiple leads and the pressure mounts. But just how far will this desperate father go to protect his family?
fields.title: Prisoners

fields.plot: Katniss Everdeen and Peeta Mellark become targets of the Capitol after their victory in the 74th Hunger Games sparks a rebellion in the Districts of Panem.
fields.title: The Hunger Games: Catching Fire

fields.plot: Faced with an enemy that even Odin and Asgard cannot withstand, Thor must embark on his most perilous and personal journey yet, one that will reunite him with Jane Foster and force him to sacrifice everything to save us all.
fields.title: Thor: The Dark World

fields.plot: While attending a party at James Franco's house, Seth Rogen, Jay Baruchel and many other celebrities are faced with the apocalypse.
fields.title: This Is the End

fields.plot: The haunted Lambert family seeks to uncover the mysterious childhood secret that has left them dangerously connected to the spirit world.
fields.title: Insidious: Chapter 2

fields.plot: United Nations employee Gerry Lane traverses the world in a race against time to stop the Zombie pandemic that is toppling armies and governments, and threatening to destroy humanity itself.
fields.title: World War Z

fields.plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past to change a major historical event that could globally impact man and mutant kind.
fields.title: X-Men: Days of Future Past

fields.plot: A mechanic and his daughter make a discovery that brings down Autobots and Decepticons - and a paranoid government official - on them.
fields.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction

fields.plot: An FBI agent and an Interpol detective track a team of illusionists who pull off bank heists during their performances and reward their audiences with the money.
fields.title: Now You See Me

fields.plot: A medical engineer and an astronaut work together to survive after an accident leaves them adrift in space.
fields.title: Gravity

fields.plot: A veteran pot dealer creates a fake family as part of his plan to move a huge shipment of weed into the U.S. from Mexico.
fields.title: We're the Millers

fields.plot: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

fields.plot: The Manzoni family, a notorious mafia clan, is relocated to Normandy, France under the witness protection program, where fitting in soon becomes challenging as their old habits die hard.
fields.title: The Family

fields.plot: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction.
fields.title: Star Trek Into Darkness

fields.plot: A crash landing leaves Kitai Raige and his father Cypher stranded on Earth, a millennium after events forced humanity's escape. With Cypher injured, Kitai must embark on a perilous journey to signal for help.

fields.plot: A Midwestern war veteran finds himself drawn to the past and lifestyle of his millionaire neighbor.
fields.title: The Great Gatsby

fields.plot: The story of a young lesbian couple's beginning, middle and possible end.
fields.title: La vie d'Adèle

fields.plot: Beatrice Prior, a teenager with a special mind, finds her life threatened when an authoritarian leader seeks to exterminate her kind in her effort to seize control of their divided society.
fields.title: Divergent

fields.plot: The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.

fields.plot: When Tony Stark's world is torn apart by a formidable terrorist called the Mandarin, he starts an odyssey of rebuilding and retribution.
fields.title: Iron Man 3

fields.plot: Spider-Man squares off against the Rhino and the powerful Electro while struggling to keep his promise to leave Gwen Stacey out of his dangerous life.
fields.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2

fields.plot: After her mother's mysterious death, Nica begins to suspect that the talking, red-haired doll her visiting niece has been playing with may be the key to recent bloodshed and chaos.
fields.title: Curse of Chucky

fields.plot: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
fields.title: The Conjuring

fields.plot: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked up into solitary confinement for 20 years without reason.
fields.title: Oldboy

fields.plot: When a structural-security authority finds himself incarcerated in a prison he designed, he has to put his skills to escape and find out who framed him.
fields.title: Escape Plan

fields.plot: Set in the year 2154, where the very wealthy live on a man-made space station while the rest of the population resides on a ruined Earth, a man takes on a mission that could bring equality to the polarized worlds.
fields.title: Elysium

fields.plot: Flint Lockwood now works at The Live Corp Company for his idol Chester V. But he's forced to leave his post when he learns that his most infamous machine is still operational and is churning out menacing food-animal hybrids.
fields.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2

fields.plot: In 2028 Detroit, when Alex Murphy (Joel Kinnaman) - a loving husband, father and good cop - is critically injured in the line of duty, the multinational conglomerate OmniCorp sees their chance for a part-man, part-robot police officer.
fields.title: RoboCop

fields.plot: A reimagining of the classic horror tale about Carrie White, a shy girl outcast by her peers and sheltered by her deeply religious mother, who unleashes telekinetic terror on her small town after being pushed too far at her senior prom.

fields.plot: When her mother disappears, Clary Fray learns that she descends from a line of warriors who protect our world from demons. She joins forces with others like her and heads into a dangerous alternate New York called Downworld.

fields.plot: Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world and teams up with Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, to battle a powerful yet shadowy enemy in present-day Washington, D.C.

fields.plot: Fresh from prison, a street racer who was framed by a wealthy business associate joins a cross country race with revenge in mind. His ex-partner, learning of the plan, places a massive bounty on his head as the race begins.

fields.plot: When a poor college student who cracks an online poker game goes bust, he arranges a face-to-face with the man he thinks cheated him, a sly offshore entrepreneur.
fields.title: Runner Runner

fields.plot: Battle of the Year attracts all the best teams from around the world, but the Americans haven't won in fifteen years. Dante enlists Blake to assemble a team of the best dancers and bring the Trophy back to America where it started.
fields.title: Battle of the Year

fields.plot: Based on the autobiographical novel, the tempestuous 6-year relationship between Liberace and his (much younger) lover, Scott Thorson, is recounted.
fields.title: Behind the Candelabra

fields.plot: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces.
fields.title: No se Aceptan Devoluciones

fields.plot: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.
fields.title: The Bling Ring

fields.plot: Hobbs has Dom and Brian reassemble their crew in order to take down a mastermind who commands an organization of mercenary drivers across 12 countries. Payment? Full pardons for them all.
fields.title: Furious 6

fields.plot: The U.S. government recruits Machete to battle his way through Mexico in order to take down an arms dealer who looks to launch a weapon into space.
fields.title: Machete Kills

fields.plot: In the antebellum United States, Solomon Northup, a free black man from upstate New York, is abducted and sold into slavery.
fields.title: 12 Years a Slave

fields.plot: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from 20 years earlier unwittingly become humankind's only hope for survival.
fields.title: The World's End

fields.plot: Beca, a freshman at Barden University, is cajoled into joining The Bellas, her school's all-girls singing group. Injecting some much needed energy into their repertoire, The Bellas take on their male rivals in a campus competition.
fields.title: Pitch Perfect

fields.plot: A teenager finds herself transported to a deep forest setting where a battle between the forces of good and the forces of evil is taking place. She bands together with a rag-tag group characters in order to save their world -- and ours.
fields.title: Epic

fields.plot: Nick Fury of S.H.I.E.L.D. assembles a team of superhumans to save the planet from Loki and his army.
fields.title: The Avengers

fields.plot: Trip, a young roadie for Metallica, is sent on an urgent mission during the band's show. But what seems like a simple assignment turns into a surreal adventure.
fields.title: Metallica Through the Never

fields.plot: A veteran assigned to extract Earth's remaining resources begins to question what he knows about his mission and himself.
fields.title: Oblivion

fields.plot: After spending 12 years in prison for keeping his mouth shut, notorious safe-cracker Dom Hemingway is back on the streets of London looking to collect what he's owed.
fields.title: Dom Hemingway

fields.plot: When one of their own is kidnapped by an angry gangster, the Wolf Pack must track down Mr. Chow, who has escaped from prison and is on the lam.

fields.plot: The costumed high-school hero Kick-Ass joins with a group of normal citizens who have been inspired to fight crime in costume. Meanwhile, the Red Mist plots an act of revenge that will affect everyone Kick-Ass knows.
fields.title: Kick-Ass 2

fields.plot: During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan.
fields.title: Diana

fields.plot: Gru is recruited by the Anti-Villain League to help deal with a powerful new super criminal.
fields.title: Despicable Me 2

fields.plot: As Cecil Gaines serves eight presidents during his tenure as a butler at the White House, the civil rights movement, Vietnam, and other major events affect this man's life, family, and American society.

fields.plot: 20 years after the dimwits set out on their first adventure, they head out in search of one of their long lost children in the hope of gaining a new kidney.
fields.title: Dumb and Dumber To

fields.plot: A New York socialite, deeply troubled and in denial, arrives in San Francisco to impose upon her sister. She looks a million, but isn't bringing money, peace, or love...
fields.title: Blue Jasmine

fields.plot: 70 years after a horrific alien war, an unusually gifted child is sent to an advanced military school in space to prepare for a future invasion.
fields.title: Ender's Game

fields.plot: While on a tour of the White House with his young daughter, a Capitol policeman springs into action to save his child and protect the president from a heavily armed group of paramilitary invaders.

fields.plot: A trio of bodybuilders in Florida get caught up in an extortion ring and a kidnapping scheme that goes terribly wrong.
fields.title: Pain & Gain

fields.plot: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.
fields.title: The Place Beyond the Pines

fields.plot: After Dominic Toretto and his crew helped take down Owen Shaw, his brother Ian Shaw now wants revenge.
fields.title: Fast & Furious 7

fields.plot: The story of Steve Jobs' ascension from college dropout into one of the most revered creative entrepreneurs of the 20th century.
fields.title: jOBS

fields.plot: A drama centered on a group of people searching for human connections in today's wired world.
fields.title: Disconnect

fields.plot: Competition between the maid of honor and a bridesmaid, over who is the bride's best friend, threatens to upend the life of an out-of-work pastry chef.
fields.title: Bridesmaids

fields.plot: A young itinerant worker is forced to confront his secret extraterrestrial heritage when Earth is invaded by members of his race.
fields.title: Man of Steel

fields.plot: Two roommates deathly afraid of ghosts both fall in love with a girl who believes their home is haunted.
fields.title: Ghost Team One

fields.plot: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.
fields.title: Insidious

fields.plot: A giant radioactive monster called Godzilla awakens from its slumber to wreak destruction on its creators.
fields.title: Godzilla

fields.plot: A video game villain wants to be a hero and sets out to fulfill his dream, but his quest brings havoc to the whole arcade where he lives.
fields.title: Wreck-It Ralph

fields.plot: The Dwarves, Bilbo and Gandalf have successfully escaped the Misty Mountains, and Bilbo has gained the One Ring. They all continue their journey to get their gold back from the Dragon, Smaug.
fields.title: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug

fields.plot: Fearless optimist Anna teams up with Kristoff in an epic journey, encountering Everest-like conditions, and a hilarious snowman named Olaf in a race to find Anna's sister Elsa, whose icy powers have trapped the kingdom in eternal winter.
fields.title: Frozen

fields.plot: Four college girls who land in jail after robbing a restaurant in order to fund their spring break vacation find themselves bailed out by a drug and arms dealer who wants them to do some dirty work.

fields.plot: A literature student Anastasia Steele meets a handsome, yet tormented, billionaire named Christian Grey.
fields.title: Fifty Shades of Grey

fields.plot: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.
fields.title: R.I.P.D.

fields.plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
fields.title: The Shawshank Redemption

fields.plot: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

fields.plot: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games, a televised fight to the death in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to compete.

fields.title: The Last Days on Mars

fields.title: Baggage Claim

fields.plot: In order to restore their dying safe haven, the son of Poseidon and his friends embark on a quest to the Sea of Monsters to find the mythical Golden Fleece while trying to stop an ancient evil from rising.
fields.title: Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters

fields.plot: Residents of a coastal town learn, with deathly consequences, the secret shared by the two mysterious women who have sought shelter at a local resort.
fields.title: Byzantium

fields.plot: In 1962, the United States government enlists the help of Mutants with superhuman abilities to stop a malicious dictator who is determined to start world war III.
fields.title: X-Men: First Class

fields.plot: An operative for an elite private intelligence firm finds her priorities changing dramatically after she is tasked with infiltrating an anarchist group known for executing covert attacks upon major corporations.
fields.title: The East

fields.plot: Searching for a missing student, two private investigators break into his house and find collection of VHS tapes. Viewing the horrific contents of each cassette, they realize there may be dark motives behind the student's disappearance.

fields.plot: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.
fields.title: The Croods

fields.title: Mud

fields.plot: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

fields.title: Grown Ups 2

fields.plot: When Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent launch an assault on the mob, they let the clown out of the box, the Joker, bent on turning Gotham on itself and bringing any heroes down to his level.
fields.title: The Dark Knight

fields.plot: A cropdusting plane with a fear of heights lives his dream of competing in a famous around-the-world aerial race.
fields.title: Planes

fields.plot: The true story of Captain Richard Phillips and the 2009 hijacking by Somali pirates of the US-flagged MV Maersk Alabama, the first American cargo ship to be hijacked in two hundred years.
fields.title: Captain Phillips

fields.plot: The Man of Steel faces off against the Dark Knight.
fields.title: Batman vs. Superman

fields.plot: A younger and more reluctant Hobbit, Bilbo Baggins, sets out on an
to the Lonely Mountain with a spirited group of Dwarves to reclaim their stolen mountain home from a dragon named Smaug.
fields.title: The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey

fields.plot: A jet pilot gets stranded in space, and must unite a diverse team of aliens to form a squad capable of defeating cosmic threats.
fields.title: Guardians of the Galaxy

fields.plot: A Phoenix secretary steals 40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
fields.title: Psycho

fields.title: Les Misérables

fields.plot: Three teenage friends, in the ultimate act of independence, decide to spend their summer building a house in the woods and living off the land.
fields.title: The Kings of Summer

fields.plot: A boy stands on a station platform as a train is about to leave. Should he go with his mother or stay with his father? An infinity of possibilities rise from this decision. As long as he doesn't choose, anything is possible.
fields.title: Mr. Nobody

fields.plot: The plot is unknown at this time.
fields.title: Jurassic World

fields.plot: A dramatic thriller based on real events, THE FIFTH ESTATE reveals the quest to expose the deceptions and corruptions of power that turned an Internet upstart into the 21st century's most fiercely debated organization.
fields.title: The Fifth Estate

fields.plot: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat, expecting to be married to a rich claimant by her mother, falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
fields.title: Titanic

fields.plot: A family of undercover superheroes, while trying to live the quiet suburban life, are forced into action to save the world.
fields.title: The Incredibles

fields.plot: A witch conspires to teach important lessons to various characters of popular children's stories including Little Red Riding Hood, Cinderella, Jack and the Beanstalk and Rapunzel.
fields.title: Into the Woods

fields.plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
fields.title: Pulp Fiction

fields.plot: When a veteran 911 operator takes a life-altering call from a teenage girl who has just been abducted, she realizes that she must confront a killer from her past in order to save the girl's life.
fields.title: The Call

fields.plot: A young woman's world unravels when a drug prescribed by her psychiatrist has unexpected side effects.
fields.title: Side Effects

fields.plot: The true story of Richard Kuklinski, the notorious contract killer and family man. When finally arrested in 1986, neither his wife nor daughters have any clue about his real profession.
fields.title: The Iceman

fields.plot: Dorothy Gale is swept away to a magical land in a tornado and embarks on a quest to see the Wizard who can help her return home.
fields.title: The Wizard of Oz

fields.plot: A recounting of Jack Kerouac's (here known by the name of his fictional alter-ego Jack Duluoz) three sojourns to the cabin in Big Sur, owned by poet Lawrence Ferlinghetti.
fields.title: Big Sur

fields.plot: Five high school students, all different stereotypes, meet in detention, where they pour their hearts out to each other, and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.
fields.title: The Breakfast Club

fields.plot: A skilled extractor is offered a chance to regain his old life as payment for a task considered to be impossible.
fields.title: Inception

fields.plot: A love story between influential filmmaker Alfred Hitchcock and wife Alma Reville during the filming of [link=tt0054215] in 1959.
fields.title: Hitchcock

fields.plot: The third installment of the action-adventure franchise that follows the exploits of Barney Ross, Lee Christmas, and their associates.
fields.title: The Expendables 3

fields.plot: When Wolverine is summoned to Japan by an old acquaintance, he is embroiled in a conflict that forces him to confront his own demons.
fields.title: The Wolverine

fields.plot: A family is held hostage for harboring the target of a murderous syndicate during the Purge, a 12-hour period in which any and all crime is legalized.
fields.title: The Purge

fields.plot: A young woman with a mysterious past lands in Southport, North Carolina where her bond with a widower forces her to confront the dark secret that haunts her.
fields.title: Safe Haven

fields.plot: An introvert freshman is taken under the wings of two seniors who welcome him to the real world.
fields.title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower

fields.plot: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful, time-traveling Romulan creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.
fields.title: Star Trek

fields.plot: A look at Niall, Zayn, Liam, Louis, and Harry's meteoric rise to fame, from their humble hometown beginnings and competing on the X-Factor, to conquering the world and performing at London's famed O2 Arena.
fields.title: One Direction: This Is Us

fields.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.
fields.title: Cloud Atlas

fields.plot: Harry, Ron and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2

fields.plot: A drama centered on two childhood friends who plan to rob an armored car depository, and the NYPD officer who stands in their way.
fields.title: Empire State

fields.plot: An Alaska State Trooper partners with a young woman who escaped the clutches of serial killer Robert Hansen to bring the murderer to justice. Based on actual events.
fields.title: The Frozen Ground

fields.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stockbroker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
fields.title: The Wolf of Wall Street

fields.plot: The powerful but arrogant god Thor is cast out of Asgard to live amongst humans in Midgard (Earth), where he soon becomes one of their finest defenders.
fields.title: Thor

fields.plot: A writer who is brutalized during her cabin retreat seeks revenge on her attackers, who left her for dead.
fields.title: I Spit on Your Grave

fields.plot: A poor and passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman and gives her a sense of freedom. They soon are separated by their social differences.
fields.title: The Notebook

fields.plot: A romantic comedy that brings together three disparate characters who are learning to face a challenging and often confusing world as they struggle together against a common demon: sex addiction.
fields.title: Thanks for Sharing

fields.plot: In 2074, when the mob wants to get rid of someone, the target is sent 30 years into the past, where a hired gun awaits. Someone like Joe, who one day learns the mob wants to 'close the loop' by transporting back Joe's future self.
fields.title: Looper

fields.plot: A hard-partying high school senior's philosophy on life changes when he meets the not-so-typical nice girl.
fields.title: The Spectacular Now

fields.plot: An uptight FBI Special Agent is paired with a foul-mouthed Boston cop to take down a ruthless drug lord.
fields.title: The Heat

fields.plot: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.
fields.title: Inglourious Basterds

fields.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
fields.title: The Godfather

fields.plot: A bipolar, bigoted junkie cop manipulates and hallucinates his way through the festive season in a bid to secure promotion and win back his wife and daughter.
fields.title: Filth

fields.plot: An insomniac office worker looking for a way to change his life crosses paths with a devil-may-care soap maker and they form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more...
fields.title: Fight Club

fields.plot: In a world of fake castles and anthropomorphic rodents, an epic battle begins when an unemployed father's sanity is challenged by a chance encounter with two underage girls on holiday.
fields.title: Escape from Tomorrow

fields.plot: A young, abused and timid 17-year-old girl discovers she has telekinesis, and gets pushed to the limit on the night of her school's prom by a humiliating prank.
fields.title: Carrie

fields.plot: A divorced woman who decides to pursue the man she's interested in learns he's her new friend's ex-husband.
fields.title: Enough Said

fields.plot: A team of explorers discover a clue to the origins of mankind on Earth, leading them on a journey to the darkest corners of the universe. There, they must fight a terrifying battle to save the future of the human race.
fields.title: Prometheus

fields.plot: An undercover state cop who has infiltrated an Irish gang and a mole in the police force working for the same mob race to track down and identify each other before being exposed to the enemy, after both sides realize their outfit has a rat.
fields.title: The Departed

fields.plot: The cross-country adventures of two good-hearted but incredibly stupid friends.
fields.title: Dumb & Dumber

fields.plot: When the star-crossed lovers of two enemy families meet, forbidden love ensues.
fields.title: Romeo and Juliet

fields.plot: The most delicious event since macaroni met cheese. Inspired by the beloved children's book, the film focuses on a town where food falls from the sky like rain.
fields.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs

fields.plot: A look at the New York City punk-rock scene and the venerable nightclub, CBGB.
fields.title: CBGB

fields.plot: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.
fields.title: The Counselor

fields.plot: A murder in 1944 draws together the great poets of the beat generation: Allen Ginsberg, Jack Kerouac and William Burroughs.
fields.title: Kill Your Darlings

fields.plot: Julian, a drug-smuggler thriving in Bangkok's criminal underworld, sees his life get even more complicated when his mother compels him to find and kill whoever is responsible for his brother's recent death.
fields.title: Only God Forgives

fields.plot: Five friends head to a remote cabin, where the discovery of a Book of the Dead leads them to unwittingly summon up demons living in the nearby woods. The evil presence possesses them until only one is left to fight for survival.
fields.title: Evil Dead

fields.plot: An acclaimed writer, his ex-wife, and their teenaged children come to terms with the complexities of love in all its forms over the course of one tumultuous year.
fields.title: Stuck in Love

fields.plot: 86-year-old Irving Zisman is on a journey across America with the most unlikely companion: his 8 year-old grandson, Billy.
fields.title: Bad Grandpa

fields.plot: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.
fields.title: You're Next

fields.plot: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a super-hero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

fields.plot: King Leonidas and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

fields.plot: A continuation of the saga created by George Lucas.

tale is told from the perspective of the villainous Maleficent and looks at the events that hardened her heart and drove her to curse young Princess Aurora.

world.

for a shot at escape.

. Four members of SEAL Team 10 were tasked with the mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shahd. Marcus Luttrell was the only member of his team to survive.

and is perfect for the role of the delicate White Swan - Princess Odette - but slowly loses her mind as she becomes more and more like Odile, the Black Swan.

The sounds within the grooves trigger flashbacks of her town's violent past. Is Heidi going mad, or are the Lords back to take revenge on Salem, Massachusetts?

fields.plot: A young girl's

fields.plot: A story of family, religion, hatred, oil and madness, focusing on a turn-of-the-century prospector in the early days of the business.

fields.plot: 19-year-old Alice returns to the magical world from her childhood adventure, where she reunites with her old friends and learns of her true destiny: to end the Red Queen's reign of terror.
fields.title: Alice in Wonderland

fields.plot: An adaptation of Homer's great epic, the film follows the assault on Troy by the united Greek forces and chronicles the fates of the men involved.
fields.title: Troy

fields.plot: A marksman living in exile is coaxed back into action after learning of a plot to kill the president. Ultimately double-crossed and framed for the attempt, he goes on the run to track the real killer and find out who exactly set him up, and why.
fields.title: Shooter

fields.plot: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.
fields.title: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief

fields.plot: An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection.
fields.title: Dark Shadows

fields.plot: Scott Pilgrim must defeat his new girlfriend's seven evil exes in order to win her heart.
fields.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World

fields.plot: A young girl is institutionalized by her abusive stepfather. Retreating to an alternative reality as a coping strategy, she envisions a plan which will help her escape from the mental facility.
fields.title: Sucker Punch

fields.plot: Upon admittance to a mental institution, a brash rebel rallies the patients to take on the oppressive head nurse.
fields.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

fields.plot: A couple begin to experience some unusual activity after bringing their lost nieces and nephew home. With the help of home-surveillance cameras, they learn they're being stalked by a nefarious demon.
fields.title: Scary MoVie

fields.plot: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
fields.title: American History X

fields.plot: A boat has been destroyed, criminals are dead, and the key to this mystery lies with the only survivor and his twisted, convoluted story beginning with five career crooks in a seemingly random police lineup.
fields.title: The Usual Suspects

fields.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home-world.
fields.title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

fields.plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
fields.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

fields.plot: The town's most hard boiled citizens cross paths with some of its more reviled inhabitants.
fields.title: Sin City: A Dame to Kill For

fields.plot: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel while succumbing to greed.
fields.title: Scarface

fields.plot: In future Britain, charismatic delinquent Alex DeLarge is jailed and volunteers for an experimental aversion therapy developed by the government in an effort to solve society's crime problem... but not all goes to plan.
fields.title: A Clockwork Orange

fields.plot: A pair of aging boxing rivals are coaxed out of retirement to fight one final bout -- 30 years after their last match.
fields.title: Grudge Match

fields.plot: An office worker who lives inside fantasy worlds where he gets to live an adventurous life while romancing his co-worker sets off a global journey to fix things when both of their jobs are threatened.
fields.title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty

fields.plot: A shadowy freedom fighter known only as
uses guerrilla tactics to fight against his terrorist, totalitarian society. Upon rescuing a girl from the secret police, he also finds his best chance at having an ally.
fields.title: V for Vendetta

fields.plot: A process server and his marijuana dealer wind up on the run from hitmen and a corrupt police officer after he witness his dealer's boss murder a competitor while trying to serve papers on him.
fields.title: Pineapple Express

fields.plot: Jack Ryan, as a young covert CIA analyst, uncovers a Russian plot to crash the U.S. economy with a terrorist attack.
fields.title: Jack Ryan: Shadow One

fields.plot: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.
fields.title: Memento

fields.plot: In New York City, Brandon's carefully cultivated private life -- which allows him to indulge his sexual addiction -- is disrupted when his sister arrives unannounced for an indefinite stay.
fields.title: Shame

fields.plot: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.
fields.title: Europa Report

fields.plot: An American girl on holiday in the English countryside with her family finds herself in hiding and fighting for her survival as the third world war breaks out.
fields.title: How I Live Now

fields.plot: An alien seductress preys upon hitchhikers in Scotland.
fields.title: Under the Skin

fields.plot: Revolves around a monster attack in New York as told from the point of view of a small group of people.
fields.title: Cloverfield

fields.plot: The story of a young man's adventures in the Californian pornography industry of the 1970s and 1980s.
fields.title: Boogie Nights

fields.plot: A clean-cut high school student relies on the school's rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.
fields.title: Easy A

fields.plot: An undercover FBI agent becomes a vigilante assassin and sets out to unleash vengeance upon the corrupt businessman who slew his family.
fields.title: The Punisher

fields.plot: The story of a tourist family in Thailand caught in the destruction and chaotic aftermath of the 2004 Indian Ocean tsunami.
fields.title: Lo imposible

fields.plot: A professional assassin rescues a young girl whose parents were killed in a police raid.
fields.title: Léon

fields.plot: English teacher John Keating inspires his students to a love of poetry and to seize the day.
fields.title: Dead Poets Society

fields.plot: The Biblical Noah suffers visions of an apocalyptic deluge, and takes measures to protect his family from the coming flood.
fields.title: Noah

fields.plot: The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.
fields.title: Tangled

fields.plot: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, but is later sued by two brothers who claimed he stole their idea, and the cofounder who was later squeezed out of the business.
fields.title: The Social Network

fields.plot: Two British comic-book geeks traveling across the U.S. encounter an alien outside Area 51.
fields.title: Paul

fields.plot: A wealthy New York investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he escalates deeper into his illogical, gratuitous fantasies.
fields.title: American Psycho

fields.plot: A woman suffering from Parkinson's befriends a drug rep working for Pfizer against 1990s Pittsburgh backdrop.
fields.title: Love & Other Drugs

fields.plot: Follow two couples as they journey from the bar to the bedroom and are eventually put to the test in the real world.
fields.title: About Last Night

fields.plot: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.
fields.title: The Emperor's New Groove

fields.plot: The ancient war between humans and a race of giants is reignited when Jack, a young farmhand fighting for a kingdom and the love of a princess, opens a gateway between the two worlds.
fields.title: Jack the Giant Slayer

fields.plot: A self-diagnosed nymphomaniac recounts her erotic experiences to the man who saved her after a beating.
fields.title: Nymphomaniac

fields.plot: With the aid of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using his son's life-generating device, the Genesis Device, as the ultimate weapon.
fields.title: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan

fields.plot: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
fields.title: Heat

fields.plot: A new kid must find a guy to date the meanest girl in school, the older sister of the girl he has a crush on, who cannot date until her older sister does.
fields.title: 10 Things I Hate About You

fields.plot: While trying to avoid the clichés of Hollywood romantic comedies, Dylan and Jamie soon discover however that adding the act of sex to their friendship does lead to complications.
fields.title: Friends with Benefits

fields.plot: After three years of fighting in the Clone Wars, Anakin Skywalker falls prey to the Sith Lord's lies and makes an enemy of the Jedi and those he loves, concluding his journey to the Dark Side.
fields.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith

fields.plot: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.
fields.title: No Country for Old Men

fields.plot: Good girl Sandy and greaser Danny fell in love over the summer. But when they unexpectedly discover they're now in the same high school, will they be able to rekindle their romance?
fields.title: Grease

fields.plot: With the help of a mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100 percent of his brain abilities, a struggling writer becomes a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with lots of dangers.
fields.title: Limitless

fields.plot: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, and a gun-toting tough guy trying to find the Last Twinkie and a pair of sisters trying to get to an amusement park join forces to travel across a zombie-filled America.
fields.title: Zombieland

fields.plot: Drama set in 1954, U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels is investigating the disappearance of a murderess who escaped from a hospital for the criminally insane and is presumed to be hiding nearby.
fields.title: Shutter Island

fields.plot: A Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive from the law.
fields.title: Lilo & Stitch

fields.plot: An abandoned boy is lured to America and drawn into the shadow of a dangerous father figure. Inspired by the real life events that led to the 2002 Beltway sniper attacks.
fields.title: Blue Caprice

fields.plot: Inspired by a true story, a comedy centered on a 27-year-old guy who learns of his cancer diagnosis, and his subsequent struggle to beat the disease.
Ron Burgundy is San Diego's top rated newsman in the male-dominated broadcasting of the 70's, but that's all about to change for Ron and his cronies when an ambitious woman is hired as a new anchor.
fields.title: Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy

fields.plot: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
fields.title: How to Train Your Dragon

fields.plot: Two veterans of the Bosnian War -- one American, one Serbian -- find their unlikely friendship turn tense with one of them reveals their true intentions.
fields.title: Killing Season

fields.plot: A pair of young lovers flee their New England town, which causes a local search party to fan out and find them.
fields.title: Moonrise Kingdom

fields.plot: The fifth installment of the blockbuster franchise that follows the adventures of Captain Jack Sparrow.
fields.title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales

fields.plot: Mild-mannered businessman Sandy Patterson travels from Denver to Florida to confront the deceptively harmless-looking woman who has been living it up after stealing Sandy's identity.
fields.title: Identity Thief

fields.plot: Harry finds himself mysteriously selected as an under-aged competitor in a dangerous tournament between three schools of magic.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire

fields.plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.
fields.title: RoboCop

fields.plot: Hazel and Gus are two teenagers who share an acerbic wit, a disdain for the conventional, and a love that sweeps them on a journey. Their relationship is all the more miraculous, given that Hazel's other constant companion is an oxygen tank, Gus jokes about his wooden leg, and they met and fell in love at a cancer support group.
fields.title: The Fault in Our Stars

fields.plot: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.
fields.title: Inside Man

fields.plot: When two poor greasers, Johnny, and Ponyboy are assaulted by a vicious gang, the socs, and Johnny kills one of the attackers, tension begins to mount between the two rival gangs, setting off a turbulent chain of events.
fields.title: The Outsiders

fields.plot: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.
fields.title: 47 Ronin

fields.plot: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.
fields.title: Burlesque

fields.plot: Transplanted to Mars, a Civil War vet discovers a lush planet inhabited by 12-foot tall barbarians. Finding himself a prisoner of these creatures, he escapes, only to encounter a princess who is in desperate need of a savior.
fields.title: John Carter

fields.plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.
fields.title: Pretty in Pink

fields.plot: After a collision with a shipping container at sea, a resourceful sailor finds himself, despite all efforts to the contrary, staring his mortality in the face.
fields.title: All Is Lost

fields.plot: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.
fields.title: 12 Angry Men

fields.plot: When a group of misfits is hired by an unknown third party to burglarize a desolate house and acquire a rare VHS tape, they discover more found footage than they bargained for.
fields.title: V/H/S

fields.plot: A look at Wolverine's early life, in particular his time with the government squad Weapon and the impact it will have on his later years.
fields.title: X-Men Origins: Wolverine

fields.plot: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
fields.title: Snatch.

fields.plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy. Fighting superior technology, Man's best weapon is the will to survive.
fields.title: Independence Day

fields.plot: Three college friends hit the biggest party of the year, where a mysterious phenomenon disrupts the night, quickly descending into a chaos that challenges their friendships -- and whether they can stay alive.
Shakespeare's famous play is updated to the hip modern suburb of Verona still retaining its original dialogue.
fields.title: Romeo + Juliet

fields.plot: A newly engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must pay a call to the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-N-Furter.
fields.title: The Rocky Horror Picture Show

fields.plot: Former race-car driver Brent Magna is pitted against the clock when his wife is kidnapped by a mysterious villain. He commandeers a young woman's car and takes her on on a high-speed race against time.
fields.title: Getaway

fields.plot: A wrongfully expelled Harvard undergrad moves to London, where he is introduced to the violent underworld of football hooliganism.
fields.title: Hooligans

fields.plot: A factory worker, Douglas Quaid, begins to suspect that he is a spy after visiting Rekall - a company that provides its clients with implanted fake memories of a life they would like to have led - goes wrong and he finds himself on the run.
fields.title: Total Recall

fields.plot: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes to plan.
fields.title: 28 Weeks Later

fields.plot: After a simple jewelery heist goes terribly wrong, the surviving criminals begin to suspect that one of them is a police informant.
fields.title: Reservoir Dogs

fields.plot: The adventures of incoming high school and junior high students on the last day of school, in May of 1976.
fields.title: Dazed and Confused

fields.plot: When bitten by a genetically modified spider, a nerdy, shy, and awkward high school student gains spider-like abilities that he eventually must use to fight evil as a superhero after tragedy befalls his family.
fields.title: Spider-Man

fields.plot: Four young men who belong to a supernatural legacy are forced to battle a fifth power long thought to have died out. Another great force they must contend with is the jealousy and suspicion that threatens to tear them apart.
fields.title: The Covenant

fields.plot: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.
fields.title: Battleship

fields.plot: Danny Ocean and his eleven accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.
fields.title: Ocean's Eleven

fields.plot: In the middle of her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and monsters; where humans are changed into animals; and a bathhouse for these creatures.
fields.title: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi

fields.plot: Four socially troubled 18-year-olds from the south of England go on holiday to Malia.
fields.title: The Inbetweeners Movie

fields.plot: Los Angeles police officer Brian O'Connor must decide where his loyalties really lie when he becomes enamored with the street racing world he has been sent undercover to destroy.
fields.title: The Fast and the Furious

fields.plot: A novelist struggling with writer's block finds romance in a most unusual way: by creating a female character he thinks will love him, then willing her into existence.
fields.title: Ruby Sparks

fields.plot: As students at the Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young flyer learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.
fields.title: Top Gun

fields.plot: The story of Olympic Wrestling Champion Mark Schultz and how paranoid schizophrenic John duPont killed his brother, Olympic Champion Dave Schultz.
fields.title: Foxcatcher

fields.plot: The cyborg who once tried to kill Sarah Connor is dead, and another T-101 must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from an even more powerful and advanced Terminator, the T-1000.
fields.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

fields.plot: In Mexico City, a former assassin swears vengeance on those who committed an unspeakable act against the family he was hired to protect.
fields.title: Man on Fire

fields.plot: The story of a forbidden and secretive relationship between two cowboys and their lives over the years.
fields.title: Brokeback Mountain

fields.plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.
fields.title: Stand by Me

fields.plot: While on a trip to Paris with his fiancée's family, a nostalgic screenwriter finds himself mysteriously going back to the 1920s every day at midnight.
fields.title: Midnight in Paris

fields.plot: A car accident puts Paige in a coma, and when she wakes up with severe memory loss, her husband Leo works to win her heart again.
fields.title: The Vow

fields.plot: A father goes undercover for the DEA in order to free his son who was imprisoned after being set up in drug deal.
fields.title: Snitch

fields.plot: In a city rife with injustice, ex-cop Billy Taggart seeks redemption and revenge after being double-crossed and then framed by its most powerful figure: Mayor Nicholas Hostetler.
fields.title: Broken City

fields.plot: Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.
fields.title: Fast Five

fields.plot: The space vessel Nostromo and its crew receive a distress call from a alien planet. After searching for survivors that planet they head back home only to realize that an deadly alien life form has joined them.
fields.title: Alien

fields.plot: A thriller centered on a young man who sets out to uncover the truth about his life after finding his baby photo on a missing persons website.
fields.title: Abduction

fields.plot: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All American football player and first round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.
fields.title: The Blind Side

fields.plot: The night before his big medical school interview, a promising student celebrates his 21st birthday with his two best friends.
fields.title: 21 & Over

fields.plot: Sparks fly when spirited Elizabeth Bennet meets single, rich, and proud Mr. Darcy. But Mr. Darcy reluctantly finds himself falling in love with a woman beneath his class. Can each overcome their own pride and prejudice?
fields.title: Pride & Prejudice

fields.plot: An ancient struggle between two Cybertronian races, the heroic Autobots and the evil Decepticons, comes to Earth, with a clue to the ultimate power held by a teenager.
fields.title: Transformers

fields.plot: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.
fields.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe

fields.plot: As the Barret family's peaceful suburban life is rocked by an escalating series of disturbing events, they come to learn that a terrifying and deadly force is after them.
fields.title: Dark Skies

fields.plot: While in his teens, Donny fathered a son, Todd, and raised him as a single parent up until Todd's 18th birthday. Now, after not seeing each other for years, Todd's world comes crashing down when Donny resurfaces just before Todd's wedding.
fields.title: That's My Boy

fields.plot: A struggling screenwriter inadvertently becomes entangled in the Los Angeles criminal underworld after his oddball friends kidnap a gangster's beloved Shih Tzu.
fields.title: Seven Psychopaths

fields.plot: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.
fields.title: I Am Number Four

fields.plot: A quartet of mutated humanoid turtles clash with an uprising criminal gang of ninjas.
fields.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles

fields.plot: A determined woman works with a hardened boxing trainer to become a professional.
fields.title: Million Dollar Baby

fields.plot: During the U.S.-Viet Nam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.
fields.title: Apocalypse Now

fields.plot: Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.
fields.title: Men in Black 3

fields.plot: Renton, deeply immersed in the Edinburgh drug scene, tries to clean up and get out, despite the allure of the drugs and influence of friends.
fields.title: Trainspotting

fields.plot: Brian O'Conner, now working for the FBI in LA, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.
fields.title: Fast & Furious

fields.plot: For fun loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant.
fields.title: Knocked Up

fields.plot: A former Weather Underground activist goes on the run from a journalist who has discovered his identity.
fields.title: The Company You Keep

fields.plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.
fields.title: War of the Worlds

fields.plot: After a brilliant but asocial mathematician accepts secret work in cryptography, his life takes a turn to the nightmarish.
fields.title: A Beautiful Mind

fields.plot: A demystified take on the tale of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.
fields.title: King Arthur

fields.plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.
fields.title: Red Dawn

fields.plot: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last ditch effort to survive and uncover his assailants.
fields.title: Red

fields.plot: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on his crime syndicate stretching from Lake Tahoe, Nevada to pre-revolution 1958 Cuba.
fields.title: The Godfather: Part II

fields.plot: Two sisters find their already strained relationship challenged as a mysterious new planet threatens to collide with Earth.
fields.title: Melancholia

fields.plot: The Autobots learn of a Cybertronian spacecraft hidden on the moon, and race against the Decepticons to reach it and to learn its secrets.
fields.title: Transformers: Dark of the Moon

fields.plot: Theseus is a mortal man chosen by Zeus to lead the fight against the ruthless King Hyperion, who is on a rampage across Greece to obtain a weapon that can destroy humanity.
fields.title: Immortals

fields.plot: A San Francisco cartoonist becomes an amateur detective obsessed with tracking down the Zodiac killer.
fields.title: Zodiac

fields.plot: When a street magician's stunts begins to make their show look stale, superstar magicians Burt Wonderstone and Anton Marvelton look to salvage on their act - and their friendship - by staging their own daring stunt.
fields.title: The Incredible Burt Wonderstone

fields.plot: A retired CIA agent travels across Europe and relies on his old skills to save his estranged daughter, who has been kidnapped while on a trip to Paris.
fields.title: Taken

fields.plot: While subjected to the horrors of WWII Germany, young Liesel finds solace by stealing books and sharing them with others. Under the stairs in her home, a Jewish refuge is being sheltered by her adoptive parents.
fields.title: The Book Thief

fields.plot: Dave is a married man with two kids and a loving wife , and Mitch is a single man who is at the prime of his sexual life. One fateful night while Mitch and Dave are peeing in a fountain when lightning strikes and they switch bodies.
fields.title: The Change-Up

fields.plot: While out on parole, Dennis reluctantly takes a job selling Christmas trees with his old buddy Rene in order to make enough money to buy his estranged daughter the piano she's always wanted.
fields.title: All Is Bright

fields.plot: A Naval veteran arrives home from war unsettled and uncertain of his future - until he is tantalized by The Cause and its charismatic leader.
fields.title: The Master

fields.plot: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Em are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.
fields.title: One Day

fields.plot: After Vishwas Rao (Shahid Kapoor) is raised up by his Mother (Padmini Kolhapure), who apparently dreams for him to become a Police Inspector. However, he has different plans in mind. Vishwas wants to become a film hero.
fields.title: Phata Poster Nikhla Hero

fields.plot: A classic Disney fairytale collides with modern-day New York City in a story about a fairytale princess who is sent to our world by an evil queen. Soon after her arrival, Princess Giselle begins to change her views on life and love after meeting a handsome lawyer. Can a storybook view of romance survive in the real world?
fields.title: Enchanted

fields.plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to reclaim their old glory.
fields.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace

fields.plot: The story of three friends who are tragically born to lead short lives, and the love triangle that forms between them in their brief time together.
fields.title: Never Let Me Go

fields.plot: Two mutants come to a private academy for their kind whose resident superhero team must oppose a terrorist organization with similar powers.
fields.title: X-Men

fields.plot: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.
fields.title: Toy Story 3

fields.plot: A 18th century adventure story centered on young Thomas, who is apprenticed to the local Spook to learn to fight evil spirits. His first great challenge comes when the powerful Mother Malkin escapes her confinement while the Spook is away.
fields.title: Seventh Son

fields.plot: A land baron tries to re-connect with his two daughters after his wife is seriously injured in a boating accident.
fields.title: The Descendants

fields.plot: In a race against time, a crew of art historians and museum curators unite to recover renowned works of art stolen by Nazis before Hitler destroys them.
fields.title: The Monuments Men

fields.plot: A man awakens from a coma, only to discover that someone has taken on his identity and that no one, (not even his wife), believes him. With the help of a young woman, he sets out to prove who he is.
fields.title: Unknown

fields.plot: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement fails to follow through, his older brother, Russell, takes matters into his own hands to find justice.
fields.title: Out of the Furnace

fields.plot: Feeling pressured to become more sexually experienced before she goes to college, Brandy Klark makes a list of things to accomplish before hitting campus in the fall.
fields.title: The To Do List

fields.plot: A young journalist must investigate a mysterious videotape which seems to cause the death of anyone in a week of viewing it.
fields.title: The Ring

fields.plot: Goaded by his buddies, a nerdy guy who's never
only finds the pressure mounting when he meets a single mother.
fields.title: The 40 Year Old Virgin

fields.plot: A post-apocalyptic tale of a man and his son trying to survive by any means possible.
fields.title: The Road

fields.plot: 3 high school seniors throw a birthday party to make a name for themselves. As the night progresses, things spiral out of control as word of the party spreads.
fields.title: Project X

fields.plot: Set in the near future, where robot boxing is a top sport, a struggling promoter feels he's found a champion in a discarded robot. During his hopeful rise to the top, he discovers he has an 11-year-old son who wants to know his father.
fields.title: Real Steel

fields.plot: A man seeks out his exact look-alike after spotting him in a movie.
fields.title: Enemy

fields.plot: An ordinary LEGO minifigure, mistakenly thought to be the extraordinary MasterBuilder, is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil LEGO tyrant from gluing the universe together.
fields.title: The Lego Movie

fields.plot: A son tries to learn more about his dying father by reliving stories and myths he told about his life.
fields.title: Big Fish

fields.plot: On a weekend trip to Hawaii, a plastic surgeon convinces his loyal assistant to pose as his soon-to-be-divorced wife in order to cover up a careless lie he told to his much-younger girlfriend.
fields.title: Just Go with It

fields.plot: The story of martial-arts master Ip Man, the man who trained Bruce Lee.
fields.title: Yi dai zong shi

fields.plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.
fields.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol

fields.plot: When the devil possesses a teenage girl, her only hope is an exorcism.
fields.title: The Exorcist

fields.plot: Determined to make her own path in life, Princess Merida defies a custom that brings chaos to her kingdom. Granted one wish, Merida must rely on her bravery and her archery skills to undo a beastly curse.
fields.title: Brave

fields.plot: A group of explorers make use of a newly discovered wormhole to surpass the limitations on human space travel and conquer the vast distances involved in an interstellar voyage.
fields.title: Interstellar

fields.plot: Exceptional London cop Nicholas Angel is involuntarily transferred to a quaint English village and paired with a witless new partner. While on the beat, Nicholas suspects a sinister conspiracy is afoot with the residents.

fields.plot: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

fields.plot: A man decides to turn his moribund life around by winning back his ex-girlfriend, reconciling his relationship with his mother, and dealing with an entire community that has returned from the dead to eat the living.
fields.title: Shaun of the Dead

fields.plot: The Bride wakens from a four-year coma. The child she carried in her womb is gone. Now she must wreak vengeance on the team of assassins who betrayed her - a team she was once part of.

fields.plot: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

fields.plot: As a new year at school begins, Lola's heart is broken by her boyfriend, though soon she's surprised by her best friend, promising musician Kyle, who reveals his feelings for her.

fields.plot: Monsters generate their city's power by scaring children, but they are terribly afraid themselves of being contaminated by children, so when one enters Monstropolis, top scarer Sulley finds his world disrupted.

fields.plot: An expansion of the universe from Robert Ludlum's novels, centered on a new hero whose stakes have been triggered by the events of the previous three films.

fields.plot: The son of a virtual world designer goes looking for his father and ends up inside the digital world that his father designed. He meets his father's creation turned bad and a unique ally who was born inside the digital domain of The Grid.

fields.plot: Faced with an unplanned pregnancy, an offbeat young woman makes an unusual decision regarding her unborn child.

fields.plot: A story centered on an eccentric art auctioneer and his obsession with an heiress/collector.
fields.title: La migliore offerta

fields.plot: A teenager suspects that his new neighbor is a vampire.

fields.plot: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

fields.plot: A faded movie star and a neglected young wife form an unlikely bond after crossing paths in Tokyo.

fields.plot: A look at the lives of the strong-willed women of the Weston family, whose paths have diverged until a family crisis brings them back to the Oklahoma house they grew up in, and to the dysfunctional woman who raised them.

fields.plot: Dr. Bruce Banner, thanks to a gamma ray experiment gone wrong, transforms into a giant green-skinned hulk whenever his pulse rate gets too high. Meanwhile, a soldier uses the same technology to become an evil version of the original.

fields.plot: To save her father from death in the army, a Chinese maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroes in the process.

fields.plot: An extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth suddenly finds a kindred spirit in a government agent who is exposed to their biotechnology.

fields.plot: On the hunt for a fabled treasure of gold, a band of warriors, assassins, and a rogue British soldier descend upon a village in feudal China, where a humble blacksmith looks to defend himself and his fellow villagers.
fields.title: The Man with the Iron Fists

fields.plot: When his secret bride is executed for assaulting an English soldier whom tried to rape her, a commoner begins a revolt and leads Scottish warriors against the cruel English tyrant who rules Scotland with an iron-fist.

fields.plot: In the fascist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

fields.plot: A romantic comedy centered on the two high schoolers: Dave, who until now has pined for a girl he can't have, and Aubrey, a creative type who's dating a guy who doesn't quite understand her.

fields.plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite of what the principal thinks of that.

fields.plot: A young woman, after witnessing her parents' murder as a child in Bogota, grows up to be a stone-cold assassin.

fields.plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.

fields.plot: A young Greek woman falls in love with a non-Greek and struggles to get her family to accept him while she comes to terms with her heritage and cultural identity.
fields.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding

fields.plot: Plot unknown.

fields.plot: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

fields.plot: The planet from [link=tt0078748] has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, the rescue team has impressive firepower, but will it be enough?

fields.plot: During the summer of 1979, a group of friends witness a train crash and investigate subsequent unexplained events in their small town.

fields.plot: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with his newly-purchased operating system that's designed to meet his every need.

fields.plot: Sherlock Holmes and his sidekick Dr. Watson join forces to outwit and bring down their fiercest adversary, Professor Moriarty.

fields.plot: A look at the early years of boxer
Micky Ward and his brother who helped train him before going pro in the mid 1980s.

fields.plot: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

fields.title: The Adventures of Sharkboy and Lavagirl 3-D

fields.title: Gangs of New York

fields.plot: An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé.

fields.plot: A post-apocalyptic tale, in which a lone man fights his way across America in order to protect a sacred book that holds the secrets to saving humankind.

fields.plot: As a police psychologist works to talk down an ex-con who is threatening to jump from a Manhattan hotel rooftop, the biggest diamond heist ever committed is in motion.

fields.plot: A strange black entity from another world bonds with Peter Parker and causes inner turmoil as he contends with new villains, temptations, and revenge.

fields.plot: Alice fights alongside a resistance movement in the continuing battle against the Umbrella Corporation and the undead.
fields.title: Resident Evil: Retribution

fields.plot: A young widow discovers that her late husband has left her 10 messages intended to help ease her pain and start a new life.

fields.plot: A man goes on the run after he discovers that he is actually a
, and is being kept as a source of replacement parts, along with others, in a Utopian facility.

fields.plot: Sparks fly when Wade Walker crashes the Peeples annual reunion in the Hamptons to ask for their precious daughter Grace's hand in marriage.
fields.title: Peeples

fields.plot: It's Harry's third year at Hogwarts; not only does he have a new
teacher, but there is also trouble brewing. Convicted murderer Sirius Black has escaped the Wizards' Prison and is coming after Harry.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

fields.plot: The canine star of a fictional sci-fi/action show that believes his powers are real embarks on a cross country trek to save his co-star from a threat he believes is just as real.

. The men must follow various rules and objectives if they wish to survive and win the deadly game set for them.

fields.title: The Pursuit of Happyness

fields.plot: Aladdin, a street urchin, accidentally meets Princess Jasmine, who is in the city undercover. They love each other, but she can only marry a prince.
fields.title: Aladdin

fields.plot: A high-profile terrorism case unexpectedly binds together two ex-lovers on the defense team - testing the limits of their loyalties and placing their lives in jeopardy.

fields.plot: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.
fields.title: The Great Gatsby

fields.plot: Spanning over one thousand years, and three parallel stories, The Fountain is a story of love, death, spirituality, and the fragility of our existence in this world.

fields.plot: John Beckwith and Jeremy Grey, a pair of committed womanizers who sneak into weddings to take advantage of the romantic tinge in the air, find themselves at odds with one another when John meets and falls for Claire Cleary.

fields.plot: A couple of recently deceased ghosts contract the services of a
in order to remove the obnoxious new owners of their house.

fields.plot: Perseus, mortal son of Zeus, battles the minions of the underworld to stop them from conquering heaven and earth.
fields.title: Clash of the Titans

fields.plot: With their warning about Lord Voldemort's return scoffed at, Harry and Dumbledore are targeted by the Wizard authorities as an authoritarian bureaucrat slowly seizes power at Hogwarts.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix

fields.plot: A bullied young boy befriends a young female vampire who lives in secrecy with her guardian.
fields.title: Let Me In

fields.plot: City teenager Ren MacCormack moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.
fields.title: Footloose

fields.plot: Set in the days leading up to the eruption of Mt. Vesuvius, a slave on a ship heading for Naples works to get home to save the woman he loves and his best friend, a gladiator trapped inside the city's coliseum.

fields.plot: A true story about Frank Abagnale Jr., who, before his 19th birthday, successfully conned millions of dollars' worth of checks as a Pan Am pilot, doctor, and legal prosecutor.
fields.title: Catch Me If You Can

fields.plot: Whilst attending a party, three high school friends gain superpowers after making an incredible discovery underground. Soon, though, they find their lives spinning out of control and their bond tested as they embrace their darker sides.

fields.plot: When Christian, an LA trust-fund kid with casual ties to Hollywood, learns of a secret affair between Tara and the lead of his film project, Ryan, he spirals out of control, and his cruel mind games escalate into an act of bloody violence.
fields.title: The Canyons

fields.plot: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
fields.title: Rocky

fields.plot: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.

fields.plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

fields.plot: Two aimless middle-aged losers still living at home are forced against their will to become roommates when their parents get married.

fields.plot: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

fields.plot: A deformed bellringer must assert his independence from a vicious government minister in order to help his friend, a gypsy dancing girl.
fields.title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame

fields.plot: Four men who form a neighborhood watch group as a way to get out of their day-to-day family routines find themselves defending the Earth from an alien invasion.

fields.plot: Two disgraced FBI agents go way undercover in an effort to protect hotel heiresses the Wilson Sisters from a kidnapping plot.
fields.title: White Chicks

fields.plot: Newlywed couple Nat and Josh are deliriously happy despite their differences, though friends and family aren't convinced that they can last. With their first anniversary approaching and attractive alternatives in the mix, can they last?
fields.title: I Give It a Year

fields.plot: Comedic tale of company workers who hate their jobs and decide to rebel against their greedy boss.
fields.title: Office Space

fields.plot: Epic tale of three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of 1900s USA and how their lives are affected by nature, history, war, and love.
fields.title: Legends of the Fall

fields.plot: Three friends attempt to recapture their glory days by opening up a fraternity near their alma mater.
fields.title: Old School

fields.plot: A robotic assassin from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to eliminate a waitress, whose son will grow up and lead humanity in a war against machines.
fields.title: The Terminator

fields.plot: Harry ignores warnings not to return to Hogwarts, only to find the school plagued by a series of mysterious attacks and a strange voice haunting him.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

fields.plot: Set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

fields.plot: Tells the story of Benjamin Button, a man who starts aging backwards with bizarre consequences.
fields.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button

fields.plot: Gilbert has to care for his brother Arnie and his obese mother, which gets in the way when love walks into his life.

fields.plot: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.
fields.title: Hairspray

fields.plot: Archeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the US government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
fields.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

fields.plot: Batman & Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.
fields.title: Batman & Robin

fields.plot: A Princeton admissions officer who is up for a major promotion takes a professional risk after she meets a college-bound alternative school kid who just might be the son she gave up years ago in a secret adoption.
fields.title: Admission

fields.plot: A young man blocks out harmful memories of significant events of his life. As he grows up, he finds a way to remember these lost memories and a supernatural way to alter his life.

fields.plot: Katniss Everdeen reluctantly becomes the symbol of a mass rebellion against the autocratic Capitol.

fields.plot: A pair of aging stickup men try to get the old gang back together for one last hurrah before one of the guys takes his last assignment - to kill his comrade.

fields.plot: An idealistic staffer for a new presidential candidate gets a crash course on dirty politics during his stint on the campaign trail.
