fields.plot: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.
fields.title: Hanna

fields.plot: A mountain climber becomes trapped under a boulder while canyoneering alone near Moab, Utah and resorts to desperate measures in order to survive.
fields.title: 127 Hours

fields.plot: Five friends travel to a cabin in the woods, where they unknowingly release flesh-possessing demons.
fields.title: The Evil Dead

fields.plot: After an acrimonious break up, the Mystery Inc. gang are individually brought to an island resort to investigate strange goings on.
fields.title: Scooby-Doo

fields.plot: A naive young woman comes to New York and scores a job as the assistant to one of the city's biggest magazine editors, the ruthless and cynical Miranda Priestly.

fields.plot: Humanity finds a mysterious, obviously artificial, object buried beneath the Lunar surface and, with the intelligent computer H.A.L. 9000, sets off on a quest.
fields.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey

fields.plot: The story of King George VI of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, his impromptu ascension to the throne and the speech therapist who helped the unsure monarch become worthy of it.

fields.plot: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her Visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

fields.plot: With a childhood tragedy that overshadowed their lives, three men are reunited by circumstance when one loses a daughter.

fields.plot: Forced to play a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse in the chaos of war, an elite Army bomb squad unit must come together in a city where everyone is a potential enemy and every object could be a deadly bomb.

fields.plot: A test pilot is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe.

fields.plot: The story follows the adventures of Aang, a young successor to a long line of Avatars, who must put his childhood ways aside and stop the Fire Nation from enslaving the Water, Earth and Air nations.

fields.plot: Three unemployed parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

fields.plot: Intertwining couples and singles in Los Angeles break-up and make-up based on the pressures and expectations of Valentine's Day.

fields.plot: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

fields.plot: Belle, whose father is imprisoned by the Beast, offers herself instead and discovers her captor to be an enchanted prince.

fields.title: Moon

fields.plot: A team of commandos, on a mission in a Central American jungle, find themselves hunted by an extra-terrestrial warrior.
fields.title: Predator

fields.plot: In the Valley of Peace, Po the Panda finds himself chosen as the Dragon Warrior despite the fact that he is obese and a complete novice at martial arts.

fields.plot: The portrait of a 17 year-old girl, in 4 seasons and 4 songs.
fields.title: Jeune & jolie

fields.plot: A listless and alienated teenager decides to help his new friend win the class presidency in their small western high school, while he must deal with his bizarre family life back home.

fields.title: A Walk to Remember

fields.plot: Master sorcerer Balthazar Blake must find and train Merlin's descendant to defeat dark sorceress Morgana le Fey.
fields.title: The Sorcerer's Apprentice

fields.plot: A sequel to the 2012 musical comedy.
fields.title: Pitch Perfect 2

fields.plot: A wannabe rock star in need of cash poses as a substitute teacher at a prep school, and tries to turn his class into a rock band.
fields.title: The School of Rock

fields.plot: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.
fields.title: Fargo

fields.plot: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.
fields.title: The Paperboy

fields.plot: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks in London, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguises herself as him, and proceeds to fall for one of her soccer teammates. Little does she realize she's not the only one with romantic troubles, as she, as he, gets in the middle of a series of intermingled love affairs.
fields.title: She's the Man

fields.plot: The notorious monster hunter is sent to Transylvania to stop Count Dracula who is using Dr. Frankenstein's research and a werewolf for some sinister purpose.

fields.plot: Hannibal returns to America and attempts to make contact with disgraced Agent Starling and survive a vengeful victim's plan.
fields.title: Hannibal

fields.plot: An American serving in the French Foreign Legion on an archaeological dig at the ancient city of Hamunaptra accidentally awakens a Mummy.
fields.title: The Mummy

fields.plot: In the dreams of his victims, a spectral child murderer stalks the children of the members of the lynch mob that killed him.
fields.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street

fields.plot: A young man, falsely imprisoned by his jealous
escapes and uses a hidden treasure to exact his revenge
fields.title: The Count of Monte Cristo

fields.plot: An insurance salesman/adjuster discovers his entire life is actually a TV show.
fields.title: The Truman Show

fields.plot: A young drifter, named Nomi, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.
fields.title: Showgirls

fields.plot: Back in Kansas, Dorothy Gale decides to return to Oz in order to help her friends.
fields.title: Legends of Oz: Dorothy's Return

fields.plot: After surviving a plane crash a young conservative woman suffers a crisis of faith.
fields.title: Paradise

fields.plot: Ethan Hunt comes face to face with a dangerous and sadistic arms dealer while trying to keep his identity secret in order to protect his girlfriend.
fields.title: Mission: Impossible III

fields.plot: Dumped by his girlfriend, a high school grad decides to embark on an overseas adventure in Europe with his friends.
fields.title: EuroTrip

fields.plot: Feature film adaptation of the TV series, 'Veronica Mars'.
fields.title: Veronica Mars

fields.plot: A film detailing the final hours and crucifixion of Jesus Christ.
fields.title: The Passion of the Christ

fields.plot: After being betrayed and left for dead in Italy, Charlie Croker and his team plan an elaborate gold heist against their former ally.
fields.title: The Italian Job

fields.plot: The heroic story of a dictator who risks his life to ensure that democracy would never come to the country he so lovingly oppressed.
fields.title: The Dictator

fields.plot: To protect his brother-in-law from a drug lord, a former smuggler heads to Panama to score millions of dollars in counterfeit bills.

fields.title: Pearl Harbor

fields.title: Winter's Bone

fields.plot: Two Los Angeles homicide detectives are dispatched to a northern town where the sun doesn't set to investigate the methodical murder of a local teen.
fields.title: Insomnia

fields.plot: A research team is sent to the Jurassic Park Site B island to study the dinosaurs there while another team approaches with another agenda.

fields.title: Child's Play

fields.plot: A Mumbai teen who grew up in the slums, becomes a contestant on the Indian version of
He is arrested under suspicion of cheating, and while being interrogated, events from his life history are shown which explain why he knows the answers.
fields.title: Slumdog Millionaire

fields.plot: Perseus braves the treacherous underworld to rescue his father, Zeus, captured by his son, Ares, and brother Hades who unleash the ancient Titans upon the world.
fields.title: Wrath of the Titans

fields.plot: A family's home is haunted by a host of ghosts.
fields.title: Poltergeist

fields.plot: In New York City, a young girl is caught in the middle of her parents' bitter custody battle.
fields.title: What Maisie Knew

fields.plot: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.
fields.title: Safe House

fields.title: The Expatriate

fields.plot: An epic fantasy/adventure based on the popular video game series.
fields.title: Warcraft

fields.plot: An evil queen steals control of a kingdom and an exiled princess enlists the help of seven resourceful rebels to win back her birthright.
fields.title: Mirror Mirror

fields.plot: Three interlocking love stories involving three couples in three cities: Rome, Paris, and New York.
fields.title: Third Person

fields.plot: A handyman/martial arts master agrees to teach a bullied boy karate and shows him that there is more to the martial art than fighting.

The members of the sorority - who also have got to be the seven most socially clueless women on the planet - are about to lose their house. They need a dose of what only the eternally bubbly Shelley can provide... but they will each learn on their own to stop pretending to be what others want them to be and start being themselves.

fields.plot: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.
fields.title: Chocolat

fields.plot: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.
fields.title: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter

fields.plot: At his new high school, a rebellious teen is lured into an underground fight club, where he finds a mentor in a mixed martial arts veteran.

In the colorful future, a cab driver unwittingly becomes the central figure in the search for a legendary cosmic weapon to keep Evil and Mr Zorg at bay.
fields.title: The Fifth Element

fields.plot: The lives of several couples and singles in New York intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.
fields.title: New Year's Eve

fields.plot: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.
fields.title: Wanderlust

fields.plot: Anna Fitzgerald looks to earn medical emancipation from her parents who until now have relied on their youngest child to help their leukemia-stricken daughter Kate remain alive.
fields.title: My Sister's Keeper

fields.plot: After rescuing Han Solo from the palace of Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels attempt to destroy the Second Death Star, while Luke Skywalker tries to bring his father back to the Light Side of the Force.
fields.title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi

fields.plot: A flight attendant becomes a key figure in a plot between the police and an arms dealer.
fields.title: Jackie Brown

fields.plot: Ten years have passed, and Sidney Prescott, who has put herself back together thanks in part to her writing, is visited by the Ghostface Killer.
fields.title: Scream 4

fields.plot: A young man and woman meet on a train in Europe, and wind up spending one romantic evening together in Vienna. Unfortunately, both know that this will probably be their only night together.
fields.title: Before Sunrise

fields.plot: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save wife Holly Gennaro and several others, taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.
fields.title: Die Hard

fields.plot: A CIA agent goes on the run after a defector accuses her of being a Russian spy.
fields.title: Salt

fields.plot: A young boy becomes a man as he embarks on a quest to become a knight.
fields.title: Justin and the Knights of Valour

fields.plot: A preteen's life is changed after befriending the new girl at school.
fields.title: Bridge to Terabithia

fields.plot: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.
fields.title: Tarzan

fields.plot: Danny Ocean rounds up the boys for a third heist, after casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses one of the original eleven, Reuben Tishkoff.
fields.title: Ocean's Thirteen

fields.plot: Stunt motorcyclist Johnny Blaze gives up his soul to become a hellblazing vigilante, to fight against power hungry Blackheart, the son of the devil himself.
fields.title: Ghost Rider

fields.plot: A humble orphan suddenly becomes a gentleman with the help of an unknown benefactor.
fields.title: Great Expectations

fields.plot: A chronicle of country music legend Johnny Cash's life, from his early days on an Arkansas cotton farm to his rise to fame with Sun Records in Memphis, where he recorded alongside Elvis Presley, Jerry Lee Lewis and Carl Perkins.

fields.plot: Identical twins, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.
fields.title: The Parent Trap

fields.plot: The vampire comes to England to seduce a visitor's fiancée and inflict havoc in the foreign land.
fields.title: Dracula

fields.plot: A manipulative Southern belle carries on a turbulent affair with a blockade runner during the American Civil War.
fields.title: Gone with the Wind

fields.plot: A teenager with teleportation abilities must suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.
fields.title: Jumper

fields.plot: A priest disobeys church law to track down the vampires who kidnapped his niece.
fields.title: Priest

fields.plot: The story of George Jung, the man who established the American cocaine market in the 1970s.
fields.title: Blow

fields.plot: Based on the story of Vince Papale, a 30-year-old bartender from South Philadelphia who overcame long odds to play for the NFL's Philadelphia Eagles in 1976.
fields.title: Invincible

fields.plot: Sam Witwicky leaves the Autobots behind for a normal life. But when his mind is filled with cryptic symbols, the Decepticons target him and he is dragged back into the Transformers' war.

fields.plot: A man wrongly convicted of conspiracy to commit espionage against the U.S. is offered his freedom if he can rescue the president's daughter from an outer space prison taken over by violent inmates.
fields.title: Lockout

fields.plot: The Quileutes close in on expecting parents Edward and Bella, whose unborn child poses a threat to the Wolf Pack and the towns people of Forks.
fields.title: The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn - Part 1

fields.plot: An affable underachiever finds out he's fathered 533 children through anonymous donations to a fertility clinic 20 years ago. Now he must decide whether or not to come forward when 142 of them file a lawsuit to reveal his identity.
fields.title: Delivery Man

fields.plot: One year after meeting, Tom proposes to his girlfriend, Violet, but unexpected events keep tripping them up as they look to walk down the aisle together.
fields.title: The Five-Year Engagement

fields.plot: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.
fields.title: The Sound of Music

fields.plot: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building.
fields.title: Breakfast at Tiffany's

fields.plot: A bored married couple is surprised to learn that they are both assassins hired by competing agencies to kill each other.
fields.title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith

fields.plot: Malcolm and Kisha move into their dream home, but soon learn a demon also resides there. When Kisha becomes possessed, Malcolm - determined to keep his sex life on track - turns to a priest, a psychic, and a team of ghost-busters for help.
fields.title: A Haunted House

fields.plot: The warrior Beowulf must fight and defeat the monster Grendel who is terrorizing towns, and later, Grendel's mother, who begins killing out of revenge.
fields.title: Beowulf

fields.plot: In London, a real-estate scam puts millions of pounds up for grabs, attracting some of the city's scrappiest tough guys and its more established underworld types, all of whom are looking to get rich quick. While the city's seasoned criminals vie for the cash, an unexpected player -- a drugged out rock 'n' roller presumed to be dead but very much alive -- has a multi-million dollar prize fall into his hands.
fields.title: RocknRolla

fields.plot: Ex-criminal Jacob Sternwood is forced to return to London when his son is involved in a heist gone wrong. This gives his nemesis, detective Max Lewinsky, one last chance to catch the man he's always been after.
fields.title: Welcome to the Punch

fields.plot: A group of young adults discover a boarded up Camp Crystal Lake, where they soon encounter Jason Voorhees and his deadly intentions.
fields.title: Friday the 13th

fields.plot: A former thief frantically searches for his missing daughter, who has been kidnapped and locked in the trunk of a taxi.
fields.title: Stolen

fields.plot: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9-year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she claims to be.
fields.title: Orphan

fields.plot: A writer at the peak of his literary success discovers the steep price he must pay for stealing another man's work.
fields.title: The Words

fields.plot: Martine offers Terry a lead on a foolproof bank hit on London's Baker Street. She targets a roomful of safe deposit boxes worth millions in cash and jewelry. But Terry and his crew don't realize the boxes also contain a treasure trove of dirty secrets - secrets that will thrust them into a deadly web of corruption and illicit scandal.
fields.title: The Bank Job

fields.plot: Selene, a beautiful vampire warrior, is entrenched in a war between the vampire and werewolf races. Although she is aligned with the vampires, she falls in love with Michael, a werewolf who longs for the war to end.

fields.plot: A lazy, incompetent middle school teacher who hates her job and her students is forced to return to her job to make enough money for a boob job after her rich fiancé dumps her.
fields.title: Bad Teacher

fields.plot: MIT professor John Koestler links a mysterious list of numbers from a time capsule to past and future disasters and sets out to prevent the ultimate catastrophe.
fields.title: Knowing

fields.plot: An English teacher's life is disrupted when a former student returns to her small town after failing as a playwright in New York.
fields.title: The English Teacher

fields.plot: 15-year-old Sarah accidentally wishes her baby half-brother, Toby, away to the Goblin King Jareth who will keep Toby if Sarah does not complete his Labyrinth in 13 hours.
fields.title: Labyrinth

fields.plot: A streetwise NYPD detective joins a secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth.
fields.title: Men in Black

fields.plot: When The Hood finds and invades International Rescue's secret base and traps most of the Tracy family, only young Alan Tracy and his friends can save the day.

fields.plot: Two girlfriends on a summer holiday in Spain become enamored with the same painter, unaware that his ex-wife, with whom he has a tempestuous relationship, is about to re-enter the picture.

fields.title: Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted

fields.plot: In the distant future, a small waste collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.
fields.title: WALL·E

fields.plot: As Harry Potter begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as
and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's dark past.
fields.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince

fields.plot: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.
fields.title: Footloose

fields.title: Dogma

fields.title: Jumanji

fields.title: Forgetting Sarah Marshall

fields.title: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events

fields.title: Batman Forever

fields.plot: The plot is unknown.

fields.plot: A highly advanced robotic boy longs to become
so that he can regain the love of his human mother.

Houseman falls in love with the camp's dance instructor Johnny Castle.
fields.title: Dirty Dancing

fields.plot: A modern-day take on the
tale where a New York teen is transformed into a hideous monster in order to find true love.

But when Mr. Magorium, the 243 year-old eccentric who owns the store, bequeaths the store to her, a dark and ominous change begins to take over the once remarkable Emporium.

fields.plot: A man who escapes from the vicious grips of the serial killer known as
is blackmailed to rescue an innocent girl from the killer's booby-trapped warehouse.

fields.plot: Desperate to help her ailing brother, a young woman unknowingly agrees to compete in a deadly game of
hosted by a sadistic aristocrat.
fields.title: Would You Rather

fields.title: The Raven

fields.title: The Aviator

fields.plot: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

fields.plot: A pair of crew members aboard a spaceship wake up with no knowledge of their mission or their identities.

A man with a fateful secret embarks on an extraordinary journey of redemption by forever changing the lives of seven strangers.

cars to execute his murderous plans.

fields.title: Madagascar

fields.plot: A Victorian surgeon rescues a heavily disfigured man who is mistreated while scraping a living as a side-show freak. Behind his monstrous facade, there is revealed a person of intelligence and sensitivity.
fields.title: The Elephant Man

fields.plot: While settling his recently deceased father's estate, a salesman discovers he has a sister whom he never knew about, leading both siblings to re-examine their perceptions about family and life choices.
fields.title: People Like Us

fields.plot: A magic nanny comes to work for a cold banker's unhappy family.
fields.title: Mary Poppins

fields.plot: In 1933 New York, an overly ambitious movie producer coerces his cast and hired ship crew to travel to mysterious Skull Island, where they encounter Kong, a giant ape who is immediately smitten with leading lady Ann Darrow.
fields.title: King Kong

fields.plot: A retired master car thief must come back to the industry and steal 50 cars with his crew in one night to save his brother's life.
fields.title: Gone in Sixty Seconds

fields.plot: Bound by a shared destiny, a teen bursting with scientific curiosity and a former boy-genius inventor embark on a mission to unearth the secrets of a place somewhere in time and space that exists in their collective memory.
fields.title: Tomorrowland

fields.plot: It's nine years after Jesse and Celine first met; now, they encounter one another on the French leg of Jesse's book tour.
fields.title: Before Sunset

fields.plot: Based on H.G. Bissinger's book, which profiled the economically depressed town of Odessa, Texas and their heroic high school football team, The Permian High Panthers.
fields.title: Friday Night Lights

fields.plot: J. Edgar Hoover, powerful head of the FBI for nearly 50 years, looks back on his professional and personal life.
fields.title: J. Edgar

fields.plot: Set during World War II, a story seen through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a concentration camp, whose forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.
fields.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas

fields.plot: To win back his ex-girlfriend, a conservative accountant enlists the help of an exotic dancer to guide him on a quest for sexual experience, leading him into a world of strip clubs, sensual massage parlors, cross-dressing and S & M.
fields.title: My Awkward Sexual Adventure

fields.plot: A family living on a farm finds mysterious crop circles in their fields which suggests something more frightening to come.
fields.title: Signs

fields.plot: Four friends take off on an 1800 mile road trip to retrieve an illicit tape mistakenly mailed to a girl friend.
fields.title: Road Trip

fields.plot: While helping his latest client woo the fine lady of his dreams, a professional
finds that his game doesn't quite work on the gossip columnist with whom he's smitten.
fields.title: Hitch

fields.plot: A young man comforts his older brother's wife and children after he goes missing in Afghanistan.
fields.title: Brothers

fields.plot: A naive young tourist's road trip across Chile with friends turns into a waking nightmare.
fields.title: Magic Magic

fields.plot: In 13th century England, Robin and his band of marauders confront corruption in a local village and lead an uprising against the crown that will forever alter the balance of world power.
fields.title: Robin Hood

fields.plot: A fairy tale set in Jazz Age-era New Orleans and centered on a young woman named Tiana and her fateful kiss with a frog prince who desperately wants to be human again.
fields.title: The Princess and the Frog

fields.plot: A group of Iraq War veterans looks to clear their name with the U.S. military, who suspect the four men of committing a crime for which they were framed.
fields.title: The A-Team

fields.plot: Jean-Baptiste Grenouille, born with a superior olfactory sense, creates the world's finest perfume. His work, however, takes a dark turn as he searches for the ultimate scent.
fields.title: Perfume: The Story of a Murderer

fields.plot: Legendary explorer Thor Heyerdal's epic 4,300-mile crossing of the Pacific on a balsawood raft in 1947, in an effort prove that it was possible for South Americans to settle in Polynesia in pre-Columbian times.
fields.title: Kon-Tiki

fields.plot: After a long visit to the lost remains of the planet Krypton, the Man of Steel returns to Earth to become the people's savior once again and reclaim the love of Lois Lane.
fields.title: Superman Returns

fields.plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.
fields.title: Blood Diamond

fields.plot: Hoping to alter the events of the past, a 19th century inventor instead travels 800,000 years into the future, where he finds humankind divided into two warring races.
fields.title: The Time Machine

fields.plot: An aspiring writer is repeatedly gang-raped, humiliated, and left for dead by four men whom she systematically hunts down to seek revenge.
fields.title: Day of the Woman

fields.plot: A group of thieves break into a chamber expecting to find paintings, but instead they release the count himself, who travels to New Orleans to find his nemesis' daughter, Mary Van Helsing.
fields.title: Dracula 2000

fields.plot: A killer known as Ghostface begins killing off teenagers, and as the body count begins rising, one girl and her friends find themselves contemplating the
of horror films as they find themselves living in a real-life one.
fields.title: Scream

fields.plot: A man blinded by toxic waste which also enhanced his remaining senses fights crime as an acrobatic martial arts superhero.
fields.title: Daredevil

fields.plot: A year after disposing the body of a man they accidently killed, a group of dumb teenagers are stalked by a bumbling serial killer.
fields.title: Scary Movie

fields.plot: When a boy prays for a chance to have a family if the California Angels win the pennant, angels are assigned to make that possible.
fields.title: Angels in the Outfield

fields.plot: A thirteen-year-old girl's relationship with her mother is put to the test as she discovers drugs, sex, and petty crime in the company of her cool but troubled best friend.
fields.title: Thirteen

fields.plot: The lives of two lovelorn spouses from separate marriages, a registered sex offender, and a disgraced ex-police officer intersect as they struggle to resist their vulnerabilities and temptations.
fields.title: Little Children

fields.plot: A nerdy outcast secretly pays the most popular girl in school one thousand dollars to be his girlfriend.
fields.title: Can't Buy Me Love

fields.plot: Meet, Prem, and Amar look to have a blast at their college reunion, though they soon find themselves in another predicament.
fields.title: Grand Masti

fields.plot: Recent college graduate Benjamin Braddock is trapped into an affair with Mrs. Robinson, who happens to be the wife of his father's business partner and then finds himself falling in love with her daughter, Elaine.
fields.title: The Graduate

fields.plot: A family is terrorized by demonic forces after moving into a home that was the site of a grisly mass-murder.
fields.title: The Amityville Horror

fields.plot: A wheelchair bound photographer spies on his neighbours from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
fields.title: Rear Window

fields.plot: Four teens are tricked by their professor into visiting a haunted house for a school project.
fields.title: Scary Movie 2

fields.plot: A salesman for a natural gas company experiences life-changing events after arriving in a small town, where his corporation wants to tap into the available resources.
fields.title: Promised Land

fields.plot: As a string of mysterious killings grips Seattle, Bella, whose high school graduation is fast approaching, is forced to choose between her love for vampire Edward and her friendship with werewolf Jacob.
fields.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse

fields.plot: An adventurous girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.
fields.title: Coraline

fields.plot: A sendup of all the teen movies that have accumulated in the past two decades.
fields.title: Not Another Teen Movie

fields.plot: Set in Middle America, a group of teens receive an online invitation for sex, though they soon encounter fundamentalists with a much more sinister agenda.
fields.title: Red State

fields.plot: A drama with fairy tale elements, where an orphaned musical prodigy uses his gift as a clue to finding his birth parents.
fields.title: August Rush

fields.plot: A young lawyer travels to a remote village where he discovers the vengeful ghost of a scorned woman is terrorizing the locals.
fields.title: The Woman in Black

fields.plot: When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.
fields.title: Batman Returns

fields.plot: An S.W.A.T. team becomes trapped in a tenement run by a ruthless mobster and his army of killers and thugs.
fields.title: Serbuan maut

fields.plot: A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.
fields.title: Panic Room

fields.plot: A mild-mannered chemist and an ex-con must lead the counterstrike when a rogue group of military men, led by a renegade general, threaten a nerve gas attack from Alcatraz against San Francisco.
fields.title: The Rock

fields.plot: The incredible story of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, told by his peer and secret rival Antonio Salieri - now confined to an insane asylum.
fields.title: Amadeus

fields.plot: A Group of friends, just out of college, struggle with adulthood. Their main problem is that they're all self-centered and obnoxious.
fields.title: St. Elmo's Fire

fields.plot: A group of misfits enter a Las Vegas dodgeball tournament in order to save their cherished local gym from the onslaught of a corporate health fitness chain.
fields.title: Dodgeball: A True Underdog Story

fields.plot: A divorcing couple tries to maintain their friendship while they both pursue other people.
fields.title: Celeste & Jesse Forever

fields.plot: A lawyer takes on a negligent homicide case involving a priest who performed an exorcism on a young girl.
fields.title: The Exorcism of Emily Rose

fields.plot: When human forces discover the existence of the Vampire and Lycan clans, a war to eradicate both species commences. The vampire warrioress Selene leads the battle against humankind.
fields.title: Underworld: Awakening

fields.plot: A former valedictorian quits her reporter job in New York and returns to the place she last felt happy: her childhood home in Connecticut. She gets work as a lifeguard and starts a dangerous relationship with a troubled teenager.
fields.title: The Lifeguard

fields.plot: King Arthur and his knights embark on a low-budget search for the Grail, encountering many very silly obstacles.
fields.title: Monty Python and the Holy Grail

fields.plot: At a turning point in his life, a former tennis pro falls for a femme-fatal type who happens to be dating his friend and soon-to-be brother-in-law.
fields.title: Match Point

fields.plot: Two sisters contend for the affection of King Henry VIII.
fields.title: The Other Boleyn Girl

fields.plot: The most popular kid on campus meets a beautiful journalist who makes him realize that maybe he's afraid to graduate.
fields.title: Van Wilder

fields.plot: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.
fields.title: Mononoke-hime

fields.plot: Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage.
fields.title: Cars 2

fields.plot: A tough, street-smart private eye is hired by the FBI to go undercover in a college sorority.
fields.title: So Undercover

fields.plot: Brian O'Conner and childhood friend Roman Pearce are re-united by the FBI to bring down a Miami drug exporter in exchange for clear records.
fields.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious

fields.plot: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their father into their family life.
fields.title: The Kids Are All Right

fields.plot: A young American studying in Paris in 1968 strikes up a friendship with a French brother and sister. Set against the background of the '68 Paris student riots.
fields.title: The Dreamers

fields.plot: A mousy governess who softens the heart of her employer soon discovers that he's hiding a terrible secret.
fields.title: Jane Eyre

fields.plot: Decades-old found footage from NASA's abandoned Apollo 18 mission, where two American astronauts were sent on a secret expedition, reveals the reason the U.S. has never returned to the moon.
fields.title: Apollo 18

fields.plot: Based on writer Susanna Kaysen's account of her 18-month stay at a mental hospital in the 1960s.
fields.title: Girl, Interrupted

fields.plot: A black ops super soldier seeks payback after she is betrayed and set up during a mission.
fields.title: Haywire

fields.plot: A wealthy San Francisco socialite pursues a potential boyfriend to a small Northern California town that slowly takes a turn for the bizarre when birds of all kinds suddenly begin to attack people there in increasing numbers and with increasing viciousness.
fields.title: The Birds

fields.plot: A 1960s hipster secret agent is brought out of cryofreeze to oppose his greatest enemy in the 1990s, where his social attitudes are glaringly out of place.
fields.title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery

fields.plot: A former sports star who's fallen on hard times starts coaching his son's soccer team as a way to get his life together. His attempts to become an adult are met with challenges from the attractive soccer moms who pursue him at every turn.
fields.title: Playing for Keeps

fields.plot: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation during World War II.
fields.title: Empire of the Sun

fields.plot: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.
fields.title: La piel que habito

fields.plot: Set in a medieval village that is haunted by a werewolf, a young girl falls for an orphaned woodcutter, much to her family's displeasure.
fields.title: Red Riding Hood

fields.plot: Based on the 1930 classic by Faulkner, it is the story of the death of Addie Bundren and her family's quest to honor her wish to be buried in the nearby town of Jefferson.
fields.title: As I Lay Dying

fields.plot: A romantic comedy centered on a gentile who pretends to be Jewish in order to win the affection of his love interest.
fields.title: Jewtopia

fields.plot: A 20-something supervising staff member of a foster care facility navigates the troubled waters of that world alongside her co-worker and longtime boyfriend.
fields.title: Short Term 12

fields.plot: A misunderstood boy takes on ghosts, zombies and grown-ups to save his town from a centuries-old curse.
fields.title: ParaNorman

fields.plot: A computer hacker's goal to discover the reason for human existence continually finds his work interrupted thanks to the Management; this time, they send a teenager and lusty love interest to distract him.
fields.title: The Zero Theorem

fields.plot: Bachelor and all round slob, Buck, babysits his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her cute younger brother and sister.
fields.title: Uncle Buck

fields.plot: A mad scientist kidnaps and mutilates a trio of tourists in order to reassemble them into a new
-- a human centipede, created by stitching their mouths to each others' rectums.
fields.title: The Human Centipede (First Sequence)

fields.plot: After an Alaskan town is plunged into darkness for a month, it is attacked by a bloodthirsty gang of vampires.
fields.title: 30 Days of Night

fields.plot: As inventor Andy Brewster is about to embark on the road trip of a lifetime, a quick stop at his mom's house turns into an unexpected cross-country voyage with her along for the ride.
fields.title: The Guilt Trip

fields.plot: A murder inside the Louvre and clues in Da Vinci paintings lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years -- which could shake the foundations of Christianity.
fields.title: The Da Vinci Code

fields.plot: A bartender is captured by a large corporation and sent into a machine named the Animus to relive the memories of his ancestors -- Most of whom are Assassins -- to retrieve powerful and dangerous artifacts.
fields.title: Assassin's Creed

fields.plot: A childless couple bury a box in their backyard, containing all of their wishes for an infant. Soon, a child is born, though Timothy Green is not all that he appears.
fields.title: The Odd Life of Timothy Green

fields.plot: Aspiring songwriter Violet Sanford, after getting a job at a women-run NYC bar that teases its male patrons, comes out of her shell.
fields.title: Coyote Ugly

fields.plot: With the help of three fans, The Muppets must reunite to save their old theater from a greedy oil tycoon.
fields.title: The Muppets

fields.plot: In the year 2035 a techno-phobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.
fields.title: I, Robot

fields.plot: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.
fields.title: Monster

fields.plot: The relationships of two couples become complicated and deceitful when the man from one couple meets the woman of the other.
fields.title: Closer

fields.plot: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.
fields.title: Shichinin no samurai

fields.plot: An in-depth examination of the way that the Vietnam war affects the lives of people in a small industrial town in the USA.
fields.title: The Deer Hunter

fields.plot: #1 NASCAR driver Ricky Bobby stays atop the heap thanks to a pact with his best friend and teammate, Cal Naughton, Jr. But when a French Formula One driver, makes his way up the ladder, Ricky Bobby's talent and devotion are put to the test.
fields.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby

fields.plot: Follows the key people at an investment bank, over a 24-hour period, during the early stages of the financial crisis.
fields.title: Margin Call

fields.plot: Bruce Banner, a genetics researcher with a tragic past, suffers an accident that causes him to transform into a raging green monster when he gets angry.
fields.title: Hulk

fields.plot: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family takes to the road to escape a vengeful police force which isn't afraid of being as ruthless as their target.
fields.title: The Devil's Rejects

fields.plot: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.
fields.title: Natural Born Killers

fields.plot: A freak storm unleashes a species of bloodthirsty creatures on a small town, where a small band of citizens hole up in a supermarket and fight for their lives.
fields.title: The Mist

fields.plot: A gang of ruthless highway killers kidnap a wealthy couple traveling cross country only to shockingly discover that things are not what they seem.
fields.title: No One Lives

fields.plot: With an unmanned, half-mile-long freight train barreling toward a city, a veteran engineer and a young conductor race against the clock to prevent a catastrophe.
fields.title: Unstoppable

fields.plot: A newly wed man who believes he's just gotten hitched to the perfect woman encounters another lady on his honeymoon.
fields.title: The Heartbreak Kid

fields.plot: While trying to save their childhood orphanage, Moe, Larry, and Curly inadvertently stumble into a murder plot and wind up starring in a reality TV show.
fields.title: The Three Stooges

fields.plot: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.
fields.title: The Last of the Mohicans

fields.plot: Wealthy financier Nicholas Van Orton gets a strange birthday present from wayward brother Conrad: a live-action game that consumes his life.
fields.title: The Game

fields.plot: Rumpelstiltskin tricks a mid-life crisis burdened Shrek into allowing himself to be erased from existence and cast in a dark alternate timeline where Rumpel rules supreme.
fields.title: Shrek Forever After

fields.plot: A group of unwitting teens are stranded near a strange wax museum and soon must fight to survive and keep from becoming the next exhibit.
fields.title: House of Wax

fields.plot: Johnny English goes up against international assassins hunting down the Chinese premier.
fields.title: Johnny English Reborn

fields.plot: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally. Based on the Dennis Lehane novel.
fields.title: Gone Baby Gone

fields.plot: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his kids against prejudice.
fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird

fields.plot: A re-imagining of the horror icon Freddy Krueger, a serial-killer who wields a glove with four blades embedded in the fingers and kills people in their dreams, resulting in their real death in reality.
fields.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street

fields.plot: About a guy whose life didn't quite turn out how he wanted it to and wishes he could go back to high school and change it. He wakes up one day and is seventeen again and gets the chance to rewrite his life.
fields.title: 17 Again

fields.plot: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.
fields.title: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles

fields.plot: A romantic drama about a soldier who falls for a conservative college student while he's home on leave.
fields.title: Dear John

fields.plot: An Israeli Special Forces Soldier fakes his death so he can re-emerge in New York City as a hair stylist.
fields.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan

fields.plot: In the summer of 1987, a college graduate takes a 'nowhere' job at his local amusement park, only to find it's the perfect course to get him prepared for the real world.
fields.title: Adventureland

fields.plot: A Detroit defense attorney has a crisis of conscience when he represents a wealthy client who has a foolproof plan to beat the system.
fields.title: The Lincoln Lawyer

fields.plot: Tucker & Dale are on vacation at their dilapidated mountain cabin when they are attacked by a group of preppy college kids.
fields.title: Tucker and Dale vs Evil

fields.plot: When a young woman realizes her brother is about to marry the girl who bullied her in high school, she sets out to expose the fiancée's true colors.
fields.title: You Again

fields.plot: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.
fields.title: Rango

fields.plot: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.'s Greek Theater.
fields.title: Get Him to the Greek

fields.plot: Big budget remake of the classic cartoon about a creature intent on stealing Christmas.
fields.title: How the Grinch Stole Christmas

fields.plot: A wrongfully convicted boy is sent to a brutal desert detention camp where he joins the job of digging holes for some mysterious reason.
fields.title: Holes

fields.plot: After moving into a suburban home, a couple becomes increasingly disturbed by a nightly demonic presence.
fields.title: Paranormal Activity

fields.plot: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high school guidance counselor, when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.
fields.title: Wild Things

fields.plot: An elite team of Navy SEALs embark on a covert mission to recover a kidnapped CIA agent.
fields.title: Act of Valor

fields.plot: In a future where a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes, an officer from that unit is himself accused of a future murder.
fields.title: Minority Report

fields.plot: Frank Martin puts the driving gloves on to deliver Valentina, the kidnapped daughter of a Ukranian government official, from Marseilles to Odessa on the Black Sea. En route, he has to contend with thugs who want to intercept Valentina's safe delivery and not let his personal feelings get in the way of his dangerous objective.
fields.title: Transporter 3

fields.plot: A victim from World War II's
sets out to find those responsible for his torture. A true story.
fields.title: The Railway Man

fields.plot: A fireman takes an unexpected course of action when a man whom he's been ordered to testify against, after being held up at a local convenience store, threatens him.
fields.title: Fire with Fire

fields.plot: Alexander, the King of Macedonia and one of the greatest military leaders in the history of warfare, conquers much of the known world.
fields.title: Alexander

fields.plot: A delusional young guy strikes up an unconventional relationship with a doll he finds on the Internet.
fields.title: Lars and the Real Girl

fields.plot: A strange, horrible and unprecedented crisis begins in Central Park. A high school science teacher, his wife and a young girl do what they can to survive it.
fields.title: The Happening

fields.plot: A bachelor is haunted by the ghosts of his past girlfriends at his younger brother's wedding.
fields.title: Ghosts of Girlfriends Past

fields.plot: When a sports agent has a moral epiphany and is fired for expressing it, he decides to put his new philosophy to the test as an independent with the only athlete who stays with him.
fields.title: Jerry Maguire

fields.plot: Put in charge of his young son, Alain leaves Belgium for Antibes to live with his sister and her husband as a family. Alain's bond with Stephanie, a killer whale trainer, grows deeper after Stephanie suffers a horrible accident.
fields.title: De rouille et d'os

fields.plot: A nine-year-old amateur inventor, Francophile, and pacifist searches New York City for the lock that matches a mysterious key left behind by his father, who died in the World Trade Center on September 11, 2001.
fields.title: Extremely Loud & Incredibly Close

fields.plot: A group of elite warriors are hunted by members of a merciless alien race known as Predators.
fields.title: Predators

fields.plot: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rainstorm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.
fields.title: Identity

fields.plot: St Trinian's, a school for
with its anarchic doctrine of free expression, brings together a motley crew of ungovernable girls who, using their wit and ingenuity, save the school from bankruptcy.
fields.title: St. Trinian's

fields.plot: In Thailand, John Rambo joins a group of mercenaries to venture into war-torn Burma, and rescue a group of Christian aid workers who were kidnapped by the ruthless local infantry unit.
fields.title: Rambo

fields.plot: Lucy and Edmund Pevensie return to Narnia with their cousin Eustace where they meet up with Prince Caspian for a trip across the sea aboard the royal ship The Dawn Treader. Along the way they encounter dragons, dwarves, merfolk, and a band of lost warriors before reaching the edge of the world.
fields.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader

fields.plot: A mysterious preacher protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.
fields.title: Pale Rider

fields.plot: A lazy law school grad adopts a kid to impress his girlfriend, but everything doesn't go as planned and he becomes the unlikely foster father.
fields.title: Big Daddy

fields.plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.
fields.title: The Blues Brothers

fields.plot: Six tourists hire an extreme tour guide who takes them to the abandoned city Pripyat, the former home to the workers of the Chernobyl nuclear reactor. During their exploration, they soon discover they are not alone.
fields.title: Chernobyl Diaries

fields.plot: An enterprising Saudi girl signs on for her school's Koran recitation competition as a way to raise the remaining funds she needs in order to buy the green bicycle that has captured her interest.
fields.title: Wadjda

fields.plot: A female forensic psychiatrist discovers that all of one of her patient's multiple personalities are murder victims. She will have to find out what's happening before her time is finished.
fields.title: Shelter

fields.plot: A 13 year old girl plays a game on her 13th birthday and wakes up the next day as a 30 year old woman.
fields.title: 13 Going on 30

fields.plot: Based on Nick Hornby's best-selling novel, About A Boy is the story of a cynical, immature young man who is taught how to act like a grown-up by a little boy
fields.title: About a Boy

fields.plot: Into the world of the Emperor Penguins, who find their soul mates through song, a penguin is born who cannot sing. But he can tap dance something fierce!
fields.title: Happy Feet

fields.plot: A famous novelist is
from a car crash by an obsessed fan.
fields.title: Misery

fields.plot: A grieving couple retreat to their cabin in the woods, hoping to repair their broken hearts and troubled marriage. But nature takes its course and things go from bad to worse.
fields.title: Antichrist

fields.plot: As Johnny Blaze hides out in Eastern Europe, he is called upon to stop the devil, who is trying to take human form.
fields.title: Ghost Rider: Spirit of Vengeance

fields.plot: In a universe where humans are near the bottom of the evolutionary ladder, a young destitute human woman is targeted for assassination by the Queen of the Universe because her very existence threatens to end the Queen's reign.
fields.title: Jupiter Ascending

fields.plot: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.
fields.title: Blade

fields.plot: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.
fields.title: American Graffiti

fields.plot: A murder mystery brings together a private eye, a struggling actress, and a thief masquerading as an actor.
fields.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang

fields.plot: Bruce Willis plays a Special-Ops commander who leads his team into the jungle of Nigeria to rescue a doctor played by Monica Belluci who will only go with them if they agree to rescue 70 refugees too.
fields.title: Tears of the Sun

fields.plot: A suburban American family is being stalked by a group of psychotic people who live in the desert, far away from civilization.
fields.title: The Hills Have Eyes

fields.plot: A rebellious Malibu princess is shipped off to a strict English boarding school by her father.
fields.title: Wild Child

fields.plot: A group of strangers fight for the welfare of humanity.
fields.title: Legion

fields.plot: Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.
fields.title: Twister

fields.plot: When Dr. Henry Jones Sr. suddenly goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, eminent archaeologist Indiana Jones must follow in his father's footsteps and stop the Nazis.
fields.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade

fields.plot: Chuck (Brad Dourif) and Tiff (Jennifer Tilly) return, resurrected by their son (Billy Boyd), and hit Hollywood in the fifth film of the CHILD'S PLAY series.
fields.title: Seed of Chucky

fields.plot: Psychologist Margaret Matheson and her assistant study paranormal activity, which leads them to investigate a world-renowned psychic who has resurfaced years after his toughest critic mysteriously passed away.
fields.title: Red Lights

fields.plot: Routinely exploited by her wicked stepmother, the downtrodden Sam Montgomery is excited about the prospect of meeting her Internet beau at the school's Halloween dance.
fields.title: A Cinderella Story

fields.plot: After moving to a new town, two brothers are convinced that the area is frequented by vampires.
fields.title: The Lost Boys

fields.plot: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.
fields.title: Irréversible

fields.plot: When he finds out that his work superiors host a dinner celebrating the idiocy of their guests, a rising executive questions it when he's invited, just as he befriends a man who would be the perfect guest.
fields.title: Dinner for Schmucks

fields.plot: The story of an aging writer who bitterly recollects his passionate, lost youth. A portrait of today's Rome.
fields.title: La grande bellezza

fields.plot: A cab driver finds himself the hostage of an engaging contract killer as he makes his rounds from hit to hit during one night in Los Angeles. He must find a way to save both himself and one last victim.
fields.title: Collateral

fields.plot: The plot of this movie, a sequel to Finding Nemo, is unknown.
fields.title: Finding Dory

fields.plot: The affair between a politician and a ballerina is affected by mysterious forces keeping the lovers apart.
fields.title: The Adjustment Bureau

fields.plot: Broadway musical based on the Little Orphan Annie comic strip. A young orphan girls adventures in finding a family that will take her.
fields.title: Annie

fields.plot: Mei, a young girl whose memory holds a priceless numerical code, finds herself pursued by the Triads, the Russian mob, and corrupt NYC cops. Coming to her aid is an ex-cage fighter whose life was destroyed by the gangsters on Mei's trail.
fields.title: Safe

fields.plot: Two eighth graders start to have feelings for each other despite being total opposites. Based on the novel
by Wendelin Van Draanen.
fields.title: Flipped

fields.plot: When a couple discovers that a brass teapot makes them money whenever they hurt themselves, they must come to terms with how far they are willing to go.
fields.title: The Brass Teapot

fields.plot: This film is about a man whose job is to deliver packages without asking any questions. Complications arise when he breaks those rules.
fields.title: The Transporter

fields.plot: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.
fields.title: Kill Bill: Vol. 2

fields.plot: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.
fields.title: The Holiday

fields.plot: A drama centered on three people -- a blue-collar American, a French journalist and a London school boy -- who are touched by death in different ways.
fields.title: Hereafter

fields.plot: Labeled an outcast by his brainy family, a bouncer overcomes long odds to lead a team of under performing misfits to semi-pro hockey glory, beating the crap out of everything that stands in his way.
fields.title: Goon

fields.plot: A quietly troubled young man returns home for his mother's funeral after being estranged from his family for a decade.
fields.title: Garden State

fields.plot: A robotic warrior from a post-apocalyptic future travels back in time to protect a 20-year old drifter and his future wife from an most advanced robotic assassin and to ensure they both survive a nuclear attack.
fields.title: Terminator 3: Rise of the Machines

fields.plot: A petty robbery spirals into a tense hostage situation after three gunmen hold up a diner that's a front for the mob.
fields.title: Pawn

fields.plot: Mere seconds before the Earth is to be demolished by an alien construction crew, journeyman Arthur Dent is swept off the planet by his friend Ford Prefect, a researcher penning a new edition of 'The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy.'
fields.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy

fields.plot: After inadvertently wreaking havoc on the elf community due to his ungainly size, a man raised as an elf at the North Pole is sent to the U.S. in search of his true identity.

fields.plot: Ex-con Jensen Ames is forced by the warden of a notorious prison to compete in our post-industrial world's most popular sport: a car race in which inmates must brutalize and kill one another on the road to victory.

fields.plot: Two single adults become caregivers to an orphaned girl when their mutual best friends die in an accident.
fields.title: Life as We Know It

fields.plot: An angel helps a compassionate but despairingly frustrated businessman by showing what life would have been like if he never existed.
fields.title: It's a Wonderful Life

fields.plot: In a California desert town, a short-order cook with clairvoyant abilities encounters a mysterious man with a link to dark, threatening forces.
fields.title: Odd Thomas

fields.plot: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

fields.plot: Three astronauts must devise a strategy to return to Earth safely after their spacecraft undergoes massive internal damage.

fields.plot: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.

fields.plot: A self-centered lawyer is sentenced to community service coaching a rag tag youth hockey team.

fields.plot: The human city of Zion defends itself against the massive invasion of the machines as Neo fights to end the war at another front while also opposing the rogue Agent Smith.
fields.title: The Matrix Revolutions

fields.plot: A CIA agent on the ground in Jordan hunts down a powerful terrorist leader while being caught between the unclear intentions of his American supervisors and Jordon Intelligence.
fields.title: Body of Lies

fields.plot: In order to win the Street Dance Championships, a dance crew is forced to work with ballet dancers from the Royal Dance School in exchange for rehearsal space.
fields.title: StreetDance 3D

fields.plot: A historian races to find the legendary Templar Treasure before a team of mercenaries.

fields.plot: A Nebraska teen gets more than she bargained for when she sets out for the bright lights of Las Vegas.
fields.title: Hick

fields.plot: A reluctant dwarf must play a critical role in protecting a special baby from an evil queen.
fields.title: Willow

fields.plot: A media mogul acts as a guide to Death, who takes the form of a young man to learn about life on Earth and in the process, fall in love with his guide's daughter.

fields.plot: A hapless New York advertising executive is mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies, and is pursued across the country while he looks for a way to survive.

fields.plot: An aging porn star agrees to participate in an
in order to make a clean break from the business, only to discover that he has been drafted into making a pedophilia and necrophilia themed snuff film.
fields.title: Srpski film

fields.plot: A clinically depressed teenager gets a new start after he checks himself into an adult psychiatric ward.
fields.title: It's Kind of a Funny Story

fields.plot: A grief-stricken mother takes on the LAPD to her own detriment when it stubbornly tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child, while also refusing to give up hope that she will find him one day.
fields.title: Changeling

fields.plot: Two criminals and their hostages unknowingly seek temporary refuge in an establishment populated by vampires, with chaotic results.
fields.title: From Dusk Till Dawn

fields.plot: Three childhood friends set aside their personal issues and reunite for a girls' weekend on a remote island off the coast of Maine. One wrong move turns their weekend getaway into a deadly fight for survival.

fields.title: Daybreakers

fields.plot: The story of a bride-to-be trying to find her real father told using hit songs by the popular '70s group ABBA.
fields.title: Mamma Mia!

fields.plot: James Bond is sent to investigate the connection between a North Korean terrorist and a diamond mogul who is funding the development of an international space weapon.
fields.title: Die Another Day

fields.plot: A teenage loner pushes his way into the underworld of a high school crime ring to investigate the disappearance of his ex-girlfriend.
fields.title: Brick

fields.plot: A widower returns to his hometown to search for answers to his wife's murder, which may be linked to the ghost of a murdered ventriloquist.
fields.title: Dead Silence

fields.plot: A spaceship arrives in Arizona, 1873, to take over the Earth, starting with the Wild West region. A posse of cowboys and natives are all that stand in their way.
fields.title: Cowboys & Aliens

fields.plot: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in 1979 New York and Italy, aging mafia don Michael Corleone seeks to vow for his sins while taking a young protégé under his wing.
fields.title: The Godfather: Part III

fields.plot: Two full length feature horror movies written by Quentin Tarantino & Robert Rodriguez put together as a two film feature. Including fake movie trailers in between both movies.
fields.title: Grindhouse

fields.plot: A misfit ant, looking for
to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.
fields.title: A Bug's Life

fields.plot: An ambitious married woman's temptation by a handsome billionaire leads to betrayal, recklessness, and forever alters the course of her life.
fields.title: Temptation: Confessions of a Marriage Counselor

fields.plot: Astronaut Scorch Supernova finds himself caught in a trap when he responds to an SOS from a notoriously dangerous alien planet.
fields.title: Escape from Planet Earth

fields.plot: A prehistoric epic that follows a young mammoth hunter's journey through uncharted territory to secure the future of his tribe.
fields.title: 10,000 BC

fields.plot: To ruin a western town, a corrupt political boss appoints a black sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.
fields.title: Blazing Saddles

fields.plot: An A.T.F. agent travels back in time to save a woman from being murdered, falling in love with her in the process.
fields.title: Deja Vu

fields.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.
fields.title: Gattaca

fields.plot: A team of astronauts are sent to re-ignite the dying sun 50 years into the future.

fields.plot: Three unknowing martial artists are summoned to a mysterious island to compete in a tournament whose outcome will decide the fate of the world.

fields.plot: Video game adventuress Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.
fields.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider

fields.plot: An unruly class of gifted and charming teenage boys are taught by two eccentric and innovative teachers, as their headmaster pushes for them all to get accepted into Oxford or Cambridge.

fields.plot: A suspense thriller with supernatural overtones that revolves around a man who learns something extraordinary about himself after a devastating accident.
fields.title: Unbreakable

fields.plot: Intrepid reporter Tintin and Captain Haddock set off on a treasure hunt for a sunken ship commanded by Haddock's ancestor.
fields.title: The Adventures of Tintin

fields.plot: A Salem woman accuses her ex-lover's wife of witchcraft.
fields.title: The Crucible

fields.plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.
fields.title: Magnolia

fields.plot: Self-proclaimed stuntman Rod Kimble is preparing for the jump of his life - to clear fifteen buses to raise money for his abusive stepfather Frank's life-saving heart operation.
fields.title: Hot Rod

fields.title: The Devil's Advocate

fields.plot: A young lawyer defends a black man accused of murdering two men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, sparking a rebirth of the KKK.
fields.title: A Time to Kill

fields.plot: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

fields.plot: A mentally retarded man fights for custody of his 7-year-old daughter, and in the process teaches his cold-hearted lawyer the value of love and family.
fields.title: I Am Sam

fields.plot: After being committed for 17 years, Michael Myers, now a grown man and still very dangerous, escapes from the mental institution (where he was committed as a 10 year old) and he immediately returns to Haddonfield, where he wants to find his baby sister, Laurie. Anyone who crosses his path is in mortal danger.

fields.title: Prince Avalanche

fields.plot: Set during the Ice Age, a sabertooth tiger, a sloth, and a wooly mammoth find a lost human infant, and they try to return him to his tribe.
fields.title: Ice Age

fields.plot: 21 is the fact-based story about six MIT students who were trained to become experts in card counting and subsequently took Vegas casinos for millions in winnings.

Depressed housewife learns her husband was killed in a car accident the day previously, awakens the next morning to find him alive and well at home, and then awakens the next day after to a world in which he is still dead.
fields.title: Premonition

fields.plot: A young couple move into a new apartment, only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. When the wife becomes mysteriously pregnant, paranoia over the safety of her unborn child begins controlling her life.
fields.title: Rosemary's Baby

fields.title: Hit and Run

fields.plot: The daughter of a Native American tribe chief and English soldier share a romance when English colonists invade 17th century Virginia.
fields.title: Pocahontas

fields.plot: A man who specializes in debunking paranormal occurrences checks into the fabled room 1408 in the Dolphin Hotel. Soon after settling in, he confronts genuine terror.

In the Victorian period, two children are shipwrecked on a tropical island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together, unaware that sexual maturity will eventually intervene.
fields.title: The Blue Lagoon

fields.plot: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.
fields.title: 3:10 to Yuma

fields.plot: James Bond uncovers a nuclear plot when he protects an oil heiress from her former kidnapper, an international terrorist who can't feel pain.
fields.title: The World Is Not Enough

fields.plot: Intent on seeing the Cahulawassee River before it's turned into one huge lake, outdoor fanatic Lewis Medlock takes his friends on a river-rafting trip they'll never forget into the dangerous American back-country.
fields.title: Deliverance

fields.plot: [link=nm4699709] is a former drug-dealing biker tough guy who found God and became a crusader for hundreds of Sudanese children who've been forced to become soldiers.
fields.title: Machine Gun Preacher

fields.plot: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.
fields.title: Soul Surfer

fields.title: Locked In

fields.plot: A weatherman finds himself living the same day over and over again.

fields.plot: The mummified body of Imhotep is shipped to a museum in London, where he once again wakes and begins his campaign of rage and terror.

fields.title: Sky High

fields.plot: One year after Kevin was left home alone and had to defeat a pair of bumbling burglars, he accidentally finds himself in New York City, and the same criminals are not far behind.
fields.title: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York

fields.plot: In Depression-era North Carolina, the future of George Pemberton's timber empire becomes complicated when it is learned that his wife, Serena, cannot bear children.
fields.title: Serena

fields.plot: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down
, a mysterious serial killer; aiding him is imprisoned criminal genius Hannibal
Lecter.
fields.title: Red Dragon

fields.plot: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother who he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?
fields.title: The Man in the Iron Mask

fields.plot: A young man who was sentenced to 7 years in prison for robbing a post office ends up spending 30 years in solitary confinement. During this time, his own personality is supplanted by his alter ego, Charles Bronson.

fields.plot: John McClane and a young hacker join forces to take down master cyber-terrorist Thomas Gabriel in Washington D.C.
fields.title: Live Free or Die Hard

fields.plot: In New York City, a case of mistaken identity turns a bored married couple's attempt at a glamorous and romantic evening into something more thrilling and dangerous.
fields.title: Date Night

fields.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World

fields.plot: In a future where the polar ice caps have melted and most of Earth is underwater, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw
and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.
fields.title: Waterworld

fields.plot: A malfunctioning time machine at a ski resort takes a man back to 1986 with his two friends and nephew, where they must relive a fateful night and not change anything to make sure the nephew is born.
fields.title: Hot Tub Time Machine

fields.plot: Seven years after the fact, a man comes to the realization that he was the sperm donor for his best friend's boy.
fields.title: The Switch

fields.plot: Six people find themselves trapped in the woods of West Virginia, hunted down by 'cannibalistic mountain men grossly disfigured through generations of in-breeding.'
fields.title: Wrong Turn

fields.plot: When college friends reunite after 15 years over the Christmas holidays, they will discover just how easy it is for long-forgotten rivalries and romances to be ignited.
fields.title: The Best Man Holiday

fields.plot: It has been five years since the disappearance of Katie and Hunter, and a suburban family witness strange events in their neighborhood when a woman and a mysterious child move in.
fields.title: Paranormal Activity 4

fields.plot: A group of male friends become obsessed with a group of mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents after one of them commits suicide.
fields.title: The Virgin Suicides

fields.plot: A prince and a fellowship of companions set out to rescue his bride from a fortress of alien invaders who have arrived on their home planet.
fields.title: Krull

fields.plot: A secretive renegade counter-terrorist co-opts the world's greatest hacker (who is trying to stay clean) to steal billions in US Government dirty money.
fields.title: Swordfish

fields.plot: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstacy into Florida.
fields.title: Bad Boys II

fields.plot: Georges and Anne are an octogenarian couple. They are cultivated, retired music teachers. Their daughter, also a musician, lives in Britain with her family. One day, Anne has a stroke, and the couple's bond of love is severely tested.
fields.title: Amour

fields.plot: Enid and Rebecca are social outsiders who, after graduating from high school, play a mean prank on a middle-aged geek.
fields.title: Ghost World

fields.plot: Six guests are invited to a strange house and must cooperate with the staff to solve a murder mystery.
fields.title: Clue

fields.plot: An FBI undercover agent infilitrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life to the expense of his regular one.
fields.title: Donnie Brasco

fields.plot: The world's greatest heroes are assembled to form the Justice League, to combat a threat beyond each individual's capabilities.
fields.title: Justice League

fields.plot: In the deep south during the 1930s, three escaped convicts search for hidden treasure while a relentless lawman pursues them.
fields.title: O Brother, Where Art Thou?

fields.plot: A girl dying of leukemia compiles a list of things she'd like to do before passing away. Topping the list is her desire to lose her virginity.
fields.title: Now Is Good

fields.plot: A haunting portrait of Lucy, a young university student drawn into a mysterious hidden world of unspoken desires.
fields.title: Sleeping Beauty

fields.plot: An impromptu goodbye party for Professor John Oldman becomes a mysterious interrogation after the retiring scholar reveals to his colleagues he never ages and has walked the earth for 14,000 years.
fields.title: The Man from Earth

fields.plot: A special military unit fights a powerful, out-of-control supercomputer and hundreds of scientists who have mutated into flesh-eating creatures after a laboratory accident.
fields.title: Resident Evil

fields.plot: A young family moves into a historic home in Georgia, only to learn they are not the house's only inhabitants. Soon they find themselves in the presence of a secret rising from underground and threatening to bring down anyone in its path.
fields.title: The Haunting in Connecticut 2: Ghosts of Georgia

fields.plot: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.
fields.title: The Karate Kid

fields.plot: The retelling of France's iconic but ill-fated queen, Marie Antoinette. From her betrothal and marriage to Louis XVI at 15 to her reign as queen at 19 and to the end of her reign as queen and ultimately the fall of Versailles.

fields.plot: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reaper vampires who feed on vampires.
fields.title: Blade II

fields.plot: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of a missing dolphin mascot of a football team.
fields.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective

fields.plot: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.
fields.title: Risky Business

fields.plot: A happily married woman falls for the artist who lives across the street.
fields.title: Take This Waltz

fields.plot: To foil an extortion plot, an FBI agent undergoes a face-transplant surgery and assumes the identity and physical appearance of a ruthless terrorist, but the plan backfires when the same criminal impersonates the cop with the same method.
