fields.plot: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than its advertisements, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.
fields.title: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel

fields.plot: The slave Spartacus leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic.
fields.title: Spartacus

fields.plot: A successful publisher finds his life taking a turn for the surreal after a car accident with a jaded lover.
fields.title: Vanilla Sky

fields.plot: Four interwoven stories that occur on Halloween: An everyday high school principal has a secret life as a serial killer; a college virgin might have just met the one guy for her; a group of teenagers pull a mean prank; a woman who loathes the night has to contend with her holiday-obsessed husband.
fields.title: Trick 'r Treat

fields.plot: A tough cop is dispatched to take down a serial killer who has been targeting police officers.
fields.title: Blitz

fields.plot: A shy woman, endowed with the speed, reflexes, and senses of a cat, walks a thin line between criminal and hero, even as a detective doggedly pursues her, fascinated by both of her personas.
fields.title: Catwoman

fields.plot: A young man finds a back door into a military central computer in which reality is confused with game-playing, possibly starting World War III.
fields.title: WarGames

fields.plot: A college student on suspension is coaxed into babysitting the kids next door, though he is fully unprepared for the wild night ahead of him.
fields.title: The Sitter

fields.plot: A drama centered on a troubled young woman who moves to San Francisco, where she gets involved in pornography and aligns herself with a cocaine-addicted lawyer.
fields.title: About Cherry

fields.plot: A police detective is in charge of the investigation of a brutal murder, in which a beautiful and seductive woman could be involved.
fields.title: Basic Instinct

fields.plot: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.
fields.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves

fields.plot: A squadron of U.S. Marines becomes the last line of defense against a global invasion.
fields.title: Battle Los Angeles

fields.plot: A successful cocaine dealer gets two tough assignments from his boss on the eve of his planned early retirement.
fields.title: Layer Cake

fields.plot: A failed New York playwright awkwardly navigates the transition from Next Big Thing to Last Year's News.
fields.title: Girl Most Likely

fields.plot: In New York City's Harlem circa 1987, an overweight, abused, illiterate teen who is pregnant with her second child is invited to enroll in an alternative school in hopes that her life can head in a new direction.
fields.title: Precious

fields.plot: An exploration of various interpretations of [link=nm0000040]'s horror film, [link=tt0081505].
fields.title: Room 237

fields.plot: Neo military lawyer Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder; they contend they were acting under orders.
fields.title: A Few Good Men

fields.plot: After an experimental bio-weapon is released, turning thousands into zombie-like creatures, it's up to a rag-tag group of survivors to stop the infected and those behind its release.
fields.title: Planet Terror

fields.plot: Inspired by the fictional Dr. Heiter, disturbed loner Martin dreams of creating a 12-person centipede and sets out to realize his sick fantasy.
fields.title: The Human Centipede II (Full Sequence)

fields.plot: An American scientist publicly defects to East Germany as part of a cloak and dagger mission to find the solution for a formula resin and then figuring out a plan to escape back to the West.
fields.title: Torn Curtain

fields.plot: Students suspect that their teachers are aliens after bizarre occurances.
fields.title: The Faculty

fields.plot: Amelie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, with her own sense of justice, decides to help those around her and along the way, discovers love.
fields.title: Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain

fields.plot: A married couple's life is turned upside down when the wife is accused of a murder.
fields.title: The Next Three Days

fields.plot: A woman who lives in a darkened old house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that her family home is haunted.
fields.title: The Others

fields.plot: Teenager, Darren Shan, meets a mysterious man at a freak show who turns out to be a Vampire. After a series of events Darren must leave his normal life and go on the road with the Cirque Du Freak and become a Vampire.
fields.title: Cirque du Freak: The Vampire's Assistant

fields.plot: A woman is convinced her kidnapper has returned when her sister goes missing.
fields.title: Gone

fields.plot: A guy challenges himself to say
to everything for an entire year.
fields.title: Yes Man

fields.plot: A woman suffers from an unusual illness caused by a flower growing in her lungs.
fields.title: L'écume des jours

fields.plot: A Brooklyn youth feels his only chance to get somewhere is as the king of the disco floor.
fields.title: Saturday Night Fever

fields.plot: After serving as a bridesmaid 27 times, a young woman wrestles with the idea of standing by her sister's side as her sibling marries the man she's secretly in love with.
fields.title: 27 Dresses

fields.plot: The two most popular guys in high school decide to ditch football camp for cheerleader camp. For the girls and for the glory.
fields.title: Fired Up!

fields.plot: The tale of an outlaw who escapes from prison and sets out across the Texas hills to reunite with his wife and the daughter he has never met.
fields.title: Ain't Them Bodies Saints

fields.plot: A romantic drama about a Chicago librarian with a gene that causes him to involuntarily time travel, and the complications it creates for his marriage.
fields.title: The Time Traveler's Wife

fields.plot: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.
fields.title: The Wrestler

fields.plot: A young adventurer named Milo Thatch joins an intrepid group of explorers to find the mysterious lost continent of Atlantis.
fields.title: Atlantis: The Lost Empire

fields.plot: As he helps a young artist with her upcoming exhibition, the owner of a mannequin shop's deadly, suppressed desires come to the surface.
fields.title: Maniac

fields.plot: A group of good-hearted but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.
fields.title: Police Academy

fields.plot: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.
fields.title: Dune

fields.plot: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last cannister of the ooze that created the Turtles, which Shredder wants to create an army of new mutants.
fields.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze

fields.plot: An IRS auditor suddenly finds himself the subject of narration only he can hear: narration that begins to affect his entire life, from his work, to his love-interest, to his death.
fields.title: Stranger Than Fiction

fields.plot: Snow White, pursued by a jealous queen, hides with the Dwarfs; the queen feeds her a poison apple, but Prince Charming awakens her with a kiss.
fields.title: Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs

fields.plot: Four best friends, desperate to improve their social status, enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.
fields.title: Sleepover

fields.plot: Four friends/fledgling entrepreneurs, knowing that there's something bigger and more innovative than the different error-checking devices they've built, wrestle over their new invention.
fields.title: Primer

fields.plot: Several survivors of a torpedoed ship find themselves in the same boat with one of the men who sunk it.
fields.title: Lifeboat

fields.plot: While his trailer trash parents teeter on the edge of divorce, Nick Twisp sets his sights on dream girl Sheeni Saunders, hoping that she'll be the one to take away his virginity.
fields.title: Youth in Revolt

fields.plot: A comedy centered on a man who is driven insane by the appearance of his doppleganger.
fields.title: The Double

fields.plot: The comic strip detective finds his life vastly complicated when Breathless Mahoney makes advances towards him while he is trying to battle Big Boy Caprice's united mob.
fields.title: Dick Tracy

fields.plot: Musical about two youngsters from rival NYC gangs who fall in love.
fields.title: West Side Story

fields.plot: A group of bank robbers find their multi-million dollar plan interrupted by a hard-boiled detective.
fields.title: Takers

fields.plot: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend discovers creatures in her new home who want to claim her as one of their own.
fields.title: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark

fields.plot: A romantic comedy centered on a woman who conceives twins through artificial insemination, only to meet the man of her dreams on the very same day.
fields.title: The Back-up Plan

fields.plot: A young Englishman recently released from prison recruits his three best friends and to rob the local drug kingpin who is responsible for his incarceration. Can he get revenge and win back his fed-up girlfriend?
fields.title: The Rise

fields.plot: A girl who half-heartedly tries to be part of the
of her school meets a rebel who teaches her a more devious way to play social politics.
fields.title: Heathers

fields.plot: Set in northern Australia before World War II, an English aristocrat who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to protect her new property from a takeover plot. As the pair drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscape, they experience the bombing of Darwin, Australia, by Japanese forces firsthand.
fields.title: Australia

fields.plot: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.
fields.title: Say Anything...

fields.plot: A man and a woman are compelled, for legal reasons, to live life as a couple for a limited period of time. At stake is a large amount of money.
fields.title: What Happens in Vegas

fields.plot: A Disney animated version of
. The only difference is that the film is set in outer space with alien worlds and other galactic wonders.
fields.title: Treasure Planet

fields.plot: A widower is determined to get to the bottom of a potentially explosive secret involving his wife's murder, big business, and corporate corruption.
fields.title: The Constant Gardener

fields.plot: A young thief, seeking revenge over the death of his brother, is trained by the once great, but aged Zorro, who is also seeking a vengeance of his own.
fields.title: The Mask of Zorro

fields.plot: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African American, then also the first amputee, US Navy Diver and the man who trained him.
fields.title: Men of Honor

fields.plot: James Bond investigates the mid-air theft of a space shuttle and discovers a plot to commit global genocide.
fields.title: Moonraker

fields.plot: A young driver, Speed Racer, aspires to be champion of the racing world with the help of his family and his high-tech Mach 5 automobile.
fields.title: Speed Racer

fields.plot: Rich Mr. Dashwood dies, leaving his second wife and her three daughters poor by the rules of inheritance. The two eldest daughters are the titular opposites.
fields.title: Sense and Sensibility

fields.plot: A group of people are trapped in an elevator and the Devil is mysteriously amongst them.
fields.title: Devil

fields.plot: Set in a futuristic world where humans live in isolation and interact through surrogate robots, a cop is forced to leave his home for the first time in years in order to investigate the murders of others' surrogates.
fields.title: Surrogates

fields.plot: The story revolves around the passengers of a yachting trip in the Atlantic Ocean who, when struck by mysterious weather conditions, jump to another ship only to experience greater havoc on the open seas.
fields.title: Triangle

fields.plot: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.
fields.title: Hope Floats

fields.plot: Young employees at Shenaniganz restaurant collectively stave off boredom and adulthood with their antics.
fields.title: Waiting...

fields.plot: A Jewish man has a wonderful romance with the help of his humour, but must use that same quality to protect his son in a Nazi death camp.
fields.title: La vita è bella

fields.plot: An outgoing, sexually aggressive young woman meets and begins a torrid affair with an equally aggressive young man in which their affair begins to bring a strain on their personal lives.
fields.title: Lie with Me

fields.plot: Plagued by a series of apocalyptic visions, a young husband and father questions whether to shelter his family from a coming storm, or from himself.
fields.title: Take Shelter

fields.plot: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.
fields.title: 21 Grams

fields.plot: Two teenage girls discover a mermaid in their beach club's swimming pool.
fields.title: Aquamarine

fields.plot: Security guard Larry Daley infiltrates the Smithsonian Institution in order to rescue Jedediah and Octavius, who have been shipped to the museum by mistake.
fields.title: Night at the Museum: Battle of the Smithsonian

fields.plot: A nice-guy cop with dissociative identity disorder must protect a woman on the run from a corrupt ex-boyfriend and his associates.
fields.title: Me, Myself & Irene

fields.plot: Anna Brady plans to travel to Dublin, Ireland to propose to her boyfriend Jeremy on February 29, leap day, because, according to Irish tradition, a man who receives a marriage proposal on a leap day must accept it.
fields.title: Leap Year

fields.plot: Army doctor Robert Neville struggles to create a cure for the plague that wiped out most of the human race.
fields.title: The Omega Man

fields.plot: A young woman's quest for revenge against the people who kidnapped and tormented her as a child leads her and a friend, who is also a victim of child abuse, on a terrifying journey into a living hell of depravity.
fields.title: Martyrs

fields.plot: A new street drug that sends its users across time and dimensions has one drawback: some people return as no longer human. Can two college dropouts save humankind from this silent, otherworldly invasion?
fields.title: John Dies at the End

fields.plot: Spinal Tap, the world's loudest band, is chronicled by hack documentarian Marty DeBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.
fields.title: This Is Spinal Tap

fields.plot: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.
fields.title: Kaze tachinu

fields.plot: An eastern immigrant finds himself stranded in JFK airport, and must take up temporary residence there.
fields.title: The Terminal

fields.plot: In order to inherit his fed up father's hotel empire, an immature and lazy man must repeat grades 1-12 all over again.
fields.title: Billy Madison

fields.plot: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.
fields.title: Beverly Hills Cop

fields.plot: Two gifted high school students execute a
murder - then become engaged in an intellectual contest with a seasoned homicide detective.
fields.title: Murder by Numbers

fields.plot: A splinter group of Roman soldiers fight for their lives behind enemy lines after their legion is decimated in a devastating guerrilla attack.
fields.title: Centurion

fields.plot: The story of Harvey Milk, and his struggles as an American gay activist who fought for gay rights and became California's first openly gay elected official.
fields.title: Milk

fields.plot: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and 'Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves' in particular.
fields.title: Robin Hood: Men in Tights

fields.plot: Based on the events of the brutal Ugandan dictator Idi Amin's regime as seen by his personal physician during the 1970s
fields.title: The Last King of Scotland

fields.plot: When two musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.
fields.title: Some Like It Hot

fields.plot: Five young filmmakers retrace the steps of a doomed group of hikers in pursuit of an unsolvable mystery.
fields.title: The Dyatlov Pass Incident

fields.plot: After enslavement & near extermination by an alien race in the year 3000, humanity begins to fight back.
fields.title: Battlefield Earth

fields.plot: In 1930s Chicago, a young con man seeking revenge for his murdered partner teams up with a master of the big con to win a fortune from a criminal banker.
fields.title: The Sting

fields.plot: The comic 'Bluntman and Chronic' is based on real-life stoners Jay and Silent Bob, so when they get no profit from a big-screen adaptation they set out to wreck the movie.
fields.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back

fields.plot: Three young women vacationing in Paris find themselves whisked away to Monte Carlo after one of the girls is mistaken for a British heiress.
fields.title: Monte Carlo

fields.plot: A retired elite Black Ops Commando launches a one man war against a group of South American criminals who have kidnapped his daughter to blackmail him into starting a revolution and getting an exiled dictator back into power.
fields.title: Commando

fields.plot: A vengeful Australian policeman sets out to avenge his partner, his wife and his son whom were murdered by a motorcycle gang in retaliation for the death of their leader.
fields.title: Mad Max

fields.plot: When his new father-in-law, King Harold falls ill, Shrek is looked at as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away. Not one to give up his beloved swamp, Shrek recruits his friends Donkey and Puss in Boots to install the rebellious Artie as the new king. Princess Fiona, however, rallies a band of royal girlfriends to fend off a coup d'etat by the jilted Prince Charming.
fields.title: Shrek the Third

fields.plot: A chilling vision of the House of Saddam Hussein comes to life through the eyes of the man who was forced to become the double of Hussein's sadistic son.
fields.title: The Devil's Double

fields.plot: Jigsaw locks a few unlucky people in a booby trapped shelter and they must find a way out before they inhale too much of a lethal nerve gas and die. But they must watch out, for the traps Jigsaw has set in the shelter lead to death also.
fields.title: Saw II

fields.plot: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.
fields.title: Road House

fields.plot: An ex-con sets out to avenge his brother's death after they were double-crossed during a heist years ago. During his campaign, however, he's tracked by a veteran cop and an egocentric hit man.
fields.title: Faster

fields.plot: In Victorian Era London, a troubled clairvoyant police detective investigates the murders by Jack The Ripper.
fields.title: From Hell

fields.plot: The MacManus brothers are living a quiet life in Ireland with their father, but when they learn that their beloved priest has been killed by mob forces, they go back to Boston to bring justice to those responsible and avenge the priest.
fields.title: The Boondock Saints II: All Saints Day

fields.plot: Alice awakes in Raccoon City, only to find it has become infested with zombies and monsters. With the help of Jill Valentine and Carlos Olivera, Alice must find a way out of the city before it is destroyed by a nuclear missile.
fields.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse

fields.plot: Teen detective Nancy Drew accompanies her father on a business trip to Los Angeles, where she happens upon clues to a murder mystery involving a movie star.
fields.title: Nancy Drew

fields.plot: When a young soldier in Vietnam gets dumped by his hometown girl, he and his best friend decide to go AWOL and return to the States to win her back.
fields.title: Love and Honor

fields.plot: A tough aspiring chef is hired to bring home a mobster's son from the Amazon but becomes involved in the fight against an oppressive town operator and the search for a legendary treasure.
fields.title: The Rundown

fields.plot: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.
fields.title: Giant

fields.plot: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.
fields.title: Ghostbusters II

fields.plot: A cursed gunman (Snipes) whose victims come back from the dead recruits a young warrior to help in the fight against a gang of zombies.
fields.title: Gallowwalkers

fields.plot: A group of high-schoolers invite Mandy Lane, a good girl who became quite hot over the summer, to a weekend party on a secluded ranch. While the festivities rage on, the number of revelers begins to drop quite mysteriously.
fields.title: All the Boys Love Mandy Lane

fields.plot: A substitute teacher who drifts from classroom to classroom finds a connection to the students and teachers during his latest assignment.
fields.title: Detachment

fields.plot: A law firm brings in its
to remedy the situation after a lawyer has a breakdown while representing a chemical company that he knows is guilty in a multi-billion dollar class action suit.
fields.title: Michael Clayton

fields.plot: A chef who loses his restaurant job starts up a food truck in an effort to reclaim his creative promise, while piecing back together his estranged family.
fields.title: Chef

fields.plot: Two sisters join the first female professional baseball league and struggle to help it succeed amidst their own growing rivalry.
fields.title: A League of Their Own

fields.plot: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.
fields.title: Caddyshack

fields.plot: James Bond heads to stop a media mogul's plan to induce war between China and the UK in order to obtain exclusive global media coverage.
fields.title: Tomorrow Never Dies

fields.plot: After dying in a car crash a widowed man searches the afterlife for his wife.
fields.title: What Dreams May Come

fields.plot: God contacts Congressman Evan Baxter and tells him to build an ark in preparation for a great flood.
fields.title: Evan Almighty

fields.plot: A dramatization of the 20 July assassination and political coup plot by desperate renegade German Army officers against Hitler during World War II.
fields.title: Valkyrie

fields.plot: A foreign traveler (Walker) unknowingly picks up a rental car that will tie him to a web of corrupt local police.
fields.title: Vehicle 19

fields.plot: A vengeful British spy goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, a CIA agent, and left him for dead and murdered his bride after he helped capture him.
fields.title: Licence to Kill

fields.plot: Chris is a once promising high school athlete whose life is turned upside down following a tragic accident. As he tries to maintain a normal life, he takes a job as a janitor at a bank, where he ultimately finds himself caught up in a planned heist.
fields.title: The Lookout

fields.plot: Two terminally ill men escape from a cancer ward and head off on a road trip with a wish list of to-dos before they die.
fields.title: The Bucket List

fields.plot: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones.
fields.title: The Ninth Gate

fields.plot: College student Sara finds that her new roommate Rebecca has an obsession with her, which quickly turns violent.
fields.title: The Roommate

fields.plot: A man discovers that his best friend's wife is having an affair.
fields.title: The Dilemma

fields.plot: A young man receives an emergency phone call on his cell phone from an older woman. The catch? The woman claims to have been kidnapped; and the kidnappers have targeted her husband and child next.
fields.title: Cellular

fields.plot: After a painful breakup, Ben develops insomnia. To kill time, he starts working the late night shift at the local supermarket, where his artistic imagination runs wild.
fields.title: Cashback

fields.plot: It's 1968, and four young, talented Australian Aboriginal girls learn about love, friendship and war when their all girl group The Sapphires entertain the US troops in Vietnam.
fields.title: The Sapphires

fields.plot: Jerry and Rachel are two strangers thrown together by a mysterious phone call from a woman they have never met. Threatening their lives and family, she pushes Jerry and Rachel into a series of increasingly dangerous situations, using the technology of everyday life to track and control their every move.
fields.title: Eagle Eye

fields.plot: Family-patriarch Jack Byrnes wants to appoint a successor. Does his son-in-law, the male nurse Greg Focker have what it takes?
fields.title: Little Fockers

fields.plot: Two best friends become rivals when they schedule their respective weddings on the same day.
fields.title: Bride Wars

fields.plot: A college graduate goes to work as a nanny for a rich New York family. Ensconced in their home, she has to juggle their dysfunction, a new romance, and the spoiled brat in her charge.
fields.title: The Nanny Diaries

fields.plot: In this live-action feature of the cartoon show, Fred Flintstone finally gets the job he's always wanted, but it may just come at a price.
fields.title: The Flintstones

fields.plot: A world-weary political journalist picks up the story of a woman's search for her son, who was taken away from her decades ago after she became pregnant and was forced to live in a convent.
fields.title: Philomena

fields.plot: Love, science, sex, infidelity, disease and comedy, the wild, mostly true story of the irrepressible Annie Parker and the almost discovery of a cure for cancer.
fields.title: Decoding Annie Parker

fields.plot: Rambo parody in which Topper Harley leads a rescue team into Iraq to save Iraqi war prisoners and all of their previous rescue teams.
fields.title: Hot Shots! Part Deux

fields.plot: Six years after Earth has suffered an alien invasion a cynical journalist agrees to escort a shaken American tourist through an infected zone in Mexico to the safety of the US border.
fields.title: Monsters

fields.plot: An FBI agent must go undercover in the Miss United States beauty pageant to prevent a group from bombing the event.
fields.title: Miss Congeniality

fields.plot: A thriller involving an ongoing unsolved mystery in Alaska, where one town has seen an extraordinary number of unexplained disappearances during the past 40 years and there are accusations of a federal cover up.
fields.title: The Fourth Kind

fields.plot: The alumni cast of a cult space TV show have to play their roles as the real thing when an alien race needs their help.
fields.title: Galaxy Quest

fields.plot: In a dystopian future, Dredd, the most famous judge (a cop with instant field judiciary powers) is convicted for a crime he did not commit while his murderous counterpart escapes.
fields.title: Judge Dredd

fields.plot: Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City.
fields.title: The Spirit

fields.plot: Kazakh TV talking head Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.
fields.title: Borat: Cultural Learnings of America for Make Benefit Glorious Nation of Kazakhstan

fields.plot: The life story of basketball sensation, Jeremy Lin.
fields.title: Linsanity

fields.plot: A ghostwriter hired to complete the memoirs of a former British prime minister uncovers secrets that put his own life in jeopardy.
fields.title: The Ghost Writer

fields.plot: A slacker competes with a repeat winner for the
title at work, in order to gain the affections of a new female employee.
fields.title: Employee of the Month

fields.plot: Over the course of one evening, an unsuspecting group of twenty-somethings find themselves bombarded by a series of natural disasters and catastrophic events.
fields.title: Disaster Movie

fields.plot: A recently-widowed man's son calls a radio talk show in an attempt to find his father a partner.
fields.title: Sleepless in Seattle

fields.plot: Adventuress Lara Croft goes on a quest to save the mythical Pandora's Box before an evil scientist and recruits a former Marine turned mercenary to assist her.
fields.title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider: The Cradle of Life

fields.plot: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.
fields.title: El orfanato

fields.plot: A desert warrior rises up against the evil army that is destroying his homeland. He captures the enemy's key sorcerer, takes her deep into the desert and prepares for a final showdown.
fields.title: The Scorpion King

fields.plot: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and hijinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.
fields.title: MASH

fields.plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.
fields.title: Meet the Parents

fields.plot: Alice stumbles into the world of Wonderland. Will she get home? Not if the Queen of Hearts has her way.
fields.title: Alice in Wonderland

fields.plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of intelligent aliens, who send plans for a mysterious machine.
fields.title: Contact

fields.plot: When a destructive space entity is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Starship Enterprise in order to intercept, examine and hopefully stop it.
fields.title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture

fields.plot: The story of a young girl in North London whose life changes after witnessing a violent attack.
fields.title: Broken

fields.plot: Four 12-year-old girls grow up together during an eventful small-town summer in 1970.
fields.title: Now and Then

fields.plot: 15-year-old Oliver Tate has two objectives: To lose his virginity before his next birthday, and to extinguish the flame between his mother and an ex-lover who has resurfaced in her life.
fields.title: Submarine

fields.plot: A frustrated composer finds fulfillment as a high school music teacher.
fields.title: Mr. Holland's Opus

fields.plot: For their ghost hunting reality show, a production crew locks themselves inside an abandoned mental hospital that's supposedly haunted - and it might prove to be all too true.
fields.title: Grave Encounters

fields.plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.
fields.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock

fields.plot: The story centers on a 14-year-old girl who keeps a diary about the ups and downs of being a teenager, including the things she learns about kissing.
fields.title: Angus, Thongs and Perfect Snogging

fields.plot: Unless a comet can be destroyed before colliding with Earth, only those allowed into shelters will survive. Which people will survive?
fields.title: Deep Impact

fields.plot: A young boy attempts to make the world a better place after his teacher gives him that chance.
fields.title: Pay It Forward

fields.plot: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.
fields.title: An American Werewolf in London

fields.plot: A small town beauty pageant turns deadly as it becomes clear that someone will go to any lengths to win.
fields.title: Drop Dead Gorgeous

fields.plot: A vacationing woman meets her ideal man, leading to a swift marriage. Back at home, however, their idyllic life is upset when they discover their neighbors could be assassins who have been contracted to kill the couple.
fields.title: Killers

fields.plot: A psychological thriller about a man who is sometimes controlled by his murder-and-mayhem-loving alter ego.
fields.title: Mr. Brooks

fields.plot: A story about a troubled boy growing up in England, set in 1983. He comes across a few skinheads on his way home from school, after a fight. They become his new best friends even like family. Based on experiences of director Shane Meadows.
fields.title: This Is England

fields.plot: A love-lorn script writer grows increasingly desperate in his quest to adapt the book 'The Orchid Thief'.
fields.title: Adaptation.

fields.plot: After his family is kidnapped during their sailing trip in Spain, a young Wall Street trader is confronted by the people responsible: intelligence agents looking to recover a mysterious briefcase.
fields.title: The Cold Light of Day

fields.plot: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker that requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.
fields.title: Crank: High Voltage

fields.plot: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.
fields.title: Falling Down

fields.plot: Ruminations on the life of Bob Dylan, where six characters embody a different aspect of the musician's life and work.
fields.title: I'm Not There.

fields.plot: Soon after her divorce, a fiction writer returns to her home in small-town Minnesota, looking to rekindle a romance with her ex-boyfriend, who is now happily married and has a newborn daughter.
fields.title: Young Adult

fields.plot: An Arkansas waitress and a housewife shoot a rapist and take off in a '66 Thunderbird.
fields.title: Thelma & Louise

fields.plot: This is the film version of the Pulitzer and Tony Award winning musical about Bohemians in the East Village of New York City struggling with life, love and AIDS, and the impacts they have on America.
fields.title: Rent

fields.plot: The daughter of orthodox Sikh rebels against her parents' traditionalism by running off to Germany with a football team (soccer in America).
fields.title: Bend It Like Beckham

fields.plot: A bureaucrat in a retro-future world tries to correct an administrative error and himself becomes an enemy of the state.
fields.title: Brazil

fields.plot: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.
fields.title: Once

fields.plot: Grace Trey is the ideal Christian teen who is also a phenomenal singer. But at the tender age of eighteen, after she gets the music break of a lifetime and is thrust into the
- her faith is put to the test.
fields.title: Grace Unplugged

fields.plot: A terminally-ill mother has to settle on the new woman in her ex-husband's life, who will be their new stepmother.
fields.title: Stepmom

fields.plot: Two intersecting love triangles. Obsession and betrayal set against the music scene in Austin, Texas.
fields.title: Untitled Terrence Malick Project

fields.plot: A tragic film covering a young boy and his little sister's struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.
fields.title: Hotaru no haka

fields.plot: A film of the early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.
fields.title: Elizabeth

fields.plot: When her child goes missing, a mother looks to unravel the legend of the Tall Man, an entity who allegedly abducts children.
fields.title: The Tall Man

fields.plot: Survivors of a nuclear attack are grouped together for days in the basement of their apartment building, where fear and dwindling supplies wear away at their dynamic.
fields.title: The Divide

fields.plot: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.
fields.title: Lone Star

fields.plot: Two straight, single Brooklyn firefighters pretend to be a gay couple in order to receive domestic partner benefits.
fields.title: I Now Pronounce You Chuck & Larry

fields.plot: Two New York City girls pact to lose their virginity during their first summer out of high school. When they both fall for the same street artist, the friends find their connection tested for the first time.
fields.title: Very Good Girls

fields.plot: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.
fields.title: Do the Right Thing

fields.plot: An adaptation of Maurice Sendak's classic children's story, where Max, a disobedient little boy sent to bed without his supper, creates his own world - a forest inhabited by ferocious wild creatures who crown Max as their ruler.
fields.title: Where the Wild Things Are

fields.plot: A mercenary is killed, but comes back from Hell as a reluctant soldier of the Devil.
fields.title: Spawn

fields.plot: A man named Mr. Smith delivers a woman's baby during a shootout, and is then called upon to protect the newborn from the army of gunmen.
fields.title: Shoot 'Em Up

fields.plot: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them
fields.title: 3 Idiots

fields.plot: Aeon Flux is a mysterious assassin working for the Monicans, a group of rebels trying to overthrow the government. When she is a sent on a mission to kill the Chairman, a whole new mystery is found.
fields.title: Æon Flux

fields.plot: A New York University professor returns from a rescue mission to the Amazon rainforest with the footage shot by a lost team of documentarians who were making a film about the area's local cannibal tribes.
fields.title: Cannibal Holocaust

fields.plot: A man in London tries to help a counterespionage agent. But when the agent is killed and he stands accused, he must go on the run to both save himself and also stop a spy ring trying to steal top secret information.
fields.title: The 39 Steps

fields.plot: Two policemen see their personal and professional lives fall apart in the wake of the
murder investigation.
fields.title: The Black Dahlia

fields.plot: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his twelve-year-old son.
fields.title: Thank You for Smoking

fields.plot: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, however, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one will believes he's innocent.
fields.title: My Bloody Valentine

fields.plot: A wrongly convicted man must try to survive a public execution gauntlet staged as a game show.
fields.title: The Running Man

fields.plot: The Fantastic Four learn that they aren't the only super-powered beings in the universe when they square off against the powerful Silver Surfer and the planet-eating Galactus.
fields.title: 4: Rise of the Silver Surfer

fields.plot: Sandler plays a businessman who is wrongly sentenced to an anger-management program, where he meets an aggressive instructor.
fields.title: Anger Management

fields.plot: Horton the Elephant struggles to protect a microscopic community from his neighbors who refuse to believe it exists.
fields.title: Horton Hears a Who!

fields.plot: The
story of Cinderella. A refreshing new take on the classic fairy tale.
fields.title: EverAfter

fields.plot: Survivors of the Raccoon City catastrophe travel across the Nevada desert, hoping to make it to Alaska. Alice joins the caravan and their fight against the evil Umbrella Corp.
fields.title: Resident Evil: Extinction

fields.plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.
fields.title: Blades of Glory

fields.plot: Two drifters, one a gentle but slow giant, try to make money working the fields during the Depression so they can fulfill their dreams.
fields.title: Of Mice and Men

fields.plot: A law student becomes a lieutenant during World War II, is captured and asked to defend a black prisoner of war falsely accused of murder.
fields.title: Hart's War

fields.plot: Pirate Captain sets out on a mission to defeat his rivals Black Bellamy and Cutlass Liz for the Pirate of the year Award. The quest takes Captain and his crew from the shores of Blood Island to the foggy streets of Victorian London.
fields.title: The Pirates! In an Adventure with Scientists!

fields.plot: Lewis is a brilliant inventor who meets mysterious stranger named Wilbur Robinson, whisking Lewis away in a time machine and together they team up to track down Bowler Hat Guy in a showdown that ends with an unexpected twist of fate.
fields.title: Meet the Robinsons

fields.plot: Family guy Jack Sadelstein prepares for the annual event he dreads: the Thanksgiving visit of his twin sister, the needy and passive-aggressive Jill, who then refuses to leave.
fields.title: Jack and Jill

fields.plot: A group of suburban biker wannabes looking for adventure hit the open road, but get more than they bargained for when they encounter a New Mexico gang called the Del Fuegos.
fields.title: Wild Hogs

fields.plot: A Russian sniper and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.
fields.title: Enemy at the Gates

fields.plot: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt.
fields.title: The Fugitive

fields.plot: A couple reunite years after the night they first met, fell in love, and separated, convinced that one day they'd end up together.
fields.title: Serendipity

fields.plot: A veteran high school teacher befriends a younger art teacher, who is having an affair with one of her 15-year-old students. However, her intentions with this new
also go well beyond platonic friendship.
fields.title: Notes on a Scandal

fields.plot: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.
fields.title: Dragonball Evolution

fields.plot: Six years after their Guantanamo Bay adventure, stoner buds Harold Lee and Kumar Patel cause a holiday fracas by inadvertently burning down Harold's father-in-law's prize Christmas tree.
fields.title: A Very Harold & Kumar 3D Christmas

fields.plot: A horror comedy centered on a guy who learns that his unusual stomach problems are being caused by a demon living in his intestines.
fields.title: Bad Milo!

fields.plot: An aging, out-of-work actress accepts one last job, though the consequences of her decision affect her in ways she didn't consider.
fields.title: The Congress

fields.plot: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.
fields.title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso

fields.plot: In the midst of the Gulf War, soldiers are kidnapped and brainwashed for sinister purposes.
fields.title: The Manchurian Candidate

fields.plot: Based on the 1820 event, a whaling ship is preyed upon by a sperm whale, stranding its crew at sea for 90 days, thousands of miles from home.
fields.title: Heart of the Sea
The Mortal Instruments: City of Ashes

fields.plot: As seniors in high school, Troy and Gabriella struggle with the idea of being separated from one another as college approaches. Along with the rest of the Wildcats, they stage a spring musical to address their experiences, hopes and fears about their future.
fields.title: High School Musical 3: Senior Year

fields.plot: A very rich and successful playboy amuses himself by stealing artwork, but may have met his match in a seductive detective.
fields.title: The Thomas Crown Affair

fields.plot: Disgraced Navy SEAL Shane Wolfe is handed a new assignment: Protect the five Plummer kids from enemies of their recently deceased father -- a government scientist whose top-secret experiment remains in the kids' house.
fields.title: The Pacifier

fields.plot: Norway, WWII: A group of British and German soldiers find themselves stranded in the wilderness after an aircraft battle. Finding shelter in the same cabin, they realize the only way to survive the winter is to place the rules of war aside.
fields.title: Into the White

fields.plot: Modernization of Charles Dickens classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.
fields.title: Great Expectations

fields.plot: Mumble's son, Erik, is struggling to realize his talents in the Emperor Penguin world. Meanwhile, Mumble and his family and friends discover a new threat their home -- one that will take everyone working together to save them.
fields.title: Happy Feet Two

fields.plot: Two bird enthusiasts try to defeat the cocky, cutthroat world record holder in a year-long bird-spotting competition.
fields.title: The Big Year

fields.plot: A man known as Diablo emerges to head a drug cartel after the previous leader is imprisoned.
fields.title: A Man Apart

fields.plot: Rachel is a quick-witted and lovable stay-at-home mom. Frustrated with the realities of preschool auctions, a lackluster sex life and career that's gone kaput, Rachel visits a strip club to spice up her marriage and meets McKenna, a stripper she adopts as her live-in nanny.

fields.plot: After the Enterprise is diverted to the Romulan planet of Romulus, supposedly because they want to negotiate a truce, the Federation soon find out the Romulans are planning an attack on Earth.
fields.title: Star Trek: Nemesis

fields.plot: A British medical doctor fights a cholera outbreak in a small Chinese village, while also being trapped at home in a loveless marriage to an unfaithful wife.
fields.title: The Painted Veil

fields.plot: Convinced that a CCN cameraman is her true love, an eccentric crossword puzzler trails him as he travels all over the country, hoping to convince him that they belong together.
fields.title: All About Steve

fields.plot: A God-fearing bluesman takes to a wild young woman who, as a victim of childhood sexual abuse, looks everywhere for love, never quite finding it.
fields.title: Black Snake Moan

fields.plot: A story about the hair-raising minefield between love, attraction and commitment.
fields.title: Shuddh Desi Romance

fields.plot: Desperate to repay his debt to his ex-wife, an ex-con plots a heist at his new employer's country home, unaware that a second criminal has also targeted the property, and rigged it with a series of deadly traps.
fields.title: The Collector

fields.plot: Takes a closer look at what brought about the financial meltdown.
fields.title: Inside Job

fields.plot: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.
fields.title: A Streetcar Named Desire

fields.plot: Soon after moving into their seemingly idyllic new home, a family learns of a brutal crime committed against former residents of the dwelling.
fields.title: Dream House

fields.plot: A prince turned warrior named He-Man battles against the dark lord Skeletor on the planet Eternia. He-Man and his comrades arrive on Earth and discover two teenage lovers to find the magical Cosmic Key.
fields.title: Masters of the Universe

fields.plot: The employees of an independent music store learn about each other as they try anything to stop the store being absorbed by a large chain.
fields.title: Empire Records

fields.plot: Four teens are in great danger one year after their car hits a stranger whose body they dump in the sea.
fields.title: I Know What You Did Last Summer

fields.plot: Three pets escape from a California ranch to find their owners in San Francisco.
fields.title: Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey

fields.plot: Still a stranger to her own body, a high school student discovers she has a physical advantage when she becomes the object of male violence.
fields.title: Teeth

fields.plot: Laurie Strode struggles to come to terms with her brother Michael's deadly return to Haddonfield, Illinois; meanwhile, Michael prepares for another reunion with his sister.
fields.title: Halloween II

fields.plot: An unlikely friendship forms between 21 year-old Jane and the elderly Sadie after Jane discovers a hidden stash of money inside an object at Sadie's yard sale.
fields.title: Starlet

fields.plot: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner, Poseidon, capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for survival as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.
fields.title: Poseidon

fields.plot: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invader.
fields.title: Howard the Duck

fields.plot: The plot is unknown at this time.
fields.title: Paranormal Activity 5

fields.plot: Former college frenemies Lauren and Katie move into a fabulous Gramercy Park apartment, and in order to make ends meet, the unlikely pair start a phone sex line together.
fields.title: For a Good Time, Call...

fields.plot: An ex-cop and his family are the target of an evil force that is using mirrors as a gateway into their home.
fields.title: Mirrors

fields.plot: In 1990, to protect his fragile mother from a fatal shock after a long coma, a young man must keep her from learning that her beloved nation of East Germany as she knew it has disappeared.
fields.title: Good Bye Lenin!

fields.plot: After an accident, a chauvenistic executive gains the ability to hear what women are really thinking.
fields.title: What Women Want

fields.plot: A veteran cop, Murtaugh, is partnered with a young suicidal cop, Riggs. Both having one thing in common; hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.
fields.title: Lethal Weapon

fields.plot: A mature Queen Elizabeth endures multiple crises late in her reign including court intrigues, an assassination plot, the Spanish Armada, and romantic disappointments.
fields.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age

fields.plot: An unfaithful wife encounters the zombie of her dead lover, who's being chased by demons after he escaped from their sado-masochistic Hell.
fields.title: Hellraiser

fields.plot: A small-time hood struggles to succeed on the
of Little Italy.
fields.title: Mean Streets

fields.plot: A troubled husband and executive adopts a beaver hand-puppet as his sole means of communicating.
fields.title: The Beaver

fields.plot: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.
fields.title: Sling Blade

fields.plot: A rising country-music songwriter works with a fallen star to work their way fame, causing romantic complications along the way.
fields.title: Country Strong

fields.plot: A college grad lands a job as a financial journalist in New York City to support where she nurtures her shopping addiction and falls for a wealthy entrepreneur.
fields.title: Confessions of a Shopaholic

fields.plot: Paul is a U.S. truck driver working in Iraq. After an attack by a group of Iraqis he wakes to find he is buried alive inside a coffin. With only a lighter and a cell phone it's a race against time to escape this claustrophobic death trap.
fields.title: Buried

fields.plot: When a worldly singer witnesses a mob crime, the police hide her as a nun in a traditional convent where she has trouble fitting in.
fields.title: Sister Act

fields.plot: In 13th-century England, a small group of Knights Templar fight to defend Rochester Castle against the tyrannical King John.
fields.title: Ironclad

fields.plot: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tobacco tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.
fields.title: Superman III

fields.plot: A flighty teenage girl learns that she is her generation's destined battler of vampires.
fields.title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer

fields.plot: A smart teenage girl comes of age in a small town with her self-centered parents who had her when they were teenagers.
fields.title: As Cool as I Am

fields.plot: Three of the most popular girls at Reagan High accidentally kill the prom queen with a jaw-breaker when a kidnapping goes horribly wrong.
fields.title: Jawbreaker

fields.plot: A video-gaming boy, seemingly doomed to stay at his trailer park home all his life, finds himself recruited as a gunner for an alien defense force.
fields.title: The Last Starfighter

fields.plot: A couple with a good marriage that seemed solid, actually begins to crumble when she discovers her husband's intentions for divorce.
fields.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman

fields.plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to 20th century Earth to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it, humpback whales.
fields.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home

fields.plot: Two counterculture bikers travel from Los Angeles to New Orleans in search of America.
fields.title: Easy Rider

fields.plot: While visiting his hometown during Christmas, a man comes face-to-face with his old high school crush whom he was best friends with -- a woman whose rejection of him turned him into a ferocious womanizer.
fields.title: Just Friends

fields.plot: Biographical story of the rise from nowhere of early rock and roll singer Ritchie Valens whose life was cut short by a plane crash.
fields.title: La Bamba

fields.plot: A social worker fights to save a girl from her abusive parents, only to discover that the situation is more dangerous than she ever expected.
fields.title: Case 39

fields.plot: Grumpy pensioner Arthur honors his recently deceased wife's passion for performing by joining the unconventional local choir to which she used to belong, a process that helps him build bridges with his estranged son, James.
fields.title: Song for Marion

fields.plot: A Viking boy is left behind after his clan battles a Native American tribe. Raised within the tribe, he ultimately becomes their savior in a fight against the Norsemen.
fields.title: Pathfinder

fields.plot: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.
fields.title: Antz

fields.plot: David Spade stars as Joe Dirt, an idiot who works as an oil weller who is on the search for his parents who abandoned him when he was a baby at the grand canyon.
fields.title: Joe Dirt

fields.plot: As a widower tries to piece together his life in the wake of his wife's suicide, his daughter finds solace -- at first -- in her imaginary friend.
fields.title: Hide and Seek

fields.plot: In the Far East, Alex O'Connell, the son of famed mummy fighters Rick and Evy O'Connell, unearths the mummy of the first Emperor of Qin -- a shape-shifting entity cursed by a witch centuries ago.
fields.title: The Mummy: Tomb of the Dragon Emperor

fields.plot: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the round table of Camelot even as forces conspire to tear it apart
fields.title: Excalibur

fields.plot: At Helge's 60th birthday party, some unpleasant family truths are revealed.
fields.title: Festen

fields.plot: In the early 1960s, CIA agent Napoleon Solo and KGB operative Illya Kuryakin participate in a joint mission against a mysterious criminal organization, which is working to proliferate nuclear weapons.
fields.title: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.

fields.plot: George grows up in the jungle raised by apes. Based on the Cartoon series.
fields.title: George of the Jungle

fields.plot: A film about the troubled and controversial life of the master comedy filmmaker.
fields.title: Chaplin

fields.plot: A rich kid becomes the self-appointed psychiatrist to the student body of his new high school.
fields.title: Charlie Bartlett

fields.plot: An inner-city junior high school teacher with a drug habit forms an unlikely friendship with one of his students after she discovers his secret.
fields.title: Half Nelson

fields.plot: Several love stories set in one of the most loved cities of the world, New York.
fields.title: New York, I Love You

fields.plot: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who even slightly anger them.
fields.title: The Craft

fields.plot: A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in offing a politician.
fields.title: Red Eye

fields.plot: The events leading up to the sword fighting cat's meeting with Shrek and his friends.
fields.title: Puss in Boots

fields.plot: Each of the women portray one of the characters represented in the collection of twenty poems, revealing different issues that impact women in general and women of color in particular.
fields.title: For Colored Girls

fields.plot: As Nell Sweetzer tries to build a new life after the events of the first movie, the evil force that once possessed her returns with an even more horrific plan.
fields.title: The Last Exorcism Part II

fields.plot: Cousins Bo and Luke Duke, with a little help from their cousin Daisy and Uncle Jesse, egg on the authorities of Hazzard County, Boss Hogg and Sheriff Coltrane.
fields.title: The Dukes of Hazzard

fields.plot: In Paris, a young employee in the office of the US Ambassador hooks up with an American spy looking to stop a terrorist attack in the city.
fields.title: From Paris with Love

fields.plot: The story of the life of Brandon Teena, a transgendered teen who preferred life in a male identity until it was discovered he was born biologically female.
fields.title: Boys Don't Cry

What's even more complicating is Nate's growing feelings for June, whose true beauty starts to emerge.
fields.title: The Hottie & the Nottie

fields.plot: Astronauts returning from a voyage to mars are caught in a time warp and are propelled into a post-Apocalyptic Earth populated by mutants.
fields.title: World Without End

fields.plot: A cop is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent enemy who is loose in a nonviolent future society.
fields.title: Demolition Man

fields.plot: The plot is unknown.
fields.title: Deadpool

fields.plot: A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.
fields.title: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom

fields.plot: Robert Gould Shaw leads the US Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices of both his own Union army and the Confederates.
fields.title: Glory

fields.plot: An upstart television producer accepts the challenge of reviving a struggling morning show program with warring co-hosts.
fields.title: Morning Glory

fields.plot: An animated adventure centered on a 5-year-old boy and his relationship with a goldfish princess who longs to become human.
fields.title: Gake no ue no Ponyo

fields.plot: Wannabe actors become regulars in the stylish neo-lounge scene; Trent teaches his friend Mike the unwritten rules of the scene.
fields.title: Swingers

fields.plot: A young woman fights the spirit that is slowly taking possession of her.
fields.title: The Unborn

fields.plot: A enormous, radioactively mutated lizard runs rampant on the island of Manhattan.
fields.title: Godzilla

fields.plot: Two turkeys from opposite sides of the tracks must put aside their differences and team up to travel back in time to change the course of history - and get turkey off the holiday menu for good.
fields.title: Free Birds

fields.plot: Both dumped by their girlfriends, two best friends seek refuge in the local mall.
fields.title: Mallrats

fields.plot: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.
fields.title: Fried Green Tomatoes

fields.plot: Steve Martin and Bonnie Hunt return as heads of the Baker family who, while on vacation, find themselves in competition with a rival family of eight children, headed by Eugene Levy
fields.title: Cheaper by the Dozen 2

fields.plot: When a boy wishes to be big at a magic wish machine, he wakes up the next morning and finds himself in an adult body literally overnight.
fields.title: Big

fields.plot: Two Port Authority police officers become trapped under the rubble of the World Trade Center.
fields.title: World Trade Center

fields.plot: An orphan with terrible aunts for guardians, befriends human like bugs who live inside a giant peach, who take the boy on a journey to New York City.
fields.title: James and the Giant Peach

fields.plot: Parody of
in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.
fields.title: Hot Shots!

fields.plot: An investigation of a horse-racing scam leads 007 to a mad industrialist who plans to create a worldwide microchip monopoly by destroying California's Silicon Valley.
fields.title: A View to a Kill

fields.plot: After his wife is assaulted, a husband enlists the services of a vigilante group to help him settle the score. Then he discovers they want a 'favor' from him in return.
fields.title: Seeking Justice

fields.plot: A cop turns con man once he comes out of the closet. Once imprisoned, he meets the second love of his life, whom he'll stop at nothing to be with.
fields.title: I Love You Phillip Morris

fields.plot: On his latest assignment, FBI agent Malcolm Turner goes undercover as Big Momma, and works as a nanny for an unhappy woman who is under investigation for murder.
fields.title: Big Momma's House 2

fields.plot: Two seemingly dumb teens struggle to prepare a historical presentation with the help of a time machine.
fields.title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure

fields.plot: An FBI agent persuades a social worker, who is adept with a new experimental technology, to enter the mind of a comatose serial killer in order to learn where he has hidden his latest kidnap victim.
fields.title: The Cell

fields.plot: A young man is a reformed gambler who must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks.
fields.title: Rounders

fields.plot: Cornered by the DEA, convicted New York drug dealer Montgomery Brogan reevaluates his life in the 24 remaining hours before facing a seven-year jail term.
fields.title: 25th Hour

fields.plot: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.
fields.title: The Bounty Hunter

fields.plot: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.
fields.title: Per un pugno di dollari

fields.plot: A documentary that challenges former Indonesian death squad leaders to reenact their real-life mass-killings in whichever cinematic genres they wish, including classic Hollywood crime scenarios and lavish musical numbers.
fields.title: The Act of Killing

fields.plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.
fields.title: The Perfect Storm

fields.plot: A Westerner finds refuge with a group of women in a church during Japan's rape of Nanking in 1937. Posing as a priest, he attempts to lead the women to safety.
fields.title: Jin líng shí san chai

fields.plot: After a family is forced to relocate for their son's health, they begin experiencing supernatural behavior in their new home, which turns out to be a former mortuary.
fields.title: The Haunting in Connecticut

fields.plot: Two brothers travel to Germany for Oktoberfest, only to stumble upon secret, centuries-old competition described as a
with beer games.
fields.title: Beerfest

fields.plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.
fields.title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them

fields.plot: A hacker is abducted into the world of a computer and forced to participate in gladiatorial games where his only chance of escape is with the help of a heroic security program.
fields.title: TRON

fields.plot: Two adults and a juvenile burglar break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children and can't escape.
fields.title: The People Under the Stairs

fields.plot: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister.
fields.title: American Wedding

fields.plot: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.
fields.title: Papillon

fields.plot: Apartment building superintendent Cleveland Heep rescues what he thinks is a young woman from the pool he maintains. When he discovers that she is actually a character from a bedtime story who is trying to make the journey back to her home, he works with his tenants to protect his new friend from the creatures that are determined to keep her in our world.
fields.title: Lady in the Water

fields.plot: A brood of fire-breathing dragons emerges from the earth and begins setting fire to everything, establishing dominance over the planet.
fields.title: Reign of Fire

fields.plot: An American journalism student in London scoops a big story, and begins an affair with an aristocrat as the incident unfurls.
fields.title: Scoop

fields.plot: A young female embezzeler arrives at the Bates Motel which has terrible secrets of its own.
fields.title: Psycho

fields.plot: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holds up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.
fields.title: Evil Dead II

fields.plot: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.
fields.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou

fields.plot: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.
fields.title: Awakenings

fields.plot: The tumultuous early history of the Central Intelligence Agency is viewed through the prism of one man's life.
fields.title: The Good Shepherd

fields.plot: Captain Picard, with the help of supposedly dead Captain Kirk, must stop a madman willing to murder on a planetary scale in order to enter a space matrix.
fields.title: Star Trek: Generations

fields.plot: Filmed over nearly five years in twenty-five countries on five continents, and shot on seventy-millimetre film, Samsara transports us to the varied worlds of sacred grounds, disaster zones, industrial complexes, and natural wonders.
fields.title: Samsara

fields.plot: A group of Yokohama teens look to save their school's clubhouse from the wrecking ball in preparations for the 1964 Tokyo Olympics.
fields.title: Kokuriko-zaka kara

fields.plot: Three young people on a road trip from Colorado to New Jersey talk to a trucker on their CB radio, then must escape when he turns out to be a psychotic killer.
fields.title: Joy Ride

fields.plot: Follows the cross-country adventures of the pot-smoking duo as they try to outrun authorities who suspect them of being terrorists when they try to sneak a bong on board their flight to Amsterdam.
fields.title: Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay

fields.plot: After local youth Abdel is beaten unconscious by police, a riot ensues on his estate during which a policeman loses his gun. The gun is found by Vinz who threatens he will kill a cop if Abdel dies.
fields.title: La haine

fields.plot: As a Washington psychiatrist unearths the origin of an alien epidemic, she also discovers her son might be the only way it can be stopped.
fields.title: The Invasion

fields.plot: A group of 30-year-olds who have been friends since high school attempt to throw an end-of-summer orgy.
fields.title: A Good Old Fashioned Orgy

fields.plot: A colorful array of characters competes at a national dog show.
fields.title: Best in Show

fields.plot: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits
safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.
fields.title: Sexy Beast

fields.plot: An actress attempts to convince a director how she's perfect for a role in his upcoming production.
fields.title: La Vénus à la fourrure

fields.plot: Stranded on an island, a group of schoolboys degenerate into savagery.
fields.title: Lord of the Flies

fields.plot: A successful lawyer returns to his hometown for his mother's funeral only to discover that his estranged father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder.
fields.title: The Judge

fields.plot: Benjamin Gates must follow a clue left in John Wilkes Booth's diary to prove his ancestor's innocence in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln.
fields.title: National Treasure: Book of Secrets

fields.plot: A high school senior visits college for the weekend, and stay at the wildest house on campus in this classic tale of anti-political-correctness.
fields.title: PCU

fields.plot: After getting into a serious car accident, a TV director discovers an underground sub-culture of scarred, omnisexual car-crash victims who use car accidents and the raw sexual energy they produce to try to rejuvenate his sex life with his wife.
fields.title: Crash

fields.plot: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.
fields.title: Final Destination

fields.plot: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam vet attempts to discover his past while suffering from a severe case of disassociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusion, and perception of death.
fields.title: Jacob's Ladder
Father of the Bride Part II

fields.plot: A young peasant maid working in the house of painter Johannes Vermeer becomes his talented assistant and the model for one of his most famous works.
fields.title: Girl with a Pearl Earring

fields.plot: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.
fields.title: We Were Soldiers

fields.plot: The story follows a married couple, apart for a night while the husband takes a business trip with a colleague to whom he's attracted. While he's resisting temptation, his wife encounters her past love.
fields.title: Last Night

fields.plot: After a sudden attack on the MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy.
fields.title: Johnny English

fields.plot: Harry Tasker is a secret agent for the United States Government. For years, he has kept his job from his wife, but is forced to reveal his identity and try to stop nuclear terrorists when he and his wife are kidnapped by the terrorists.
fields.title: True Lies

fields.plot: Based on the Jack Ketchum novel of the same name, The Girl Next Door follows the unspeakable torture and abuses committed on a teenage girl in the care of her aunt...and the boys who witness and fail to report the crime.
fields.title: The Girl Next Door

fields.plot: The Seasoning House: where young girls are prostituted to the military. An orphaned deaf mute is enslaved to care for them. She moves between the walls and crawlspaces, showing the little kindnesses when she can. When fate brings the men that murdered her family and the reason she ended up in the whore house, a chain of events begins that will end her captivity, free the girls still alive in the house and grant her revenge on the soldiers that destroyed her life.

fields.plot: A coming-of-age story about a shy, young boy sent by his irresponsible mother to spend the summer with his wealthy, eccentric uncles in Texas.
fields.title: Secondhand Lions

fields.plot: A man named Farmer sets out to rescue his kidnapped wife and avenge the death of his son -- two acts committed by the Krugs, a race of animal-warriors who are controlled by the evil Gallian.
fields.title: In the Name of the King: A Dungeon Siege Tale

fields.plot: In a robot world, a young idealistic inventor travels to the big city to join his inspiration's company, only to find himself opposing its sinister new management.
fields.title: Robots

fields.plot: Two men get laid off and have to become stay-at-home dads when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day-care center.
fields.title: Daddy Day Care

fields.plot: A lawyer decides that she's used too much like a nanny by her boss, so she walks out on him.
fields.title: Two Weeks Notice

fields.plot: A popular high school cheerleader becomes pregnant with the star quarterback's child, only to find herself turning to crime to support the lifestyle she wants to live.
fields.title: Sugar & Spice

fields.plot: As computer hacker Lisbeth and journalist Mikael investigate a sex-trafficking ring, Lisbeth is accused of three murders, causing her to go on the run while Mikael works to clear her name.
fields.title: Flickan som lekte med elden

fields.plot: After her sister and brother-in-law die in a car accident, a young woman becomes the guardian of their three children.
fields.title: Raising Helen

fields.plot: A young Chicago advertising executive believes a woman he sees in a café is his long-lost love. His conviction leads to obsession, as he puts his life on hold to trail her.
fields.title: Wicker Park

fields.title: Die Hard 2

fields.title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!

fields.plot: Col. Guile and various other martial arts heroes fight against the tyranny of Dictator M. Bison and his cohorts.
fields.title: Street Fighter

fields.plot: A civilian diving team are enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.
fields.title: The Abyss

fields.plot: Four interlocking tales that take place in a fading hotel on New Year's Eve.
fields.title: Four Rooms

fields.plot: An attorney defends an officer on trial for ordering his troops to fire on civilians after they stormed a U.S. embassy in a third world country.
fields.title: Rules of Engagement

fields.plot: Heath Ledger plays the fabled romantic as a man who, after failing to win the affection of a particular Venetian woman, strives to discover the real meaning of love.
fields.title: Casanova

fields.plot: Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family.
fields.title: Death at a Funeral

fields.plot: Lady avenger returns to western town owned by a ruthless gunslinger hosting an elimination tournament.
fields.title: The Quick and the Dead

fields.plot: On one last road trip before they're sent to serve in Vietnam, two brothers and their girlfriends get into an accident that calls their local sheriff to the scene. Thus begins a terrifying experience where the teens are taken to a secluded house of horrors, where a young, would-be killer is being nurtured.
fields.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning

fields.plot: Refusing to let anything spoil their romantic weekend break, a young couple confront a gang of loutish youths with terrifyingly brutal consequences.
fields.title: Eden Lake

fields.plot: A teen gang in South London defend their block from an alien invasion.

fields.plot: A New Orleans DA discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

fields.plot: An F.B.I. specialist tracks a serial killer who appears to select his victims at random.
fields.title: Manhunter

fields.plot: A coffin-dragging gunslinger enters a town caught between two feuding factions, the KKK and a gang of Mexican Bandits. That man is Django, and he is caught up in a struggle against both parties.

fields.title: The Magnificent Seven

fields.plot: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

fields.plot: A phobic con artist and his protégé are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

fields.plot: A musical based on the New York City newsboy strike of 1899. When young newspaper sellers are exploited beyond reason by their bosses they set out to enact change and are met by the ruthlessness of big business.

fields.plot: Two years after the events of the first film, a new psychopath dons the
costume and a new string of murders begin.

fields.plot: An unemployed actor with a reputation for being difficult disguises himself as a woman to get a role in a soap opera.
fields.title: Tootsie

fields.plot: A young boy accidently joins a band of dwarves as they jump from time-period to time-period looking for treasure to steal.

In this alternate universe, the trio make friends with a primate named Chaka, their only ally in a world full of dinosaurs and other fantastic creatures.

fields.plot: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.
fields.title: Drumline

fields.plot: A biography of artist Frida Kahlo, who channeled the pain of a crippling injury and her tempestuous marriage into her work.
fields.title: Frida

fields.plot: When Sid's attempt to adopt three dinosaur eggs gets him abducted by their real mother to an underground lost world, his friends attempt to rescue him.

fields.title: Hatchet III
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger

fields.plot: Two childhood animal friends find themselves forced to become enemies.
fields.title: The Fox and the Hound

fields.plot: Set in suburban New Jersey the 1960s, a group of friends form a rock band and try to make it big.
fields.title: Not Fade Away

fields.plot: Three teens discover that their neighbor's house is really a living, breathing, scary monster.

fields.plot: Sally and Conrad are two bored kids whose life is turned up-side-down when a talking cat comes to visit them.
