fields.plot: The neighboring gardens of Montague and Capulet are at war, but the gnomes, Gnomeo and Juliet, are in love.
fields.title: Gnomeo & Juliet

fields.plot: A 14-year-old orphan becomes an NBA superstar after trying on a pair of sneakers with the faded initials
inside.
fields.title: Like Mike

fields.plot: Plot unknown. A follow-up to the 2012 film,
fields.title: Snow White and the Huntsman 2

fields.plot: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time and now the life of her own son hangs in the balance.
fields.title: Halloween H20: 20 Years Later

fields.title: Rock Star

fields.plot: A nun, while comforting a convicted killer on death row, empathizes with both the killer and his victim's families.

fields.title: Tekken

fields.title: After the Sunset

fields.title: Cyber

fields.plot: A guy in love with an engaged woman tries to win her over after she asks him to be her maid of honor.
fields.title: Made of Honor

fields.plot: A movie about the independent minded son of Beelzebub and the mischief he creates.
fields.title: Little Nicky

fields.plot: The vampire Lestat becomes a rock star whose music wakes up the queen of all vampires.
fields.title: Queen of the Damned

fields.plot: Sarah Huttinger is a woman who learns that her family was the inspiration for the book and film
-- and that she just might be the offspring of the well-documented event.
fields.title: Rumor Has It...

fields.title: Lethal Weapon 4

fields.title: Norbit

fields.plot: An imprisoned IRA sniper is freed to help stop a brutal, seemingly
assassin from completing his next job.
fields.title: The Jackal

fields.plot: Scientists discover how to make people invisible, but their test subject becomes an insane killer who stalks them.
fields.title: Hollow Man

fields.title: Edge of Darkness

fields.title: Walking Tall

fields.title: Concussion

fields.title: What a Girl Wants

fields.title: Death Becomes Her

fields.title: Air Force One

fields.title: The Broken Circle Breakdown

fields.title: AVPR: Aliens vs Predator - Requiem

fields.plot: The two best hired guns in the West must save President Grant from the clutches of a 19th century inventor-villain.

fields.plot: In Los Angeles in 1970, drug-fueled detective Larry
Sportello investigates the disappearance of a former girlfriend.

fields.title: The Omen

fields.title: No Reservations

fields.title: Never Say Never Again

fields.plot: A soon-to-be-married man encounters an exciting stranger after his plane suffers an accident on takeoff.

fields.title: Lola rennt

fields.plot: A comedy about four teenagers in 1978 who try to scam their way into a KISS concert.
fields.title: Detroit Rock City

fields.plot: A college dropout gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it sounds.

fields.plot: At a big campus, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self respect.
fields.title: Revenge of the Nerds

fields.plot: The three-year romance between 19th century poet John Keats and Fanny Brawne.
fields.title: Bright Star

fields.plot: In 1997, when the US President crashes into Manhattan, now a giant max. security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in for a rescue.
fields.title: Escape from New York

fields.title: Did You Hear About the Morgans?

fields.title: Cold in July

fields.title: Beaches

fields.plot: Young lovers Hero and Claudio, soon to wed, conspire to get verbal sparring partners and confirmed singles Benedick and Beatrice to wed as well.
fields.title: Much Ado About Nothing

fields.plot: The story of the love affair between FDR and his distant cousin Margaret
Suckley, centered around the weekend in 1939 when the King and Queen of the United Kingdom visited upstate New York.
fields.title: Hyde Park on Hudson

fields.plot: The Little family adopt a charming young mouse named Stuart, but the family cat wants rid of him.
fields.title: Stuart Little

fields.plot: After hunting down and killing hundreds of violent criminals, Frank Castle, aka The Punisher, faces his most deadly foe yet: Jigsaw.
fields.title: Punisher: War Zone

fields.plot: An ex-marine teacher struggles to connect with her students in an inner city schools.

fields.plot: A teenager has to deal with his girlfriend dumping him among family crises, homicidal paper boys, and a rival skier.

fields.title: Bonnie and Clyde

fields.title: Saw V

fields.title: Passion Play

fields.plot: It's 1987 and Danielle, the high school 'Dirty Girl', is running away. With her is chubby, gay Clarke, a bag of flour called Joan and a Walkman full of glorious '80s tunes.

fields.title: Stay

fields.title: An Officer and a Gentleman

fields.title: The Last Ride

fields.title: Big Trouble in Little China

fields.plot: Agent Strahm is dead and framed while Hoffman continues John's legacy while Jill carries out John's final request.
fields.title: Saw VI

fields.plot: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.
fields.title: Conan the Destroyer

fields.plot: A former CIA operative turned political talk show host is hired by a corporate whistle blower to expose her company's cover-up of a massacre in a South American village.
fields.title: The Truth

fields.title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids

fields.title: Java Heat

fields.title: The Spy Who Loved Me

fields.title: Rush Hour 3

fields.title: Mona Lisa Smile

fields.plot: A group of National Guard trainees find themselves battling against a vicious group of mutants on their last day of training in the desert.
fields.title: The Hills Have Eyes II

fields.title: Blue Crush

fields.title: Straight A's

fields.plot: US Marshal Samuel Gerard (Jones) and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan (Snipes), a murderer and robber.
fields.title: U.S. Marshals

fields.title: Arthur

fields.title: xXx: The Return of Xander Cage

fields.title: The Fly

fields.plot: An elderly Margaret Thatcher talks to the imagined presence of her recently deceased husband as she struggles to come to terms with his death while scenes from her past life, from girlhood to British prime minister, intervene.

fields.plot: In this film, we see the world through the eyes of main character Justice, a young African-American poet. A mail carrier invites a few friends along for a long overnight delivery run.
fields.title: Poetic Justice

fields.plot: An elderly ex-serviceman and widower looks to avenge his best friend's murder by doling out his own form of justice.
fields.title: Harry Brown

fields.plot: Tom Regan, an advisor to a Prohibition-era crime boss, tries to keep the peace between warring mobs but gets caught in divided loyalties.
fields.title: Miller's Crossing

fields.plot: Set in Stalin-era Soviet Union, a disgraced MGB agent is dispatched to investigate a series of child murders -- a case that begins to connect with the very top of party leadership.
fields.title: Child 44

fields.plot: Set in the 1960s, three sisters form girl group and soon become local sensations with major label interest, but fame becomes a challenge as the close-knit family begins to fall apart.
fields.title: Sparkle

fields.plot: Set during the time of the first outbreak of bubonic plague in England, a young monk is given the task of learning the truth about reports of people being brought back to life in a small village.

fields.plot: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.
fields.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'

fields.plot: Fioravante decides to become a professional Don Juan as a way of making money to help his cash-strapped friend, Murray. With Murray acting as his
, the duo quickly finds themselves caught up in the crosscurrents of love and money.
fields.title: Fading Gigolo

fields.plot: Two female vampires in modern-day New York City are faced with daunting romantic possibilities.
fields.title: Vamps

fields.plot: Warrior/pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.
fields.title: Kaze no tani no Naushika

fields.plot: Sworn enemies find themselves in each other's bodies, and use this to ruin each other's lives.
fields.title: It's a Boy Girl Thing

fields.plot: A misfit bunch of friends come together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.
fields.title: Silverado

fields.plot: Master explorer Dirk Pitt goes on the adventure of a lifetime of seeking out a lost Civil War battleship known as the
in the deserts of West Africa while helping a WHO doctor being hounded by a ruthless dictator.
fields.title: Sahara

fields.plot: Set in the near future when artificial organs can be bought on credit, it revolves around a man who struggles to make the payments on a heart he has purchased. He must therefore go on the run before said ticker is repossessed.
fields.title: Repo Men

fields.plot: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's position in 18th Century aristocracy.
fields.title: Barry Lyndon

fields.plot: A 16-year-old girl takes her parents hostage after they miss her big jump-roping competition.
fields.title: Family Weekend

fields.plot: Orphaned high school student Rick Riker is bitten by a radioactive dragonfly, develops super powers (except for the ability to fly), and becomes a hero.
fields.title: Superhero Movie

fields.plot: All the couples are back for a wedding in Las Vegas, but plans for a romantic weekend go awry when their various misadventures get them into some compromising situations that threaten to derail the big event.

fields.title: The Girl Who Played with Fire

fields.title: Soylent Green

of their crime.

The story of two men on different sides of a prison riot -- the inmate leading the rebellion and the young guard trapped in the revolt, who poses as a prisoner in a desperate attempt to survive the ordeal.

fields.plot: Centering on Ip Man's migration to Hong Kong in 1949 as he attempts to propagate his discipline of Wing Chun martial arts.

contracts rabies and conducts a reign of terror on a small American town.

fields.title: The Rocketeer

fields.plot: Hysterical Californians prepare for a Japanese invasion in the days after Pearl Harbor.
Tommy Jarvis goes to the graveyard to get rid of Jason Voorhees' body, but he accidentally brings him back to life. Jason wants revenge and Tommy must defeat him once and for all!
fields.title: Jason Lives: Friday the 13th Part VI

fields.plot: Porter is shot by his wife and best friend and is left to die. When he survives he plots revenge.
fields.title: Payback
Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit

fields.plot: Jason Voorhees returns with a new look, a new machete, and his same murderous attitude as he is awakened on a spaceship in the 25th century.
fields.title: Jason X

fields.plot: Generation X Graduates face life after college with a filmmaker looking for work and love in Houston.
fields.title: Reality Bites

fields.plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.
fields.title: Cocoon

fields.plot: The comedy team takes a look at life in all its stages in their own uniquely silly way.
fields.title: The Meaning of Life

fields.plot: A Las Vegas casino magnate, determined to find a new avenue for wagering, sets up a race for money.
fields.title: Rat Race

fields.plot: A drama set in New Mexico during WWII, centered on the relationship between a young man and an elderly medicine woman who helps him contend with the battle between good and evil that rages in his village.
fields.title: Bless Me, Ultima

fields.plot: An ex-tennis pro carries out a plot to murder his wife. When things go wrong, he improvises a brilliant plan B.
fields.title: Dial M for Murder

fields.plot: A look at the relationship between Marie Antoinette and one of her readers during the first days of the French Revolution.
fields.title: Les adieux à la reine

fields.plot: A young woman struggles with depression during her first year at Harvard. Based on Elizabeth Wurtzel's novel.
fields.title: Prozac Nation

fields.plot: A marshall, personally compelled to face a returning deadly enemy, finds that his own town refuses to help him.
fields.title: High Noon

fields.plot: In London, four very different people team up to commit armed robbery, then try to doublecross each other for the loot.
fields.title: A Fish Called Wanda

fields.plot: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. However, things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.

fields.plot: A young street hustler attempts to escape the rigors and temptations of the ghetto in a quest for a better life.
fields.title: Menace II Society

fields.plot: When werewolf chief Jack Ferris is accidentally killed in a strip club the girls who work there have until the next full moon before his bloodthirsty wolfpack seek murderous retribution
fields.title: Strippers vs Werewolves

fields.plot: A freak tsunami traps shoppers at a coastal Australian supermarket inside the building - along with a 12-foot Great White Shark.
fields.title: Bait

fields.plot: Darius Stone, a new agent in the XXX program, is sent to Washington, DC to defuse a power struggle amongst national leaders.
fields.title: xXx: State of the Union

fields.plot: A group of teenagers get ready for their high school prom.
fields.title: Prom

fields.plot: A former drug lord returns from prison determined to wipe out all his competition and distribute the profits of his operations to New York's poor and lower classes in this stylish and ultra violent modern twist on Robin Hood.
fields.title: King of New York

fields.plot: An uptight NYC lawyer takes her two teenagers to her hippie mother's farmhouse upstate for a family vacation.
fields.title: Peace, Love, & Misunderstanding

fields.plot: After a young man's premonition of a deadly race-car crash helps saves the lives of his peers, Death sets out to collect those who evaded their end.
fields.title: The Final Destination

fields.plot: During their first year of high school, four best girlfriends face off against the domineering student body president who wants to split them up into different social cliques.
fields.title: Bratz

fields.plot: Amidst a territorial gang-war, a sophisticated alien hunter stalks the citizens of Los Angeles and the only man between him and his prey is veteran LAPD officer, Lieutenant Mike Harrigan.
fields.title: Predator 2

fields.plot: A '40s period piece which revolves around an American expat who returns to Shanghai in the months before Pearl Harbor due to the death of his friend.
fields.title: Shanghai

fields.plot: The big screen adaptation of Perry's stage play about the trials of marriage, and what happens to one family when a sexy young temptress arrives on the scene.
fields.title: Why Did I Get Married?

fields.plot: After his career is sidelined from an unexpected tragedy and a personal blowup, a single man must take care of his precocious daughter.
fields.title: Jersey Girl

fields.plot: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.
fields.title: The Good Girl

fields.plot: Set in 1999 Los Angeles, veteran police officer Dave Brown, the last of the renegade cops, works to take care of his family, and struggles for his own survival.
fields.title: Rampart

fields.plot: A computer specialist is sued for sexual harassment by a former lover turned boss who initiated the act forcefully, which threatens both his career and his personal life.

fields.plot: CIA Analyst Jack Ryan is drawn into an illegal war fought by the US government against a Colombian drug cartel.

fields.plot: John looks to take down Luc Deveraux after a home invasion claims his wife and daughter. The fight pits John against Andrew Scott and an army of genetically enhanced warriors; meanwhile, he must contend with a UniSol in relentless pursuit.
fields.title: Universal Soldier: Day of Reckoning

fields.plot: Filmed at a sold-out performance at Madison Square Garden, comedian Kevin Hart delivers material from his 2012
concert tour.
fields.title: Kevin Hart: Let Me Explain

fields.plot: Futuristic action about a man who meets a clone of himself and stumbles into a grand conspiracy about clones taking over the world.
fields.title: The 6th Day

fields.plot: The true story about an honest New York cop who blew the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

fields.plot: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

fields.plot: A working mother puts herself through law school in an effort to represent her brother, who has been wrongfully convicted of murder and has exhausted his chances to appeal his conviction through public defenders.

fields.plot: A young American and his English wife come to rural England and face increasingly vicious local harassment.
fields.title: Straw Dogs

fields.plot: A chronicle of a young man's rise to power in Paris via his manipulation of the city's most influential and wealthy women.

fields.plot: A pair of losers try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, but the murderer is out to 'finish him off'.
fields.title: Weekend at Bernie's

fields.plot: The blood of a primitive fish exposed to gamma rays causes a benign research professor to regress to an ape-like, bloodthirsty prehistoric hominid.
fields.title: Monster on the Campus

fields.plot: While traveling in continental Europe, a rich young playgirl realizes that an elderly lady seems to have disappeared from the train.
fields.title: The Lady Vanishes

fields.plot: Five years after jilting his pregnant fiancée on their wedding day, out-of-shape Dennis decides to run a marathon to win her back.

fields.plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.
fields.title: He Got Game

fields.plot: In small town Alaska, a news reporter recruits his ex-girlfriend - a Greenpeace volunteer - on a campaign to save a family of gray whales trapped by rapidly forming ice in the Arctic Circle.

fields.plot: Set in a dystopian future where corporate brands have created a disillusioned population, one man's effort to unlock the truth behind the conspiracy will lead to an epic battle with hidden forces that control the world.

fields.plot: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.
fields.title: The Horse Whisperer

fields.plot: A Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from an Indian tribe.
fields.title: The Searchers

fields.plot: An update of the 1977 comedy, Dick and Jane are living the good life. That is until Dick (Jim Carrey) loses his job shortly after getting a promotion that convinced his wife Jane (Téa Leoni) to quit her job. The money is gone, and the house ends up in foreclosure. Dick decides to turn to a hilarious life of crime to pay the bills with his lovely wife by his side. Then together they decide it's time to steal back what Former CEO Jack McCallister (Alec Baldwin) had stolen from them.

fields.plot: Lovers lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

fields.plot: Vignettes about eight different couples at varying points in their relationships, each having conversations immediately after having sex.
fields.title: After Sex

fields.plot: A vulcanologist arrives at a countryside named Dante's Peak after a long dormant volcano, which has recently been named the second most desirable place to live in America, and discovers that Dante's Peak, may wake up at any moment.

fields.plot: A US Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers in World War II.
fields.title: The Dirty Dozen

fields.plot: An accountant is chased by bounty hunters, the FBI, and the Mafia after jumping bail.
fields.title: Midnight Run

fields.plot: In New York City, a young counterfeiter is introduced to the world of underground street fighting by a seasoned scam artist, who becomes his manager on the bare-knuckling brawling circuit.

fields.plot: Loretta Castorini, a book keeper from Brooklyn, New York, finds herself in a difficult situation when she falls for the brother of the man she agreed to marry (the best friend of her late husband who died seven years previously).

fields.plot: A single mother, with dreams of becoming a writer, has a son at the age of 15 in 1965, and goes through a failed marriage with the drug-addicted father.
fields.title: Riding in Cars with Boys

fields.plot: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.
fields.title: Entrapment

fields.plot: A romantic comedy about a naive man who comes out into the world after being in a nuclear fallout shelter for 35 years.
fields.title: Blast from the Past

fields.plot: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.
fields.title: Un long dimanche de fiançailles

fields.plot: A soon-to-be husband wakes up on the morning after his bachelor party in bed with another woman.
fields.title: A Guy Thing

fields.plot: A betrayed intelligence officer enlists the aid of a prostitute to prove his innocence from a deadly conspiracy while returning a favor to her.
fields.title: Kiss of the Dragon

fields.plot: You wake day after day to the comfort and security of your home. But how safe is it really?
fields.title: Mientras duermes

fields.plot: American-born Gogol, the son of Indian immigrants, wants to fit in among his fellow New Yorkers, despite his family's unwillingness to let go of their traditional ways.

fields.plot: An ordinary man sees a bright light descend from the sky, and discovers he now has super-intelligence and telekinesis.

fields.plot: The Cortez siblings set out for a mysterious island, where they encounter a genetic scientist and a set of rival spy kids.
fields.title: Spy Kids 2: Island of Lost Dreams

fields.plot: A documentary that follows former U.S. Labor Secretary Robert Reich as he looks to raise awareness of the country's widening economic gap.
fields.title: Inequality for All

fields.plot: Five best friends, all married, decide to share a loft apartment.
fields.title: Loft

fields.plot: When Robert, a tire, discovers his destructive telepathic powers, he soon sets his sights on a desert town; in particular, a mysterious woman becomes his obsession.
fields.title: Rubber

fields.plot: A man must struggle to travel home for Thanksgiving, with an obnoxious slob of a shower ring salesman his only companion.
fields.title: Planes, Trains & Automobiles

fields.plot: A women suffering from amnesia begins to recover her memories after trouble from her past finds her again.
fields.title: The Long Kiss Goodnight

fields.plot: A young woman who has been in and out from rehab for the past 10 years returns home for the weekend for her sister's wedding.

fields.plot: An absent-minded professor discovers
a rubber-like super-bouncy substance.
fields.title: Flubber

fields.plot: Circumstances force a young divorcée to move back in with her parents in suburban Connecticut, where an affair with a younger guy rejuvenates her passion for life
fields.title: Hello I Must Be Going

fields.plot: A secret admirer's crush on a high school athlete takes a fatal turn.

fields.plot: A sex-addicted con-man pays for his mother's hospital bills by playing on the sympathies of those who rescue him from choking to death.
fields.title: Choke

fields.plot: A mentally ill young woman finds her love in an eccentric man who models himself after Buster Keaton.
fields.title: Benny & Joon

fields.plot: A worldwide epidemic encourages a biotech company to launch an organ-financing program similar in nature to a standard car loan. The repossession clause is a killer, however.
fields.title: Repo! The Genetic Opera

fields.plot: A robot boy and a human boy team up to save their respective parents, who are being held captive by the organization that funded the robot's creator.
fields.title: Robosapien: Rebooted

fields.plot: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.
fields.title: The Hole

fields.plot: A man from Los Angeles, who moved to New York years ago, returns to L.A. to figure out his life while he house-sits for his brother. He soon sparks with his brother's assistant.
fields.title: Greenberg

fields.title: Rebecca

fields.plot: The son of a slain NYPD officer joins the force, where he falls in with his father's former partner and a team of rogue cops.
fields.title: Freelancers

fields.plot: Two psychotic young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic
with one another for their own amusement.
fields.title: Funny Games

fields.plot: The true story of Billy Hayes, an American college student who is caught smuggling drugs out of Turkey and thrown into prison.
fields.title: Midnight Express

fields.plot: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.
fields.title: Los cronocrímenes

fields.plot: An all guts, no glory San Francisco cop becomes determined to find the underworld kingpin that killed the witness in his protection.
fields.title: Bullitt

fields.plot: Plot unknown.
fields.title: Horrible Bosses 2

fields.plot: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.
fields.title: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter

fields.plot: A washed-up writer forms an unlikely friendship with a teenager from Long Island.
fields.title: Paper Man

fields.title: The Angels' Share

fields.plot: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.
fields.title: The X Files

fields.plot: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she's dreamed of having.
fields.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason

fields.plot: A scientist makes a last stand on Earth with the help of a ragtag team of soldiers against an invasion of alien phantoms.
fields.title: Final Fantasy: The Spirits Within

fields.plot: A biographical portrait of a pre-fame Jane Austen and her romance with a young Irishman.
fields.title: Becoming Jane

fields.plot: After a drunken house party with his straight mates, Russell heads out to a gay club. Just before closing time he picks up Glen but what's expected to be just a one-night stand becomes something else, something special.
fields.title: Weekend

fields.plot: A young singer/songwriter, despite being married, becomes involved with her new guitarist, who she soon discovers has a dark past and may be a danger to her and those close to her.
fields.title: Plush

fields.plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintupelets, their lives get more complicated than they anticipated.
fields.title: Raising Arizona

fields.plot: Plot unknown
fields.title: Frankenstein

fields.plot: A self-destructive writer struggles with her personal issues and embarks on the difficult road to recovery.
fields.title: Your Voice in My Head

fields.plot: A homeless vigilante blows away crooked cops, pedophile Santas, and other scumbags with his trusty pump-action shotgun.
fields.title: Hobo with a Shotgun

fields.plot: A young writer insinuates herself into the life of a Broadway producer.
fields.title: Black Widow

fields.plot: An avenging cop seeks out his brother's killer and falls for the daughter of a businessman who is involved in a money-deal with his father.
fields.title: Romeo Must Die

fields.plot: A grizzled little league coach (Thornton) tries to turn his team of misfits into champs.
fields.title: Bad News Bears

fields.plot: In an attempt to save his marriage, A firefighter uses a 40-day experiment known as
fields.title: Fireproof

fields.plot: Things get raucously funny aboard the maiden flight of a black-owned airline, thanks to some last-minute passenger additions.
fields.title: Soul Plane

fields.plot: Two women get into a lot of trouble when they go to their high school reunion and lie about their lives after twelfth grade.
fields.title: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion

fields.plot: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.
fields.title: The Maltese Falcon

fields.plot: A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.
fields.title: Perfect Stranger

fields.plot: A ski vacation turns horrific for a group of medical students, as they find themselves confronted by an unimaginable menace: Nazi zombies.
fields.title: Død snø

fields.plot: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest called FernGully fight to save their home that is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.
fields.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest

fields.plot: A faulty computer causes a passenger space shuttle to head straight for the Sun. Can Ted Striker save the day and get the shuttle back on track--again???
fields.title: Airplane II: The Sequel

fields.plot: A young boy stumbles onto a witch convention and must stop them, even after he has been turned into a mouse.
fields.title: The Witches

fields.plot: The Bandit is hired on to run a tractor trailer full of beer over county lines in hot pursuit by a pesky sheriff.
fields.title: Smokey and the Bandit

fields.plot: A documentary on peer-to-peer bullying in schools across America.
fields.title: Bully

fields.plot: Corky, a tough female ex con and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caeser.
fields.title: Bound

fields.plot: A group of diamond thieves on the run kidnap the wife of a recently discharged marine who goes on a chase through the South Carolinian wilderness to retrieve her.
fields.title: The Marine

fields.plot: A remake of the 1976 horror classic The Omen (1976), an American official realizes that his young son may literally be the devil incarnate.
fields.title: The Omen

fields.plot: A spoof of vampire-themed movies, where teenager Becca finds herself torn between two boys. As she and her friends wrestle with a number of different dramas, everything comes to a head at their prom.
fields.title: Vampires Suck

fields.plot: After realizing she is not her boyfriend's primary lover, a woman teams up with his wife and plots mutual revenge.
fields.title: The Other Woman

fields.plot: Wallace and his loyal dog, Gromit, set out to discover the mystery behind the garden sabotage that plagues their village and threatens the annual giant vegetable growing contest.
fields.title: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit

fields.plot: In the not too distant future, people struggle to survive their greatest enemy, the sun.
fields.title: Hell

fields.plot: An affair between a young woman and a pastor has disastrous consequences.
fields.title: The Scarlet Letter

fields.plot: Three bad girls travel to a remote desert hideaway to steal 200 million in diamonds from a ruthless underworld kingpin.
fields.title: Bitch Slap

fields.plot: Tells the story of a city girl who moves to a small town and becomes entangled in a love triangle between her high school teacher and a stoner classmate.
fields.title: Daydream Nation

fields.plot: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.
fields.title: A Night at the Roxbury

fields.plot: An espionage thriller set in WWII-era Shanghai, in which a young woman, Wang Jiazhi, gets swept up in a dangerous game of emotional intrigue with a powerful political figure, Mr. Yee.
fields.title: Se, jie

fields.plot: Seven close friends reunite for the wedding of two of their friends. Problems arise because the bride and the maid of honor have had a long rivalry over the groom.
fields.title: The Romantics

fields.plot: Extreme measures are necessary to contain an epidemic of a deadly airborne virus. But how extreme, exactly?
fields.title: Outbreak

fields.plot: When a man is diagnosed with terminal cancer, he takes custody of his misanthropic teenage son, for whom quality time means getting high, engaging in small-time prostitution, and avoiding his father.
fields.title: Life as a House

fields.plot: A London woman's love life and career both hinge, unknown to her, on whether or not she catches a train. We see it both ways, in parallel.
fields.title: Sliding Doors

fields.plot: Four men set out in the Wild West to rescue a group of captives from cannibalistic cave dwellers.
fields.title: Bone Tomahawk

fields.plot: Based on the very underground comic book, a Tibetan monk becomes a mentor to a young street kid whom he can teach to protect a scroll.
fields.title: Bulletproof Monk

fields.plot: The Brothers Bloom are the best con men in the world, swindling millionaires with complex scenarios of lust and intrigue. Now they've decided to take on one last job - showing a beautiful and eccentric heiress the time of her life with a romantic adventure that takes them around the world.
fields.title: The Brothers Bloom

fields.plot: A young man learns that he has to find a hidden Earth ship before an enemy alien species does in order to secure the survival of humanity.
fields.title: Titan A.E.

fields.plot: When an alcoholic relapses, causing him to lose his wife and his job, he holds a yard sale on his front lawn in an attempt to start over. A new neighbor might be the key to his return to form.
fields.title: Everything Must Go

fields.plot: The dedicated but tyrannical Joe Clark is appointed the principal of a decaying inner-city school that he is determined to improve.
fields.title: Lean on Me

fields.plot: A successful, single businesswoman who dreams of having a baby discovers she is infertile and hires a working class woman to be her unlikely surrogate.
fields.title: Baby Mama

fields.plot: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.
fields.title: Back to School

fields.plot: Young woman engaged to be married finds herself in an affair with her stepmother's lesbian daughter.
fields.title: Kyss mig

fields.plot: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.
fields.title: Ôdishon

fields.plot: A multi-strand narrative set in early 1980's Los Angeles, centered on an array of characters who represent both the top of the heap (a Hollywood dream merchant, a dissolute rock star, an aging newscaster) and the bottom (a voyeuristic doorman, an amoral ex-con). Connecting the intertwining strands are a group of beautiful, blonde young men and women who sleep all day and party all night, doing drugs -- and one another --with abandon, never realizing that they are dancing on the edge of a volcano.
fields.title: The Informers

fields.plot: When the four boys see an R-rated movie featuring Canadians Terrance & Phillip, they are pronounced
, and their parents pressure the United States to wage war against Canada.
fields.title: South Park: Bigger Longer & Uncut

fields.plot: In order to raise the tuition to send her young son to private school, a mom starts an unusual business -- a biohazard removal/crime scene clean-up service -- with her unreliable sister.
fields.title: Sunshine Cleaning

fields.plot: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.
fields.title: Crocodile Dundee

fields.plot: A comic allegory about a traveling Bushman who encounters modern civilization and its stranger aspects, including a clumsy scientist and a band of revolutionaries.
fields.title: The Gods Must Be Crazy

fields.plot: A veteran secret agent takes a young upstart under his wing.
fields.title: The Secret Service

fields.plot: A teacher is assigned to be the principal of a violence and crime ridden high school.
fields.title: The Principal

fields.plot: The vampire Djuna resists the advances of Paolo, but soon gives in to their passion. When her trouble-making sister unexpectedly comes to visit, Djuna's love is threatened, and the whole vampire community becomes endangered.
fields.title: Kiss of the Damned

fields.plot: Set in the 1930s Arab states at the dawn of the oil boom, the story centers on a young Arab prince torn between allegiance to his conservative father and modern, liberal father-in-law.
fields.title: Black Gold

fields.plot: A dramatization of the one possibly successful escape from the notorious prison.
fields.title: Escape from Alcatraz

fields.plot: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.
fields.title: Candyman

fields.plot: Pitka an American raised outside of his country by gurus, returns to the States in order to break into the self-help business. His first challenge: To settle the romantic troubles and subsequent professional skid of a star hockey player whose wife left him for a rival athlete.
fields.title: The Love Guru

fields.plot: When two brothers organize the robbery of their parents' jewelry store the job goes horribly wrong, triggering a series of events that sends them, their father and one brother's wife hurtling towards a shattering climax.
fields.title: Before the Devil Knows You're Dead

fields.plot: Plaid-skirted schoolgirls are groomed by a secret government agency to become the newest members of the elite national-defense group, D.E.B.S.
fields.title: D.E.B.S.

fields.plot: A comedy centered around three characters: an everyday guy who comes to believe he's a superhero, his psychiatrist, and the teenager he befriends.
fields.title: Defendor

fields.plot: Three juvenile delinquents arrive at a correctional center and are put under the care of an experienced guard.
fields.title: Dog Pound

fields.plot: Set on the east coast of New Zealand in the year 1984, Boy, an 11-year-old kid and devout Michael Jackson fan gets a chance to know his father, who has returned to find a bag of money he buried years ago.
fields.title: Boy

fields.plot: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.
fields.title: The Lizzie McGuire Movie

fields.plot: When a family of raccoons discover worms living underneath the sod in Jeff and Nealy's backyard, this pest problem begins a darkly comic and wild chain reaction of domestic tension, infidelity and murder.
fields.title: The Details

fields.plot: Young lovers Sailor and Lula run from the variety of weirdos that Lula's mom has hired to kill Sailor.
fields.title: Wild at Heart

fields.plot: The true story of Selena Quintanilla-Perez, a Texas-born Tejano singer who rose from cult status to performing at the Astrodome, as well as having chart topping albums on the Latin music charts.
fields.title: Selena

fields.plot: The world famous singing pre-teen chipmunk trio return to contend with the pressures of school, celebrity, and a rival female music group known as The Chipettes.
fields.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Squeakquel

fields.plot: A young doctor causes a traffic accident in a small town and is sentenced to work for some days at the town hospital.
fields.title: Doc Hollywood

fields.plot: A Latina spin on Jane Austen's
where two spoiled sisters who have been left penniless after their father's sudden death are forced to move in with their estranged aunt in East Los Angeles.
fields.title: From Prada to Nada

fields.plot: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.
fields.title: Forbidden Planet

fields.plot: An abused wife heads to California to become a movie star while her nephew back in Alabama has to deal with a racially-motivated murder involving a corrupt sheriff.
fields.title: Crazy in Alabama

fields.plot: The true story of an argentine family who lived with Josef Mengele without knowing his true identity, and of a girl who fell in love with one of the biggest criminals of all times.
fields.title: Wakolda

fields.plot: A gorgeous young automobile fanatic--and front to the hottest unsigned band on the West coast--finds herself caught up in illegal drag-racing competitions organized by exotic car fanatics.
fields.title: Redline

fields.plot: Bob, a cab-driving serial killer who stalks his prey on the city streets alongside his reluctant protégé Tim, who must make a life or death choice between following in Bob's footsteps or breaking free from his captor.
fields.title: Chained

fields.plot: A young punk drifter heading to Vegas to pay off his gambling debt before the Russian mafia kills him, is forced to stop in a Arizona town where everything that can go wrong, does go wrong for him.
fields.title: U Turn

fields.plot: A recent college graduate who believes she's destined to be a great poet, instead winds up working for an adult book store.
fields.title: Adult World

fields.plot: A pair of working-class brothers flee their Reno Motel after getting involved in a fatal hit-and-run accident.
fields.title: The Motel Life

fields.plot: A dispossessed, violent man who's life is a disastrous attempt to exist outside the social order. Successively deprived of parents and homes and with few other ties, Ballard descends literally and figuratively to the level of a cave dweller as he falls deeper into crime and degradation.
fields.title: Child of God

fields.plot: A successful asset manager, who has just received a huge promotion, is blissfully happy in his career and in his marriage. But when a temp worker starts stalking him, all the things he's worked so hard for are placed in jeopardy.
fields.title: Obsessed

fields.plot: A single mother is swept into a dark underworld, while her teenage son discovers a road that leads him to a secret underwater town.
fields.title: How to Catch a Monster

fields.plot: A young hoodlum rises up through the ranks of the Chicago underworld, even as a gangster's accidental death threatens to spark a bloody mob war.
fields.title: The Public Enemy

fields.plot: A variety of horrible poisonous spiders get exposed to a noxious chemical that causes them to grow to monumental proportions.
fields.title: Eight Legged Freaks

fields.plot: On a US nuclear missile sub, a young first officer stages a mutiny to prevent his trigger happy captain from launching his missiles before confirming his orders to do so.
fields.title: Crimson Tide

fields.plot: During an outrageous memorial for a Southern patriarch, an unexpected romance blooms between a young woman and man.
fields.title: Elizabethtown

fields.plot: A monster emerges from Seoul's Han River and focuses its attention on attacking people. One victim's loving family does what it can to rescue her from its clutches.
fields.title: Gwoemul

fields.plot: A grown-up woman, who kept her childish instincts and behavior, start working as a nanny of a 8-year-old girl, who actually acts like an adult. But in the end everything turns to its right places
fields.title: Uptown Girls

fields.plot: Bumbling Inspector Clouseau must solve the murder of a famous soccer coach and find out who stole the infamous Pink Panther diamond.
fields.title: The Pink Panther

fields.plot: Five friends who share a loft for their extramarital affairs begin to question one another after the body of an unknown woman is found in the property.
fields.title: The Loft

fields.plot: Jack Conrad is awaiting the death penalty in a corrupt Central American prison. He is

by a wealthy television producer and taken to a desolate island where he must fight to the death against nine other condemned killers from all corners of the world, with freedom going to the sole survivor.
fields.title: The Condemned

fields.plot: A college student, branded a loser by his roommates and booted from the dorm, falls in love with a coed who has eyes for their condescending professor.
fields.title: Loser

fields.plot: The wife of a British Judge is caught in a self-destructive love affair with a Royal Air Force pilot.
fields.title: The Deep Blue Sea

fields.plot: Rusty James, an absent-minded street thug struggles to live up to his legendary older brother's reputation, and longs for the days when gang warfare was going on.
fields.title: Rumble Fish

fields.plot: An ingenue insinuates herself in to the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.
fields.title: All About Eve

fields.plot: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.
fields.title: Exit Wounds

fields.plot: A man working at his parents' motel in the Catskills inadvertently sets in motion the generation-defining concert in the summer of 1969.
fields.title: Taking Woodstock

fields.plot: When
tries to derail a black candidate's presidential campaign, Undercover Brother and his fellow secret agents come to the rescue.
fields.title: Undercover Brother

fields.plot: Tim Avery, an aspiring cartoonist, finds himself in a predicament when his dog stumbles upon the mask of Loki. Then after conceiving an infant son
, he discovers just how looney child raising can be.
fields.title: Son of the Mask

fields.plot: Using state-of-the-art equipment, a group of activists, led by renowned dolphin trainer Ric O'Barry, infiltrate a cove near Taijii, Japan to expose both a shocking instance of animal abuse and a serious threat to human health.
fields.title: The Cove

fields.plot: A pastor preoccupied with writing the perfect sermon fails to realize that his wife is having an affair and his children are up to no good.
fields.title: Keeping Mum

fields.plot: An animated retelling of Charles Dickens' classic novel about a Victorian-era miser taken on a journey of self-redemption, courtesy of several mysterious Christmas apparitions.
fields.title: A Christmas Carol

fields.plot: Daniel accompanies his mentor to Okinawa who is off to see his dying father and confront his old rival, while Daniel inadvertently makes an enemy of his own.
fields.title: The Karate Kid, Part II

fields.plot: Nearly a year after a botched job, a hitman takes a new assignment with the promise of a big payoff for three killings. What starts off as an easy task soon unravels, sending the killer into the heart of darkness.
fields.title: Kill List

fields.plot: The story of the romance between the King of Siam and the widowed British schoolteacher Anna Leonowens during the 1860's.
fields.title: Anna and the King

fields.plot: Boog, a domesticated 900lb. Grizzly bear finds himself stranded in the woods 3 days before Open Season. Forced to rely on Elliot, a fast-talking mule deer, the two form an unlikely friendship and must quickly rally other forest animals if they are to form a rag-tag army against the hunters.
fields.title: Open Season

fields.plot: 1997, Captain Nascimento has to find a substitute for his occupation while trying to take down drug dealers and criminals before the Pope comes to Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
fields.title: Tropa de Elite

fields.plot: A serial killer is murdering London women with a necktie. The police have a suspect... but he's the wrong man.
fields.title: Frenzy

fields.plot: A team of parapsychologists try to figure out a strange phenomenon occurring in an apartment building.
fields.title: Emergo

fields.plot: After a young woman suffers a brutal rape in a bar one night, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who encouraged and cheered on the attack.
fields.title: The Accused

fields.plot: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.
fields.title: Seven Years in Tibet

fields.plot: Mulder and Scully are called back to duty by the FBI when a former priest claims to be receiving psychic visions pertaining to a kidnapped agent.
fields.title: The X Files: I Want to Believe

fields.plot: Based on the true story of the First Jamacian bobsled team trying to make it to the winter olympics.
fields.title: Cool Runnings

fields.plot: Five kids are left home when their mother leaves town on a three-month vacation to Australia, only to have their geriatric babysitter die of a heart attack, leading to the eldest teen, Sue Ellen, to scam her way into taking a job at a hip Los Angeles fashion company to feed and support her needy siblings.
fields.title: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead

fields.plot: Based on actual events, John, a New Orleans native and combat Marine, risks his life in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina for the safety and rescue of 244 people trapped in his apartment building.
fields.title: The American Can

fields.plot: Details the graphic and shocking, yet undeniably tragic story of Rome's most infamous Caesar, Gaius Germanicus Caligula.
fields.title: Caligola

fields.plot: Adam, a lonely man with Asperger's Syndrome, develops a relationship with his upstairs neighbor, Beth.
fields.title: Adam

fields.plot: The adventures of the Lafayette Escadrille, young Americans who volunteered for the French military before the U.S. entered World War I, and became the country's first fighter pilots.
fields.title: Flyboys

fields.plot: Two British agents (John Steed and Emma Peel) team up to stop Sir August De Wynter from destroying the world with a weather changing machine.
fields.title: The Avengers

fields.plot: A woman gets caught up in an international diamond heist that draws her near to a spy trying to save the world.
fields.title: My Lucky Star

fields.plot: A woman framed for her husband's murder suspects he is still alive; as she has already been tried for the crime, she can't be re-prosecuted if she finds and kills him.

fields.plot: The U.S. government decides to go after an agro-business giant with a price-fixing accusation, based on the evidence submitted by their star witness, vice president-turned-informant Mark Whitacre.

fields.plot: During a long English summer in the early 1980s, two schoolboys from differing backgrounds set out to make a film inspired by [link=tt0083944].
fields.title: Son of Rambow

fields.plot: A man confesses to an FBI agent his family's story of how his religious fanatic father's visions lead to a series of murders to destroy supposed 'demons'.
fields.title: Frailty

fields.plot: A veteran grifter takes a young, attractive woman under his wing, but things get complicated when they become romantically involved.
fields.title: Focus

fields.plot: A British mystery author visits her publisher's home in the South of France, where her interaction with his unusual daughter sets off some touchy dynamics.
fields.title: Swimming Pool

fields.plot: When the first manned mission to Mars meets with a catastrophic and mysterious disaster, a rescue mission is launched to investigate the tragedy and bring back any survivors.
fields.title: Mission to Mars

fields.plot: Damien and Leito return to District 13 on a mission to bring peace to the troubled sector that is controlled by five different gang bosses, before the city's secret services take drastic measures to solve the problem.
fields.title: Banlieue 13 - Ultimatum

fields.plot: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.
fields.title: Tenkû no shiro Rapyuta

fields.plot: A heinous crime and its aftermath are recalled from differing points of view.
fields.title: Rashômon

fields.plot: Survivors of undead serial killer Freddy Krueger - who stalks his victims in their dreams - learn to take control of their own dreams in order to fight back.
fields.title: A Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors

fields.plot: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with into destroying the mafia that killed her family.
fields.title: The Specialist

fields.plot: A pregnant 17-year-old rebuilds her life after being abandoned by her boyfriend at a Wal-Mart in Sequoyah, Oklahoma.
fields.title: Where the Heart Is

fields.plot: Charlie Brewster and Peter Vincent from the original Fright Night must face more vampires out for revenge.
fields.title: Fright Night Part 2

fields.plot: A look at four seasons in the lives of a happily married couple and their relationships with their family and friends.
fields.title: Another Year

fields.plot: A fast-lane investment broker, offered the opportunity to see how the other half lives, wakes up to find that his sports car and girlfriend have become a mini-van and wife.
fields.title: The Family Man

fields.plot: Newlywed Molly moves into her deceased father's house in the countryside, where painful memories soon begin to haunt her.
fields.title: Lovely Molly

fields.plot: After an attack leaves him in limbo -- invisible to the living and also near death -- a teenager discovers the only person who might be able to help him, is his attacker.
fields.title: The Invisible

fields.plot: A billionaire and two other men are stranded, unequipped, by a plane crash in a dangerous wilderness. How many will survive to be rescued?
fields.title: The Edge

fields.plot: A nerdy valedictorian proclaims his love for the hottest and most popular girl in school - Beth Cooper - during his graduation speech. Much to his surprise, Beth shows up at his door that very night and decides to show him the best night of his life.
fields.title: I Love You, Beth Cooper

fields.plot: A college freshman returns to L.A. for the holidays at his ex-girlfriend's request, but discovers that his former best friend has an out-of-control drug habit.
fields.title: Less Than Zero

fields.plot: In an abandoned house in Poughkeepsie, New York murder investigators uncover hundreds of tapes showing decades of a serial killer's work.
fields.title: The Poughkeepsie Tapes

fields.plot: A sheriff's deputy fights an alternate universe version of himself who grows stronger with each alternate self he kills.
fields.title: The One

fields.plot: A romance writer sets off to Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure.
fields.title: Romancing the Stone

fields.plot: A Trans-Siberian train journey from China to Moscow becomes a thrilling chase of deception and murder when an American couple encounters a mysterious pair of fellow travelers.
fields.title: Transsiberian

fields.plot: Vampire mythology combined with the true history of Prince Vlad tell the origin of Dracula.

fields.plot: An apprentice witch, three kids and a cynical conman search for the missing component to a magic spell useful to the defense of Britain.
fields.title: Bedknobs and Broomsticks

fields.plot: The paths of four dream-chasing college friends cross with an array of colourful characters, from a tough-talking Punjabi female don to a Jugaad Baaz college watchman. Mayhem ensues.
fields.title: Fukrey

fields.plot: An accidental cross-time radio link connects father and son across 30 years. The son tries to save his father's life, but then must fix the consequences.
fields.title: Frequency

fields.plot: A paranoid, secretive surveillance expert has a crisis of conscience when he suspects that a couple he is spying on will be murdered.
fields.title: The Conversation

fields.plot: The story of the final Emperor of China.
fields.title: The Last Emperor

fields.plot: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.
fields.title: Against All Odds

fields.plot: The last dragon and a disillusioned dragonslaying knight must cooperate to stop an evil king who was given partial immortality.
fields.title: DragonHeart

fields.plot: Two swindlers get their hands on a map to the fabled city of gold, El Dorado.
fields.title: The Road to El Dorado

fields.plot: A young woman takes a soul-searching journey across America to resolve her questions about love while encountering a series of offbeat characters along the way.
fields.title: My Blueberry Nights

fields.plot: The last days in the life of legendary Hollywood actor Errol Flynn.
fields.title: The Last of Robin Hood

fields.plot: A young woman is attracted to a man despite her thinking she's seen him kill someone.
fields.title: Head Over Heels

fields.plot: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.
fields.title: Aliens in the Attic

fields.plot: Two determined mothers­, one a teacher, look to transform their children's failing inner city school. Facing a powerful and entrenched bureaucracy, they risk everything to make a difference in the education and future of their children.
fields.title: Won't Back Down

fields.plot: The sailor of legend is framed by the goddess Eris for the theft of the Book of Peace, and must travel to her realm at the end of the world to retrieve it and save the life of his childhood friend Prince Proteus.
fields.title: Sinbad: Legend of the Seven Seas

fields.plot: A look at the life of Alfred Kinsey (Neeson), a pioneer in the area of human sexuality research, whose 1948 publication
was one of the first recorded works that saw science address sexual behavior.

fields.plot: Henry Spencer tries to survive his industrial environment, his angry girlfriend, and the unbearable screams of his newly born mutant child.
fields.title: Eraserhead

fields.plot: Nick is a struggling dentist in Canada. A new neighbor moves in, and he discovers that it is Jimmy
Teduski. His wife convinces him to go to Chicago and inform the mob boss who wants Jimmy dead.
fields.title: The Whole Nine Yards

fields.plot: The dramatization of a motorcycle road trip Che Guevara went on in his youth that showed him his life's calling.
fields.title: Diarios de motocicleta

fields.plot: The wife of an oafish restaurant owner becomes bored with her husband and considers an affair with a regular patron.
fields.title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover

fields.plot: A young boy named Milo gains a deeper appreciation for his mom after Martians come to Earth to take her away.
fields.title: Mars Needs Moms

fields.plot: A college freshman's world is rocked when she learns she is the adopted survivor of an attempted foeticide.
fields.title: October Baby

fields.plot: A New York photographer hunts down a serial killer.
fields.title: The Midnight Meat Train

fields.plot: Summertime. A cruising spot for men, tucked away on the shores of a lake. Franck falls in love with Michel. An attractive, potent and lethally dangerous man. Franck knows this, but wants to live out his passion anyway.
fields.title: L'inconnu du lac

fields.plot: After a blurred trauma over the summer, Melinda enters high school a selective mute. Struggling with school, friends, and family, she tells the dark tale of her experiences, and why she has chosen not to speak.

fields.plot: During an otherwise routine babysitting gig, a high-school student is harassed by an increasingly threatening prank caller.

fields.plot: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.
fields.title: The Fisher King

fields.plot: A story centered on the friendship between a boy and a dolphin whose tail was lost in a crab trap.
fields.title: Dolphin Tale

fields.plot: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.
fields.title: Striptease

fields.plot: At the end of the century, Satan visits New York in search of a bride. It's up to an ex-cop who now runs an elite security outfit to stop him.
fields.title: End of Days

fields.plot: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

fields.plot: A seductive teen befriends an introverted high school student and schemes her way into the lives of her wealthy family.
fields.title: Poison Ivy

fields.plot: Elwood must reunite the old band, with a few new members, and go on another 'Mission from God'.
fields.title: Blues Brothers 2000

fields.plot: An ugly duckling having undergone a remarkable change, still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but not before his business-focused brother has something to say about it.
fields.title: Sabrina

fields.plot: The lives of two female neighbors intersect when their individual obsessions begin to unravel.
fields.title: Compulsion

fields.plot: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.
fields.title: Drop Dead Fred

fields.plot: A big-city newspaper columnist is forced to enter a drug and alcohol rehab center after ruining her sister's wedding and crashing a stolen limousine.
fields.title: 28 Days

fields.plot: Horror-Comedy about a man-eating crocodile loose in the lake.
fields.title: Lake Placid

fields.plot: A reporter is assigned to write a story about a woman who has left a string of fiances at the altar.
fields.title: Runaway Bride

fields.plot: Two childhood friends are pro athletes of a national sport called BASEketball, a hybrid of baseball and basketball, and must deal with a greedy businessman scheming against their team.
fields.title: BASEketball

fields.plot: An unorthodox and irreverent DJ begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the US Armed Services Radio station in Vietnam.
fields.title: Good Morning, Vietnam

fields.plot: When 19-year-old Adam agrees to do a day's driving for his mum's gangster boyfriend Peter, it takes him on a 24-hour journey into a nightmarish world of murder, sex trafficking and revenge, in the company of aging hit man Roy.
fields.title: The Liability

fields.plot: After suffering humiliation by the crew Invincible, street dancer Ash (Hentschel) looks to gather the best dancers from around the world for a rematch.
fields.title: StreetDance 2

fields.plot: A down-and-out golfer attempts to recover his game and his life with help from a mystical caddy.
fields.title: The Legend of Bagger Vance

fields.plot: While examining the influence of the fast food industry, Morgan Spurlock personally explores the consequences on his health of a diet of solely McDonald's food for one month.
fields.title: Super Size Me

fields.plot: A man is surrounded by strange events and odd neighbors in this adaptation of Chris Millis' novel.
fields.title: Small Apartments

fields.plot: The day-to-day lives of a number of suburban Los Angeles residents.
fields.title: Short Cuts

fields.plot: Bond is led to believe that he is targeted by the world's most expensive assassin and must hunt him down to stop him.
fields.title: The Man with the Golden Gun

fields.plot: Lily and Alison face a life-changing event after they leave their Salton Sea home and follow the boys they meet back to Los Angeles.
fields.title: Little Birds

fields.plot: In the 1913 US Open, 20-year-old Francis Ouimet played against his idol, 1900 US Open champion, Englishman Harry Vardon.
fields.title: The Greatest Game Ever Played
Hur många lingon finns det i världen?

fields.plot: An unemployed cartoonist moves back in with his parents and younger brother Freddy. When his parents demand he leave, he begins to spread rumors that his father is sexually abusing Freddy.
fields.title: Freddy Got Fingered

fields.title: Next Friday

fields.plot: A woman faces deadly consequences for abandoning her loving relationship with her boyfriend to pursue exciting sexual scenarios with a mysterious celebrity mountaineer.
fields.title: Killing Me Softly

fields.plot: A young guy's only option to erase a really bad debt is to rig the Special Olympics by posing as a contestant.
fields.title: The Ringer

fields.plot: A boy discovers an incredible and gruesome world of monsters under his bed.
fields.title: Little Monsters

fields.plot: Bloodthirsty creatures await a pack of divers who become trapped in an underwater cave network.
fields.title: The Cave

fields.plot: San Francisco, 1940, detectives, dames, documents, Nazis, and a treasure.
fields.title: The Cheap Detective

fields.plot: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psionic psychopath that only two kids and a group of psionics can stop.
fields.title: Akira

fields.plot: A very handsome man finds the love of his life, but he suffers an accident and needs to have his face rebuilt by surgery after it is severely disfigured.
fields.title: Abre los ojos

fields.plot: When the world's media descend on the remote Scottish island where a Hollywood actress is attempting to get married, a local girl is hired as a decoy bride to put the paparazzi off the scent.
fields.title: The Decoy Bride

fields.plot: A former Australian policeman is rescued by a tribe of children when he is banished from a desert town and sent into the desert to die by the desert town's evil queen.
fields.title: Mad Max Beyond Thunderdome

fields.plot: Honey is a sexy, tough music video choreographer who shakes up her life after her mentor gives her an ultimatum: sleep with him or be blacklisted within their industry.
fields.title: Honey

fields.plot: The story of a girl who is willing to do anything to become Valedictorian, even if it means murdering the teacher that stands in her way.
fields.title: Teaching Mrs. Tingle

fields.plot: A woman's idyllic life is shattered when her husband is killed in a senseless act of violence. As she prepares to take matters into her own hands, two unexpected encounters begin to change everything.
fields.title: Unconditional

fields.plot: A man and woman meet and try to have a romantic affair, despite their personal problems and the interference of their disapproving friends.
fields.title: About Last Night...

fields.plot: A man and a woman awaken to find themselves captured in a cellar. As their kidnapper drives them psychologically mad, the truth about their horrific abduction is revealed.
fields.title: Captivity

fields.plot: A millionaire offers a group of diverse people 1,000,000 to spend the night in a haunted house with a horrifying past.
fields.title: House on Haunted Hill

fields.plot: After assuming his dead cellmate's identity to get with his girlfriend, an ex-con finds himself the reluctant participant in a casino heist.

fields.title: Mar adentro

fields.plot: Grossly overweight Prof. Sherman Klump, desperate to lose weight takes a special chemical that turns him into the slim but obnoxious Buddy Love.

fields.plot: Two friends and business partners find their lives turned upside down when strange circumstances lead to them being placed in the care of 7-year-old twins.
fields.title: Old Dogs

fields.plot: A dramatized account of a great Russian naval mutiny and a resulting street demonstration which brought on a police massacre.
fields.title: Bronenosets Potyomkin

fields.plot: A petroleum exploration expedition comes to an isolated island and encounters a colossal giant gorilla.
fields.title: King Kong

fields.plot: A man and his son search for a stolen bicycle vital for his job.
fields.title: Ladri di biciclette

fields.plot: Rafting expert Gail takes on a pair of armed killers while navigating a spectacularly violent river.

fields.plot: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

fields.title: Sneakers

fields.plot: A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.
fields.title: Cleanskin

fields.plot: A group of 50's high schoolers come of age in a bleak, isolated, atrophied West Texas town that is slowly dying, both economically and culturally.
fields.title: The Last Picture Show

fields.plot: What does it take to become a Stepford wife, a woman perfect beyond belief? Ask the Stepford husbands, who've created this high-tech terrifying little town, in a very modern comedy-thriller.
fields.title: The Stepford Wives

fields.plot: Shakespeare's epic play is translated from page to screen, with the gender of the main character, Prospero, changed from male to female.
fields.title: The Tempest

fields.plot: Thriller charting the moral collapse of a police family. Two cop brothers, smothered by the shadow of their former police chief father, must investigate a crime they themselves have committed.
fields.title: Blood

fields.plot: Newlyweds move into a house where a murder was committed, and experience strange manifestations which drive them away.
fields.title: The Amityville Horror

fields.plot: The daughter of a brilliant but mentally disturbed mathematician, recently deceased, tries to come to grips with her possible inheritance: his insanity. Complicating matters are one of her father's ex-students who wants to search through his papers and her estranged sister who shows up to help settle his affairs.
fields.title: Proof

fields.plot: Trapped in an isolated gas station by a voracious Splinter parasite that transforms its still living victims into deadly hosts, a young couple and an escaped convict must find a way to work together to survive this primal terror.

fields.plot: A senator arranges for his son, a rich white kid who fancies himself black, to be kidnapped by a couple of black actors pretending to be murderers to try and shock him out of his plans to become a rapper.
fields.title: Malibu's Most Wanted

fields.title: Felon

fields.plot: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.
fields.title: Grosse Pointe Blank

fields.plot: Via a magic mirror, Twilight Sparkle travels into an alternate universe in order to recover a crown that was stolen from the Crystal Empire. Upon her arrival she is horrified to learn that she has turned into a human.
fields.title: My Little Pony: Equestria Girls

fields.plot: In Los Angeles, a fallen soldier who has joined the ranks of the living dead reunites with his best friend in order to deal with the city's drug dealers and killers - a perfect way to collect the blood that one of them so desperately needs.

fields.plot: The tale of two brothers with serious financial woes. When a third party proposes they turn to crime, things go bad and the two become enemies.
fields.title: Cassandra's Dream

fields.plot: Set in 1954, a group of Florida high schoolers seek out to help a buddy lose his virginity, which leads them to seek revenge on a sleazy nightclub owner and his redneck sheriff brother for harassing them.
fields.title: Porky's

fields.plot: The lives of many individuals connected by the desire for happiness, often from sources usually considered dark or evil.
fields.title: Happiness

fields.plot: A group of high school outcasts get revenge on the students that torment them.
fields.title: The Final

fields.plot: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.
fields.title: I Still Know What You Did Last Summer

fields.plot: A woman is asked to spy on a group of Nazi friends in South America. How far will she have to go to ingratiate herself with them?
fields.title: Notorious

fields.plot: On the run from an abusive husband, a young mother begins to train herself to fight back.
fields.title: Enough

Baker lands on Planet 51 thinking he's the first person to step foot on it. To his surprise, he finds that this planet is inhabited by little green people who are happily living in a white picket fence world, and whose only fear is that it will be overrun by alien invaders...like Chuck!
fields.title: Planet 51

fields.plot: Four American soldiers and one Brit fighting in Europe during World War II struggle to return to Allied territory after being separated from U.S. forces during the historic Malmedy Massacre.
fields.title: Saints and Soldiers

fields.plot: Ten-year-old Arthur, in a bid to save his grandfather's house from being demolished, goes looking for some much-fabled hidden treasure in the land of the Minimoys, a tiny people living in harmony with nature.
fields.title: Arthur et les Minimoys

fields.plot: A reporter interviews a psychic, who tells her that she's going to die and her life is meaningless.
fields.title: Life or Something Like It

fields.plot: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.
fields.title: Bakjwi

fields.plot: A data courier, literally carrying a data package inside his head, must deliver it before he dies from the burden or is killed by the Yakuza.
fields.title: Johnny Mnemonic

fields.plot: Two slacker wrestling fans are devastated by the ousting of their favorite character by an unscrupulous promoter.
fields.title: Ready to Rumble

fields.plot: After Cheryl Frasier and Stan Fields are kidnapped, Gracie goes undercover in Las Vegas to find them.
fields.title: Miss Congeniality 2: Armed and Fabulous

fields.plot: A gunfighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.
fields.title: High Plains Drifter

fields.plot: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.
fields.title: Touch of Evil

fields.plot: In 18th century France, the Chevalier de Fronsac and his native American friend Mani are sent by the King to the Gevaudan province to investigate the killings of hundreds by a mysterious beast.
fields.title: Le pacte des loups

fields.plot: The true story of Danny Greene, a tough Irish thug working for mobsters in Cleveland during the 1970's.
fields.title: Kill the Irishman

fields.plot: A pair of corporate spies who share a steamy past hook up to pull off the ultimate con job on their respective bosses.
fields.title: Duplicity

fields.plot: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.
fields.title: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment

fields.plot: A hitman tries to retire but a beautiful thief may change his plans.
fields.title: Wild Target

fields.plot: During the Bosnian War, Danijel, a soldier fighting for the Serbs, re-encounters Ajla, a Bosnian who's now a captive in his camp he oversees. Their once promising connection has become ambiguous as their motives have changed.
fields.title: In the Land of Blood and Honey

fields.plot: A sheriff sees his state senate bid slide out onto the ice when his daughter begins to date the son of a charming but psychologically disturbed woman with whom the sheriff has engaged in a two-decade-long affair.
fields.title: Virginia
Snow White: A Tale of Terror

fields.plot: After being rescued and brought to an island, a man discovers that it's inhabitants are experimental animals being turned into strange looking humans, all of it the work of a visionary doctor.
fields.title: The Island of Dr. Moreau

fields.plot: Two young Swedish children experience the many comedies and tragedies of their family, the Ekdahls.
fields.title: Fanny och Alexander

fields.plot: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York.
fields.title: Oliver & Company

fields.plot: In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.
fields.title: Wonderland

fields.plot: The unburied dead return to life and seek human victims.
fields.title: Night of the Living Dead

fields.plot: Bertram Pincus is a man whose people skills leave much to be desired. When Pincus dies unexpectedly, but is miraculously revived after seven minutes, he wakes up to discover that he now has the annoying ability to see ghosts.

fields.plot: A doctor who is traveling to see his estranged son sparks with an unhappily married woman at a North Carolina inn.
fields.title: Nights in Rodanthe

fields.plot: As an actress starts to adopt the persona of her character in a film, her world starts to become nightmarish and surreal.
fields.title: Inland Empire

fields.plot: A senator, who became famous for killing a notorious outlaw, returns for the funeral of an old friend and tells the truth about his deed.
fields.title: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance

fields.plot: A collection of animated interpretations of great works of Western classical music.
fields.title: Fantasia

fields.plot: Summer war games between neighborhood kids turn deadly serious when jealousy and betrayal enter the mix.
fields.title: I Declare War

fields.plot: A story about two friends, a priest and a rabbi, who fall in love with the same beauty (Jenna Elfman).
fields.title: Keeping the Faith

fields.plot: A young woman discovers her visiting
may not be the man he seems to be.
fields.title: Shadow of a Doubt

fields.plot: A jewel thief's daughter is kidnapped after he steals a collection of prized black diamonds, which aren't at all what they seem.
fields.title: Cradle 2 the Grave

fields.plot: A single mother moves into a new house with her daughter. Soon after the young girl has her first baby tooth fall off, she begins to recount that she is having nocturnal visits by a tooth fairy. It seems the house has a sinister history.
