fields.plot: A near-fatal accident leaves one friend in the hospital while the rest go on their annual vacation. But their secrets and personal grief threaten to drive them apart.
fields.title: Les petits mouchoirs

fields.plot: Eeyore has lost his tail, and Winnie the Pooh and his friends hold a contest to get him a new one.
fields.title: Winnie the Pooh

fields.plot: Complex look at Hollywood and what it reveals about Western culture.
fields.title: Maps to the Stars

fields.plot: A Brooklyn-set romantic drama about a bachelor torn between the family friend his parents wish he would marry and his beautiful but volatile new neighbor.
fields.title: Two Lovers

fields.plot: An original mix of fiction and reality illuminates the life of comic book hero everyman Harvey Pekar.
fields.title: American Splendor

fields.plot: When Max makes an preposterous promise to his girlfriend, his chances to fulfilling it seem hopeless when he is dragged onto a cross-country trip with his embarrassing father, Goofy.
fields.title: A Goofy Movie

fields.plot: A documentary featuring interviews with all surviving former heads of Shin Bet, the Israeli security agency whose activities and membership are closely held state secrets.
fields.title: The Gatekeepers

fields.plot: A meditation on love and its various incarnations, set within a community of friends in Oregon. and is described as an exploration of the magical, mysterious and sometimes painful incarnations of love.
fields.title: Feast of Love

fields.plot: Beautiful Carmen Colson and her ironworker husband Wayne are placed in the Federal Witness Protection program after witnessing an
. Thinking they are at last safe, they are targeted by an experienced hit man and a psychopathic young upstart killer. The ensuing struggle will test Carmen to the limit.

fields.plot: A woman flies to France to confront her straying fiancé, but gets into trouble when the charming crook seated next to her uses her for smuggling.
fields.title: French Kiss

fields.plot: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.
fields.title: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil

fields.plot: A mod London photographer seems to find something very suspicious in the shots he has taken of a mysterious beauty in a desolate park.
fields.title: Blowup

fields.plot: A documentary that follows a billionaire couple as they begin construction on a mansion inspired by Versailles. During the next two years, their empire, fueled by the real estate bubble and cheap money, falters due to the economic crisis.
fields.title: The Queen of Versailles

fields.plot: Former CIA spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

fields.title: Escape from L.A.

fields.plot: A Secret Service Agent is held captive in the trunk of a car and endures mental and physical torture as terrorists attempt to extract information for their plot against the President of the United States.
fields.title: Brake

fields.plot: On a business trip to New Orleans, a damaged man seeks salvation by caring for a wayward young woman.
fields.title: Welcome to the Rileys

fields.plot: When a tragedy strikes close to home, four police officers struggle with their faith and their roles as husbands and fathers; together they make a decision that will change all of their lives.
fields.title: Courageous

fields.plot: An update of Shakespeare's 'Othello' with a young cast, set in a high school and centered around basketball player Odin.
fields.title: O

fields.plot: Serial killer Jason Voorhees' supernatural origins are revealed.
fields.title: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday

fields.plot: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.
fields.title: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard

fields.plot: A psychiatrist must cure a young patient that presents himself as Don Juan, the greatest lover in the world.
fields.title: Don Juan DeMarco

fields.plot: Tanner Hall is a vivid peek into the private world of an all-girls boarding school. In a cozy, but run down New England, the knot of adolescent complexity is unraveled through the coming of age stories of four teen-age girls.

fields.plot: This is a story of IDA and KRISTER. It's about a relationship that goes to hell. They are both crazy in love but manage to strangle the supply of oxygen and adapt to each other in a way that will lead to catastrophic consequences.
fields.title: Vi

fields.plot: When CIA Analyst Jack Ryan interferes with an IRA assassination, a renegade faction targets him and his family for revenge.
fields.title: Patriot Games

fields.plot: The bumbling Mr. Bean travels to America when he is given the responsibility of bringing a highly valuable painting to a Los Angeles museum.
fields.title: Bean

fields.plot: Matt and Christina Drayton are a couple whose attitudes are challenged when their daughter brings home a fiancé who is black.
fields.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner

fields.plot: Publisher Will Randall becomes a werewolf and has to fight to keep his job.
fields.title: Wolf

fields.plot: Comedy-drama about a widowed US president and a lobbyist who fall in love. It's all aboveboard, but
and sparks fly anyway.
fields.title: The American President

fields.plot: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.
fields.title: Cabaret

fields.plot: A young man (Lerman) moves from Montana to Florida with his family, where he's compelled to engage in a fight to protect a population of endangered owls.
fields.title: Hoot

fields.plot: A sword-and-sorcery fantasy about a young man's search for revenge. Armed with supernatural powers, the handsome hero and his animal allies wage war against marauding forces.
fields.title: The Beastmaster

fields.plot: A detective examines the mysterious death of George Reeves, TV's Superman.
fields.title: Hollywoodland

fields.plot: The last remaining witch hunter battles against an uprising of witches in modern day New York.
fields.title: The Last Witch Hunter

fields.plot: In an old school Las Vegas casino, its top gambling jinx breaks his curse when he falls in love, much to his boss' consternation.

fields.title: Last Man Standing

fields.title: Chapter 27

fields.plot: A divorced father discovers that his 12-year-old son's new stepfather is not what he made himself out to be.
fields.title: Domestic Disturbance

fields.plot: Based on real events, Paul Bernardo (Collins) and his wife, Karla Homolka (Prepon), kidnap, sexually abuse, and murder three young girls.

fields.title: Cool World

fields.plot: When the farmer's away, all the animals play ... and sing, and dance. Eventually, though, someone has to step in and run things, a responsibility that ends up going to Otis, a carefree cow.

fields.plot: While on vacation in Mexico, Chloe, a ritzy Beverly Hills chihuahua, finds herself lost and in need of assistance in order to get back home.
fields.title: Beverly Hills Chihuahua

fields.plot: Professor Quatermass, trying to gather support for his Lunar colonisation project, is intrigued by mysterious traces that have been showing up.
fields.title: Quatermass 2

fields.plot: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer.

fields.plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.
fields.title: Hoosiers

fields.plot: A chauffeur takes a job for a billionaire who makes his life hell.
fields.title: Stretch

fields.plot: An updated version of the 1980 musical, which centered on the students of the New York Academy of Performing Arts.

fields.plot: Injuries sustained by two Army ranger behind enemy lines in Afghanistan set off a sequence of events involving a congressman, a journalist and a professor.

fields.plot: A group of college buddies sow their wild oats in New Orleans.
fields.title: Mardi Gras: Spring Break

fields.plot: Two best friends set out to rescue their pal after he's accidentally dragged to hell.

fields.plot: Two feisty, free-spirited women are connected by the brilliant, charismatic poet who loves them both.
fields.title: The Edge of Love

fields.plot: A guidance counselor mistakenly sends out the wrong transcripts to Stanford University under the name of an over-achieving high schooler.

fields.plot: A wealthy New Yorker leaves her cheating husband and bonds with other society women at a resort.

fields.title: Oliver!

fields.plot: A lifelong feud between two neighbors since childhood, only gets worse when a new female neighbor moves across the street.

fields.plot: A screw ball sex comedy following two couples and their ten rules to a happy healthy and open relationship.

fields.plot: A drama that is centered around a troubled teenage girl and a family that is trying to get over the loss of their son.

fields.title: The People vs. Larry Flynt

fields.title: The Water Horse

fields.plot: An abandoned wife is evicted from her house and starts a tragic conflict with her home's new owners.

fields.title: Starship Troopers 3: Marauder

fields.title: Rambo III

fields.plot: A small-town woman tries to achieve her goal of becoming a flight attendant.
fields.title: View from the Top

fields.plot: A night guard at an armored car company in the Southern U.S. organizes one of the biggest bank heists in American history.
fields.title: Loomis Fargo

fields.plot: Plot unknown.
fields.title: Journey 3: From the Earth to the Moon

fields.plot: A recently blinded woman is terrorized by a trio of thugs while they search for a heroin stuffed doll they believe is in her apartment.
fields.title: Wait Until Dark

fields.plot: When a retired engineer is called upon to rescue a failing satellite, he insists that his equally old teammates accompany him into space.
fields.title: Space Cowboys

fields.plot: A newcomer to a fancy ballet academy gradually comes to realize that the staff of the school are actually a coven of witches bent on chaos and destruction.

fields.plot: A young man tries to deal with the childhood terror that has affected his life.
fields.title: Boogeyman

fields.plot: In a remarkable turn-of-events, the result of the presidential election comes down to one man's vote.
fields.title: Swing Vote

fields.plot: The plot is unknown at this time.
fields.title: SpongeBob SquarePants 2

fields.plot: With their daughter away, her parents decide to skip Christmas altogether until she decides to come home, causing an uproar when they have to celebrate the holidays at the last minute.
fields.title: Christmas with the Kranks

fields.title: Joyful Noise

fields.title: Kalifornia

fields.title: Resolution

fields.title: All Stars

fields.title: Triple Nine

fields.plot: A butler who sacrificed body and soul to service in the years post World War II realizes too late how misguided his loyalty has been.
fields.title: The Remains of the Day

fields.plot: A story between a mole in the police department and an undercover cop. Their objectives are the same: to find out who is the mole, and who is the cop.
fields.title: Mou gaan dou

fields.plot: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.
fields.title: Killer Klowns from Outer Space

fields.plot: The plot is unknown at this time.
fields.title: The Legend of Conan

fields.plot: A small group of military officers and scientists dwell in an underground bunker as the world above is overrun by zombies.
fields.title: Day of the Dead

fields.plot: Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.

fields.title: Don't Look Now

fields.title: Six Degrees of Separation

fields.plot: A high school valedictorian who gets baked with the local stoner finds himself the subject of a drug test. The situation causes him to concoct an ambitious plan to get his entire graduating class to face the same fate, and fail.

fields.plot: A teenage boy is haunted in his dreams by Freddy Krueger who is out to possess him to continue his murdering in the real world.

fields.plot: Surly, a curmudgeon, independent squirrel is banished from his park and forced to survive in the city. Lucky for him, he stumbles on the one thing that may be able to save his life, and the rest of park community, as they gear up for winter - Maury's Nut Store.

fields.title: Untitled Cameron Crowe Project

fields.plot: A young pathology med student suspects that the spirit of a dead cadaver in the hospital morgue where she works is killing off all those who handle or desecrate the body.

fields.plot: Two 11-year-olds find love in New York City.

fields.plot: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.
fields.title: Appaloosa

fields.plot: Two small town Texas cops go undercover to catch a major drug dealer and are sucked into the drug culture, compromising their assignment.
fields.title: Rush

fields.plot: Black and white basketball hustlers join forces to double their chances.
fields.title: White Men Can't Jump

fields.plot: Four skaters follow their idol on his summer tour in an attempt to get noticed, get sponsored, and become stars themselves.
fields.title: Grind
Girls Just Want to Have Fun

fields.plot: Patrons locked inside of a bar are forced to fight monsters.
fields.title: Feast

fields.plot: A drama critic learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are homicidal maniacs, and that insanity runs in his family.
fields.title: Arsenic and Old Lace

fields.plot: A twist on the Snow White fairy tale that is set in 1920s Seville and centered on a female bullfighter.
fields.title: Blancanieves

fields.plot: An orphan boy and his magical dragon come to town with his abusive adoptive parents in pursuit.
fields.title: Pete's Dragon

fields.plot: A graduate history student is unwittingly caught in the middle of an international conspiracy involving stolen diamonds, an exiled Nazi war criminal, and a rogue government agent.
fields.title: Marathon Man

fields.title: The Trip

fields.plot: As Ellis prepares to leave Tucson for his freshman year at an East Coast prep school, he also faces separating from his flaky, new age mother and the only real father he has ever known: Goat Man.
fields.title: Goats

fields.plot: A family vacationing in Morocco accidentally stumble on to an assassination plot and the conspirators are determined to prevent them from interfering.
fields.title: The Man Who Knew Too Much

fields.plot: After New York City receives a series of attacks from giant flying robots, a reporter teams up with a pilot in search of their origin, as well as the reason for the disappearances of famous scientists around the world.

fields.plot: Three band members hoping for a big break head to a radio station to play their demo tape and wind up holding everyone hostage with plastic guns when the head DJ refuses to play them.
fields.title: Airheads

fields.title: A Perfect World

fields.plot: A romantic comedy where a bored, overworked Estate Lawyer, upon first sight of a beautiful instructor, signs up for ballroom dancing lessons.

fields.title: Ringu

fields.plot: The classic gangster story of Bugsy Malone told with an all child cast.
fields.title: Bugsy Malone

fields.plot: A vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to endure sunlight.

fields.title: Kaboom

that tries to capture the essence of the African American experience.

3D rou pu tuan zhi ji le bao jian

cruise.

in the fast food industry.

in support of a trucker's vendetta with an abusive sheriff...Based on the country song of same title by C.W. McCall.

only to discover that he has a few tricks up his own sleeve.

, her mother's girlhood friends.

cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million
civilians.

for runaway.

, upon which the film is based, was a best-seller.

fields.plot: When young girls start to go missing within a religious cult, older followers fear a long-told prophecy while the younger members suspect abusive elders are killing them off.
fields.title: Where the Devil Hides

fields.plot: An eight year old boy is thought to be lazy and a troublemaker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.
fields.title: Taare Zameen Par

fields.plot: A Miami businesswoman adjusts to her new life in a tiny Minnesota town.
fields.title: New in Town

fields.plot: On a trip to a Mexican border town, three college friends stumble upon a human-sacrifice cult.
fields.title: Borderland

fields.plot: On the night of a sleepover, a group of teenage girls venture out in a competitive game of challenging dares. As the antics escalate, and the dares become more extreme, the girls unravel the truth behind a former student's rumored suicide.
fields.title: Triple Dog

fields.plot: GRIFFIN AND PHOENIX is a poignantly funny love story about two people who face a seemingly insurmountable obstacle that may stand between them and a last chance at love.
fields.title: Griffin & Phoenix

fields.plot: Kate and Martin escape from personal tragedy to an Island Retreat. Cut off from the outside world, their attempts to recover are shattered when a Man is washed ashore, with news of airborne killer disease that is sweeping through Europe.
fields.title: Retreat

fields.plot: A compilation of interviews, rehearsals and backstage footage of Michael Jackson as he prepared for his series of sold-out shows in London.
fields.title: This Is It

fields.plot: A look at the life of legendary American pilot Amelia Earhart, who disappeared while flying over the Pacific Ocean in 1937 in an attempt to make a flight around the world.
fields.title: Amelia

fields.plot: When the trail goes cold on a murder investigation of a policeman an undercover narcotics officer is lured back to the force to help solve the case.
fields.title: Narc

fields.plot: Aliens abduct all adults; genius Jimmy and his friends build an interstellar spacefleet and rescue them.
fields.title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius

fields.plot: An American woman, trapped in Islamic Iran by her brutish husband, must find a way to escape with her daughter as well.
fields.title: Not Without My Daughter

fields.plot: A deadly drought in 1942 takes its toll on central China's Henan province during the war against Japan.
fields.title: Yi jiu si er

fields.plot: A landscape architect's dealings with a young thief cause him to re-evaluate his life.
fields.title: Breaking and Entering

fields.plot: A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.
fields.title: Barbershop

fields.plot: Dr. Caligari's somnambulist, Cesare, and his deadly predictions.
fields.title: Das Cabinet des Dr. Caligari

fields.plot: After a one night stand with Isabel, Alex realizes that she is pregnant and they decide to get married. However, along with the marriage comes compromise of one's own cultural traditions.
fields.title: Fools Rush In

fields.plot: Strangers looking for a woman's father arrive at a tropical island where a doctor desperately searches for the cause and cure of a recent epidemic of the undead.
fields.title: Zombi 2

fields.plot: Two childhood friends, a New York hairstylist and a would-be musician, get caught up with the mob and are forced to deliver 50,000 to Australia, but things go haywire when the money is lost to a wild kangaroo.
fields.title: Kangaroo Jack

fields.plot: A filmmaker (van den Driessche) holds a series of boundary-pushing auditions for his project about female pleasure.
fields.title: Les anges exterminateurs

fields.plot: Ambitious singer must struggle with her musical career, her love life and to bring up her daughter by herself.
fields.title: Monica Z

fields.plot: A secret service agent is framed as the mole in an assassination attempt on the president. He must clear his name and foil another assassination attempt while on the run from a relentless FBI agent.
fields.title: The Sentinel

fields.plot: A look at the relationship between a lonely introverted girl and a young video store clerk vying for her attention.
fields.title: Good Dick

fields.plot: In Los Angeles, five high-school friends deal with romance, money, prom, college, sex, bullies, Facebook, fitting in, standing out, and finding themselves.
fields.title: We the Party

fields.plot: A single African-American mother struggles to clear her name after being wrongly accused and arrested for dealing drugs in an impoverished town in Texas.
fields.title: American Violet

fields.plot: A series of short films set around the theme of infidelity.
fields.title: Les infidèles

fields.plot: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness.
fields.title: Bad Lieutenant

fields.plot: A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.
fields.title: Dolores Claiborne

fields.plot: A young man, broke and jobless, abducts three rich college kids to try and get money from their fathers.
fields.title: The Entitled

fields.plot: A ghost is forced to return to ghost school and improve his haunting skills.
fields.title: B.O.O.: Bureau of Otherworldly Operations

fields.plot: A British team is sent to cross occupied Greek territory and destroy the massive German gun emplacement that commands a key sea channel.
fields.title: The Guns of Navarone

fields.plot: Fired from his job for exposing corrupt business practices, a former biotech executive turns to impregnating wealthy lesbians for profit.
fields.title: She Hate Me

fields.plot: Kurt Sloane must learn the ancient kick boxing art of Muay Thai in order to avenge his brother.
fields.title: Kickboxer

fields.plot: Two young women, marginalised by society, go on a destructive tour of sex and violence. Breaking norms and killing men - and shattering the complacency of polite cinema audiences.
fields.title: Baise-moi

fields.plot: Worried that he has gotten the free-spirited Mindy pregnant after an unprotected one-night stand, Fred feigns romantic interest and sticks by her side for twelve hours to make sure she takes both doses of the morning-after pill.
fields.title: The Pill

fields.plot: In Hamburg, German-Greek chef Zinos unknowingly disturbs the peace in his locals-only restaurant by hiring a more talented chef.
fields.title: Soul Kitchen

fields.plot: A businessman is reunited with the four lost souls who were his guardian angels during childhood, all with a particular purpose to joining the afterlife.
fields.title: Heart and Souls

fields.plot: An Arab surgeon living in Tel Aviv discovers a dark secret about his wife in the aftermath of a suicide bombing.
fields.title: The Attack

fields.plot: The sole survivor of a lost whaling ship relates the tale of his captain's self-destructive obsession to hunt the white whale, Moby Dick.
fields.title: Moby Dick

fields.plot: A United States Navy destroyer escort participates in a Navy
experiment that inadvertently sends two sailors 40 years into the future.
fields.title: The Philadelphia Experiment

fields.plot: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says,
and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.
fields.title: Dead Man on Campus

fields.plot: When geek Ethan discovers three fellow students scamming the exam system, he blackmails them to win over the college's most popular girl.
fields.title: Slackers

fields.plot: A small Maryland town is gripped by a curse which causes residents to take their own life one after another.
fields.title: From Within

fields.plot: An adventure set in the early part of the 20th century and focused on a popular novelist and her dealings with would-be suitors, the cops, monsters, and other distractions.
fields.title: Les aventures extraordinaires d'Adèle Blanc-Sec

fields.plot: A prepubescent chess prodigy refuses to harden himself in order to become a champion like the famous but unlikable Bobby Fischer.
fields.title: Searching for Bobby Fischer

fields.plot: Desperate to get out from under her overprotective mother, a home-schooled teen runs off to live with her dad, and forms a bond with his much-younger boyfriend.
fields.title: Sassy Pants

fields.plot: A lawyer sees the chance to salvage his career and self-respect by taking a medical malpractice case to trial rather than settling.
fields.title: The Verdict

fields.plot: A washed up pitcher flashes through his career.
fields.title: For Love of the Game

fields.plot: When talk radio host Emma Lloyd advises one of her listeners to break up with her boyfriend, the jilted ex sets about getting his revenge.
fields.title: The Accidental Husband

fields.plot: A film told from the perspective of the emotions inside the mind of a little girl.
fields.title: Inside Out

fields.plot: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.
fields.title: Cape Fear

fields.plot: Shipwrecked on an island, the castaway boys eventually revert to savagery despite the few rational kids' attempts to prevent that.
fields.title: Lord of the Flies

fields.plot: A detective in post Katrina New Orleans area has a series of surreal encounters with a troop of friendly Confederate soldiers while investigating serial killings of local prostitutes, a 1965 lynching and corrupt local businessmen.
fields.title: In the Electric Mist

fields.plot: A guy's life is turned around by an email, which includes the names of everyone he's had sex with and ever will have sex with. His situation gets worse when he encounters a femme fatale (Ryder) who targets men guilty of sex crime.
fields.title: Sex and Death 101

fields.plot: While traveling across country with her fiancé, Beth wakes alone in an isolated clinic to a mother's worst nightmare. Just how far will she go to save her child?
fields.title: The Clinic
